Product: Sheamoisture Curl Enhancing Smoothie for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 20 oz
Title: Exactly what I needed
Review: This stuff is AMAZING. I have a lot of fine, low-porosity 3B curly hair, and this product is my new favorite when it comes to styling. The texture, to be completely honest, isn’t my favorite because it’s so thick and just feels kind of gross when I’m scooping it out of the container, but boy does my hair ever like it, and that’s enough for me. It leaves my hair extremely moisturized and smooth, and it gives me SUCH GOOD SLIP, so detangling is a breeze. I typically use my Denman brush after applying this smoothie, and it leaves me with the softest, most defined curls ever. It’s not heavy on my hair once it dries, either. (I’ve also used it before doing my hair in a protective braided style, and that turned out super hydrated and healthy-feeling as well.) Highly recommend for anyone with hair like mine—trust me, it’s popular for a reason!!

Product: Sheamoisture Curl Enhancing Smoothie for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 20 oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Extremely sad as the products spilled all over. Out of the 3 tubs i bought, 2 spilled messily which made the unspilled one really greasy as well. Very upset and hope the seller can improve on quality control of product packaging. I ordered more from the same seller after this purchase and in the past as well. Giving this a 4 star as previous ones came in good condition and shipping time was good. Ordered on 3rd April, received on 10th April. But please improve on product protection in future and thank u for the hard work!As for the product itself, it does really well and leaves my curls soft and mangeable. I have 2c-3a hair

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: CHANGED INGREDIENTS! NO LONGER SULFATE FREE!!! DO NOT BUY
Review: Shea Moisture is still advertising that this product is sulfate free. You can see they changed the formula and have removed the NO SULFATES as well as removing No Parafin,  No Propylene Glycol (they now have alcohol in this product!!), No Synthetic Fragrance, No Synthetic Color, and No DEA . Super disappointed as I really loved the way this made my hair feel and now with the addition of more alcohols, more vegetable oil, sulfates and other less than ideal ingredients that I do not want to put in my hair. Companies are just getting greedy and trying to cut corners to save money but charge us the same for products that will do more damage than good. NO THANKS.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Works Great For Making Hair More Curly
Review: I'm so glad that I started using this product line. From my experience, this is the best hair product for making my hair more curly and less dry. I've tried a lot of hair products over the years, as my hair is dry, coarse, and unruly. I have a few calics in my hair, and it's always been challenging to style. Since the recent pandemic, I haven't been to a hair salon in some time and my wife has been giving me home haircuts. I've let my hair grow in the top and tried a number of hair products to make my hair curly. This product line is the best for my hair and I've purchased a number of their products recently. I find their products give my hair moisture and make it more curly. Love their products and highly recommend them.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Never again
Review: I can’t even speak about how this actually works because I can’t get beyond the smell. It’s terrible. Even using the teeniest bit of the product I got a headache from the icky sweet smell that wouldn’t go away. It’s way too strong and will overpower everything else around you. I literally couldn’t smell my food because of this stuff in my hair and everywhere I went people asked what was that “weird candy smell”?  The headache I had from using it lasted for days after washing it out. I’ll never wear this again. Do not buy!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Best Low Porosity Curl Smoothie
Review: Love this for my low porosity 4a/4b Hair. My hair is so soft, curly, and moisturized after using this curl smoothie. I also do the LCO method on my hair and it performs well. Even 2-3 days after a twist out, my hair is so soft!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Great product, but never getting it from them again!!
Review: I have been using this line of products for a few months now, and can attest to how great the actual product works. I also use the shampoo and conditioner that accompany this leave in conditioner and my hair is so soft and the frizz is down. I have a good hair day almost every day!!That being said, the product was opened before I even got it. It had spilled all through the bag it was in.I have pictures I will add if I can figure that out.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: This is a miracle product for curly hair
Review: I love this product! My hair is very long, thick, hard to manage and goes from being wavy and frizzy to very curly and defined depending on the day/weather and it’s mood. I’ve tried so many products at so many price points it’s exhausting and expensive. I don’t usually use anything on dry/damp hair or on hair that’s not freshly washed because it’s never worked for me, my hair usually just goes limp or gets crunchy or greasy. I kept seeing this product on curly blogs so I finally bought it. It took awhile to arrive so I had kind of forgotten about it by the time it did. First off, the container is HuGe! It will probably last me the rest of my life. For real. I’ve used it on my hair soaking wet before I get out of the shower (the curly method) and I’ve been courageous and used it on second and third day hair that’s gotten flat/frizzy. ITS AMAZING! On second and third day hair I dampen my hair a bit, apply a nickel sized amount to my palms and do the “praying hands” and my curls are bouncier and more defined and shiny than they have been in years! No crunch, no greasiness! It’s incredible! I didn’t know my curls could look so good. I’ve even done it in dry hair. It’s not as beautiful but it’s still quite good. The smell is wonderful as well.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: ALRIGHT, HERE'S THE INGREDIENTS Y'ALL!
Review: This item is the same exact item as they used to sell in the small tubes (kudos to you shea moisture for going more eco friendly!) I am glad I can just buy one big jar instead of a bunch of small tubes that are hard to recycle.I had asked a question on this listing, about the ingredients. Someone answered saying that it broke their hair off- I can say as someone who has used SHEA MOISTURE products for almost a decade AND AS A PROFESSIONAL STYLIST licensed in the state of ks that no, there is nothing in this product that would've damaged your hair. In fact, the reason why I love this product line is that I find it to be much better than a lot of products you buy at a salon!!!! Their products contain nourishing ingredients that ACTUALLY WORK. A lot of the pro stuff is overpriced, overscented, and just isn't really that great tbh. I love this one for my wavy hair, I put it in after showering and towel drying then I scrunch it and it has enough hold to bring out the curl but it isn't crunchy at all and leaves the hair feeling soft. I am also sensitive to fragrances, and this one isn't bad at all. Sorry to the person who had the damaged hair, but that happened because your hair was already damaged.Also, a note to the manufacturer, who also answered my question about the ingredients - saying that they were listed in the images. They are not, and in fact, your listing pictures state this product contains mushrooms when it doesn't. So you might want to fix that :)

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Damaged mess!
Review: A picture says it all. I'm expected to return this? The box arrived soggy and when I opened it I found out why. The conditioner was completely smashed open and a mess.I'm hoping I will get a refund but it seems I'm expected to send the product back.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Product was opened!
Review: There’s no place to upload a photo...but product was OPEN in package and Mesa was everywhere. Very disappointed, hoping for a replacement ASAP. Can’t rate on usage, only on product shipping. Reasoning for 1 star, hopefully I can use product in future and give a higher rating!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Moisturizer & curl definition product
Review: Great moisturizer! It defines my curls. It even tames my hair. My hair isn't frizzy at the end of the day and it's easier to manage when using this product. I use this product only when I wear ponytails; it gives it a really nice shiny slick look. I don't use it when I wear it free of ponytails because it's a bit heavy. I use other products for my natural curly bob. However, my daughter uses it for everything...her hair is thicker and she's a 3b and I'm a 3a not sure if that matters. I really dislike the smell but it doesn't bother my daughter. Hope this helps someone.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Creates soft curls!
Review: I scrunch this smoothie through my hair and it creates soft, wavy curls. It adds so much texture without making hair hard and crunchy at a great price!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Unsealed.
Review: I have used this product before and my rating would be a five however, this arrived unsealed which leaves me a tad uneasy. I know there's a chance it just got jossled in shipping, but it still runs me the wrong way you know?

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: A curly hair must
Review: This is a great product, my favorite for doing twists. It's extremely moisturizing to my 4c hair. Definitely buy if you have curly hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: My hair LOVES this smoothie!
Review: This is my hairs favorite product & I was so happy to get such a big bottle. I have never seen this size in the store so I was super excited to find this on Amazon. Shea moisture curl enhancing smoothie is a holy grail product of mine. I'm a Hairbox subscriber so I get lots of products every month but I MUST ALWAYS have this smoothie on hand no matter what. I love the scent, the thickness & the way it makes my natural curls pop.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Love it
Review: I have 4c hair and this softened my hair

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Absolutely Perfect
Review: THIS STUFF IS SO AMAZING. Omg like it just makes my hair look so damn good! I let my hair towel/air dry and then comb this stuff through and finish with OGX coconut curl mousse & it’s like magic. Before buying the bigger size I tried a smaller bottle of this stuff and for some reason the smaller bottle smells really weird; this one smells waaay better. I 100% recommend this if you have curly/wavy hair and want your hair to look smooth and frizz free!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: A miracle for my Caucasian curls without the grease
Review: So I've been experimenting with products over the years to tame my frizzy curly locks & have hated my hair more years of my life than I care to admit. But after moving to South Florida and having to give up the hair straightening iron due to 100% humidity down here I started a journey to research the best products for Caucasian curly hair. Because let's just be real here our curly hair is composed up differently and needs imo less greasy products. Every curly hair product I've found either was to brittle and drying or too greasy. I stumbled upon a some YouTube videos about this curly head method or something like that and one of them recommended this product. So what I do is I just condition my hair I use regular conditioner as shampoo and a deep condition once or twice a week to really condition. With head flipped upside-down soaking wet in the shower I apply a leave in, TGIN thank God it's natural makes a good one, then I apply this & scrunch a little to get rid of excess water. With head still upside-down I take a tshirt and scrunch the excess water out after I get out. Then apply a hard cheap gel with lots of hold scrunch more and wrap my head with the tshirt(search YouTube of how to use tshirt to wrap curly hair to dry). I let that sit on my head for however long anywhere between 30 minutes and a couple of hours not usually a couple hours I would say 30 minutes to an hour and then I let it all out and let it air dry or defuse the rest of the way when it’s mostly dry with a bout 80 to 85% dry I scrunch it with the T-shirt while it’s upside down and I put my fingers through like my scalp and I just kind of shake the hair and scrunch it kind of break it up if it’s hard at all  and then Wala it’s done. to me this is a miracle product I am in love with it I would never try anything else because I’m 100% happy with it for myself and my  curls. it smells so good my husband loves the way it smells sweet and fruity. I would say that I use a decent amount like I would say a tablespoon or so I usually scoop out a little on my 3 fingers for my medium length hair. It will feel slippery kind of but when is all said and done the look will look like the picture I uploaded. Obviously all of our hair is so different that’s why I did I mention in my title that it was for my Caucasian hair and I mean Caucasian hair is not on the same either but this stuff works for me, I would consider my hair normal as in not too greasy or dry. The curls as average not super tight kinky curls not really loose. if I were to just air dry my hair without anything it would poof out a little bit I would have some curl to it and it would look a hot mess with extra frizz lol. Hope this helps and if you still need more help with your curls I recommend searching YouTube. Good luck!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Smells DELICIOUS, But the Hype is Too High
Review: It smells GREAT, but that is about all that I can say about it. I bought this to help add moisture to my hair but it just made it greasy. I tried using it more than once because the fragrance is so sensational that I cannot bear to just throw it away. The first time, I used it right after my leave-in as a heavier moisturizer and layered it with my hair butter. My hair was greasy but dry the next day. The next time I tried, I used it instead of my hair butter, but my hair ended up just dry and not greasy this time. Finally I tried it without a leave-in and without hair butter. Still a no-go; it didn’t want to absorb right and was difficult to work in under all circumstances I have tried. What a shame; I just can’t get over the smell. I might just try mixing it with aloe vera to help with the moisture, but I can’t say it will change anything. I have to pass on repurchasing.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Very economical.
Review: I have used for 8 years now buying the 12 oz size.So this 20 oz container of the curl enhancing smoothie is very economical for $15.99 some places are charging that for 12 oz jar.I plan to buy 2 more jars.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Love this product!
Review: I can’t live without this! After washing & conditioning and lightly towel drying, I comb through my 2B waves with a very wide-tooth pick, them put a dollop of the Shea Moisture in my hands with a little water, rub between my hands then work through my hair repeating several times to cover all hair. My hair is pretty wet at this point. I then scrunch my hair gently with a microfiber towel and either air dry or use diffuser set on low. My waves turn out soft, shiny and with no frizz! On days I don’t want to wash my hair, I do the same routine but on dry hair that I have run through with the hair pick. I just use a little less product. Same result! Awesome. (Smells great too!)

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Smells great but product itself is not that great
Review: First time trying this product and I was not too happy with the curl cream:( I have been looking for a drug store product to replace the dove mouse that I used to use but not seems like it’s discontinued or the formula has changed .the smell of the product is absolutely amazing but that might be the only thing I love  about it , the product itself leaves your hair weighed down and lacking shine . I have very curly hair that needs something light weigh to keep the curl shape and maybe reduce frizz but this dosent do either :( I was pretty excited to try this after reading good reviews but sadly it’s a no from me . >>>picture with the blue sweater shows my hair with my old product and the first picture  shows hair with the sheamoisture cream <<<

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Who Knew?!!
Review: Alright, I’m one of the women who found this suggested on TikTok for white women’s curly/wavy hair.It works better than any of the other “curly” methods! It DOES take practice, but it leaves my hair curly and smelling better than those other products pushed on us!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Great for natural hair
Review: My hair is naturally curly and I like this product for the moisturizer that it provides my hair not to heavy and it holds my curls in place. I have used many products but I have found this to be the best. As well as the kids products I use those as well.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Not my cup of tea.
Review: I have curly short blonde hair that's a little damaged only at my tips even though I did cut it because I only died the tips blonde. But I bought this to bounce my curls after buying the shea moisture shine shampoo & conditioner..At first it worked than it started to tangle my hair & it become into knots that was hard to untangle no matter how much conditioner I applied to my hair. I cried while untangling my hair because my arm was killing me my boyfriend had to take over & even he had a rough time it made my hair become weird even more damaged. Than this smoothie makes my hair beyond itchy & it becomes hard & oily. It makes you hair smell funny. I had to wash my hair during midnight I couldn't sleep well because my scalp was so itchy from the shea moisture smoothie I couldn't stop itching. I'll stick to my Tressemme & Suave. They're cheap but they both work some wonders for their price.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Love!
Review: Love this product! The smell is a heavenly coconut, and it does wonders for moisturizing dry hair. The product is thick enough that it doesn't feel like it all dries up after an hour, so it ensures all day moisture and shine. Of course it still has that slight greasy texture to it and will definitely leave a residue on fabrics. It's a little on the heavier side, but if used sparingly it shouldn't weigh your hair down much.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Horribly package. Jars unsealed/could be anything in these jars
Review: Horribly packaged. Open jar and your looking right at product!!! The container had no sealant when I opened the jar. Product all over outside of container.I don't feel comfortable using this at all as I have no clue what's in these unsealed jars.I will be returning asap.Such an inconvenience

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: NOT SULFATE FREE
Review: This product is NOT sulfate free!! They advertise this as silicone and sulfate free but no where on this does it actually say sulfate free. I originally got this bc it was sulfate free but now I will not be using it. I don’t know if they changed their ingredients but there has been a lot of people also saying they took it out.. would not recommend

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Formula changed
Review: I haven't used this in a LONG time but I remember it worked well for my wash-and-go's. I did think it was strange that it was only $7 but thought maybe they lowered prices to compete since there are so many other brands out there now. But NOPE! That's not why.As soon as I opened it, I noticed it looked different, then it felt different on my fingers. I decided to use it anyway. My hair has now dried and I'm about to wash this out. Not even close to the same results.Did a search and found out they changed the formula back in 2020.Am done with you Shea moisture. Second time you switched out a product I really loved, and the last one damaged my hair before I realized why it was acting up. You also discontinued a third product I loved.Selling the company was the worst move ever. They don't care about black hair.I left 2 stars cause I felt its feeble attempt at moisture. But seriously, I'm done with y'all.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: An okay product.
Review: This product was a little pricey for what it does. I bought it because of an add that I saw for it. I feel like it works as week as some other products that are cheaper. The scent is good but not what I consider fantastic.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My Son teams this up with the same brand shampoo & the 2 work great together. The smell of coconut & hibiscus. It also has silk protein & neem oil which have great benefits for curly hair. He applies this on damp hair & lets it sit for a few minutes. This locks his curls & moisturizes his hair. Sometimes he dries it a little or lets it air dry. Either way he has found the product he turns to after a good cleansing. It has no parabens which is means this is a positive product for your hair. The story behind the creation of Shea’s Moisture is very touchy which goes back to 1912. This is a win win using both the shampoo & the smoothie. A quality product at a good price. A 12 ounce jar carries a lot of product & lasts quite awhile. It’s well worth what I play. My picture reflects what the product looks like as well as the story behind the creation of this product which I wanted to share. I definitely recommend!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: EASY APPLICATION
Review: 4/5 because the texture seemed different, I usually buy this on a daily but there was no seal and the consistency was more thick than usual. I would spray the hair with water and add this immediately. Overall it did its job and made my curls fluffy and shiny.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Love Shea products
Review: I usually pick this up at brick and mortar stores but decided to grab a bigger version because it's way cheaper . Love the scent and the fact it keeps my curls manageable and not weighed down . If I over use it my curls do become hard like a mousse but it doesn't flake and become nasty . Good product

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Frizz go away!
Review: Omg! This product is AMAZING. I have the type of hair that is not curly or straight. It is just A frizzy wavy mess. This product is very moisturizing and it keeps my hair so soft. I’m so glad I took the chance with this!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: For the hair that demands
Review: I have used this product for a little less than a year, however in that time I find it to be top notch. It is a heavy cream, so one must gauge how much to apply for your self and needs The fragrance is that of a natural oil(Shea butter)with coconut mixed in.There have been others who state that L’Oréal changed the formula and marketing toward the straight and Caucasian hair after they purchased the company. There was much uproar over this. Once again, it is a choice.My only complaint is with the packaging. There was one deflated bubble pack in a too large box. The lid was jarred loose and some product leaked out. Fortunately the lid did not come completely off. I find more often than not the Amazon packaging leaves much to be desired.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Most awful smell
Review: I really wonder if I got a bad batch because this is my first time using and it’s awful.  I never have issues with the way products smell. I don’t have a sensitive nose or mind strong scents. The scent of this is horrific like another person mentioned. I wish I had read what she said before I bought it.I put a little in my hair and I can’t even get the smell out of my hands. It’s everywhere. It’s like a really stale expired candy.Unless you’re going to shampoo your hair right after use, I wouldn’t recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Great product
Review: This product is reasonably priced on Amazon. It works wonders on your natural hair. I will continue recommending for such products to be packaged with a sealant. I want to feel that no one else has been dipping into my product or adding anything to it and then returning it. I don’t get that feeling when I receive a product without sealant. This may be a matter to be take up with the manufacturer of the product. Thanks

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Used to be great but now my hair hates it
Review: I used to love this product and it used to work wonders in my hair when I was in high school. Now my hair hates it and get dry after a day. The scent is great and the price is good for the amount you are getting, but I dont think I can use it anymore. I am still a lover of sheamoisture and will stick to their deep conditioners.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: leaves hair feeling silky
Review: the only product that gives my hair a silky feel.  My 4c hair just wouldn't absorb moisture at all. it generally feels  coarse no matter the product.  just tried it today and my hair feels moisturized and great. however, if you expect this to curl your 4c hair, that ain't happening. I will use this as a moisturizer.Update...I finally got the Curls in....but it only works when my hair is damp not wet.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Perfect for finer curls too
Review: My hair is a mixture of 3B and some 2B chunks and this makes my hair look AMAZING. Put it into wet, not damp hair. Don't be afraid to use a lot of product. It's fine to air dry or use a diffuser with. Usually, I let my hair air dry for a bit and then when it's closer to damp than sopping I pile it into a bonnet. Then when it's fully dry my curls are p e r f e c t. Literally never look better

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Mixed feelings
Review: I have wavy hair, dry hair that gets frizzy and I wanted something to tame it and give it a bit of hold. The cream was quite smooth out of the container, and I applied a small amount of it to my towel-dried hair all over and scrunched it to enhance the waves. The smell was overwhelmingly sweet and actually made me feel a bit sick but it may be ok for those who like a super sweet fruity scents. My hair actually dried nice and my waves became soft curls and less frizzy. That lasted around 2 days, around day 3, my hair got sticky, greasy, tangled and matted. I can usually go 3-4 days without washing as I have very dry hair, but with this cream applied, it goes from nice to greasy and horrible very quickly.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: My hair is so fly….
Review: I don’t know why it took me so long to suck it up and spend the 30 or so dollars to buy this whole line… OMG. I washed my hair after my subscribe and save arrived with the shampoo, conditioner and then used this on my curls in my hair looks nothing short of amazing. It doesn’t make your hair feel like there’s a bunch of product in it and it’s super easy to rub between your hands and either fall along the curls or very lightly scrunch it…No more blowouts for me I am rocking my natural curls and loving it!Also the coconut sent is not overwhelming at all

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Light-weight, smooth
Review: This product is really nice and makes your hair feel healthy and smooth. The formula helps create a nice natural wave to your hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Great for 4c hair twist outs!
Review: The negative reviews are coming from people with straight or non-curly type textures who don’t require oil or moisture. Not sure why they would think this work for them… oh well! It works great for 4c hair types and completely nourishes your hair. The 20oz size is a bonus!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: leaves a horrible film makes hair feel chalky
Review: I followed the instructions and put in wet hair.  I normally do fat curls to make beachy waves and my hair felt horrible.  I had to wash again after it dried I styled first then added a little coating and I like it.  My hair does feel very soft.  I wouldn't advise putting it in if you do any kind of styling.  after styling is fine.  Smells awesome.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: An OG Staple Hair Product
Review: This is my favorite curl cream, it smells so good and is very moisturizing. I have very thick high density hair, with curls and coils, a mix of curl patterns. I also do layer a gel after applying this product, my hair doesn't get crunchy though, it remains soft and I truly believe it's because of the moisture of this cream. It's nice and thick as well. The value of this particular one is excellent too, natural hair care can get expensive and this has always been an affordable product but to get this amount for the price is just *chefs kiss** I'm not heavy handed with product application, but I'm definitely not shy either, I use enough product for my hair to be thoroughly covered so the value is everything. My hair is low porosity and I style it in wash n go's, but this cream certainly can be used for braid outs or twist outs also. I will repurchase.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Best for coarse curly hair
Review: Okay so I have wavy hair and this is most definitely way too heavy for my hair type, but it works! If you have coarse hair, particularly very curly coarse hair, this might be a godsend! I have to use a tiny amount and fluff my hair up with texture sprays when I use it, but it does moisturize my hair extremely well. I will say that sectioning your hair out first and then combing it through with your fingers seems to work best for me!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: NEW FAVORITE CURL CREAM
Review: Have VERY curly Caucasian hair that had been dyed. This cream is so moisturizing and helps define my curls without leaving them crunchy. I have used many professional brands and this competes with those. Not only is it amazing quality but a little goes a long way so you’re not buying new jars every other week. Use it every day and it’s still over half full after a month. Oh and it smells amazing.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Silky hair
Review: I just took the plunge and tried this because of my good experience with other Shea (Black Caster oil) Moisture products. This one is quickly becoming my favorite. I like the lighter aroma and the silky feel, and the fact that just a small amount goes a long way. My hair is 3c,4a-or-4b or 4c ( mixed textures). I frequently twist out and wash & go, so this product works for both.My hair loves this!Get it. I am so glad I did!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Not meant for thinner hair
Review: My hair has been thinning as of late, and this stuff is not meant for thin hair.I have 2b wavy hair but because it’s thinning, this product is too heavy for me and it actually weights my hair down. I’m better off just using a leave in conditioner and a gel.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Easy to use TOO MUCH.
Review: Really, you'll be happier if you use 1/4 of what you think you will need. Then, comb it and comb it and comb it through. Spend more time massaging it throughout your hair and you think is reasonable. Then, let it dry and enjoy thicker curlier hair. To refresh, simply add a little water to your hair and restyle.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Great product....not great packaging
Review: BEWARE...this product is shipped without being sealed so if the cover comes off in shipment, you'll have a real mess on your hands. I ordered the first one and when it came unsealed and had leaked, I ordered another one. The product itself lives up to the manufacture's description and those who have given a great review of the product. It will leave your curls soft and manageable. The packaging is the problem.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Product arrived opened and with no safety seal
Review: This product arrived opened and without any plastic or safety seal to ensure that this was an unused item. It did not look new. I will be returning this item and I hope that the seller reads this and does not give this item to someone else. The scent is okay. I don't like too much scent in my hair products and this scent was tolerable.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Jar not sealed
Review: This jar was not sealed; therefore, I'm slightly concerned that someone may have used some of it before it was delivered to me. The box was taped, but the lid on the jar was not tight, and it didn't have the seal under the lid. Maybe Shea Moisture doesn't seal them the way they used to.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: What am I supposed to do with this?
Review: The bottle was open in transit and leaked all over the box. A complete mess! When I went to see about getting a replacement or refund, it wants me to return the messy bottle before I can get a replacement or be charged a second time!I am not cleaning this mess just to return the jar!! Absolutely unexceptable! There should be a solution to this problem by now, seeing as I am not the only one to have had this issue. I want my money back!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Best thing for my hair
Review: At first, the scent was a little strong but after a couple of uses I adapted to it. I apply it to damp/soaking hair and do the hair plopping method for best results. Once it dries it not crunchy at all and it leave behind a mild hibiscus sent. I've been using this product for well over a 2 years and I have not found anything better. I can use this on its own or with a soft gel to had more hold but it works fine on its own.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Smells amazing but use caution
Review: I like this product, but you have to be very careful to use the smallest amount required or it really weighs down your hair and makes it feel kinda sticky. That said it smells absolutely amazing. I usually use it sparingly for touch ups ok my curly and use something else for all over control to avoid that heavy feeling it can cause

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Interesting
Review: I bought this item in hopes to get my curls back after straightening my hair for so long. I put it in my hair after my shower, my hair was damp. When I woke up the curls were pretty nice, but the texture of my hair felt really weird. Every time I touched my hair it left a residue on my fingers, which I hated. I didn't like the texture of my hair. It took me two showers for the residue to get out. On the other side, my curls looked really nice the following days. I also really love the smell of these products! If you won't mind the texture of you're hair then this could really help your curls. (This was the experience with my hair, it might not be with yours). Also if anyone has any recommendations for other curling products please tell me.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Love it!
Review: I used this product on my 4b/c hair texture, and it worked well for me. I am new to natural hair and this curl enhancer made it much easier for me. I originally used the product with a denman brush, but the hair style came out poofy and fuzzy. After research I finger coiled my hair instead of using the brush and it came out perfectly. Overall, the product smells great and works well for me. { I also separately purchased and used their hold and shine spray and they worked great together!}

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Absolutely amazing for thick, course, curly hair.
Review: I can't believe I waited so long to try this product. I have spent so much money on products trying to tame and control my curls and have never been as happy as I am with this product. After conditioning my hair I use it to twist the curls and allow it to dry, then use my fingers to break up the twists and style. So easy and this works so well using the twist technique. The only wish the scent lasted a little longer because I really like it.I will definitely be purchasing this again!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Good value curly hair product
Review: My first impression was not terrific. I put this in my medium curly hair while wet and it left greasy residue.  I decided to try again though on my dry hair on a day I just wanted to style my hair without wetting it. This product worked great when smoothed through my hair dry, taming my frizz and defining my curls without making them greasy (a little goes a long way!). I took off one star for the scent because it has a sort of artificial smell to it, but it doesn't ruin the product for me. Altogether a great value and will be used by me much in the future especially on frizzy hair days.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Not the same product as before.
Review: I've bought this same hair product from Walmart and it seems to be a bit different as far as the texture of this hair product now so I believe it's not the same . Won't be buying it anymore from Amazon or Walmart if the product seems different from before.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: The product was old. It came all congealed, its supposed to be smooth and easily distributed in your hair. But since it was congealed it small beads throughout my hair so I ended up having to wash it all out and throw the product away. Ive used this product for years and this is the first time ive seen it like this. I'm EXTREMELY s disappointed the seller would send an old product.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Leaves a waxy residue
Review: The sent is nauseating. The product leaves a waxy residue after your hair is dry. It does leave your hair very moisturized. I will keep looking.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Definite Curl Holder!
Review: This stuff is a miracle it works great, amazing scent! It also smells really good every time I use it, I always get compliments on how good my hair smells. It definitely holds your curls and keeps them from frizzing while very moisturizing. Wet your hair and apply a good amount and rake it through. I suggest using a comb so you can easily separate the curls better for more volume. After doing this DONT TOUCH IT, let the hair dry and still don’t touch it or it will frizz!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Great for wash and go
Review: I’ve been using this product on my short thick and curly hair for years and people are always asking me what I use. It defines curls and eliminates frizz. Does not dry hard and keeps hair soft. My husband uses it too. Not the best moisturizer but Shea Moisture has other products for that.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Disappointed!
Review: Do you as a vendor and/or manufacturer believe that this terrible product is what I deserve, as a customer?  This product is horrible.  Cakes up and causes flakes.  Does not leave a sheen or softness to the hair.  I expected better!  This product did not come with a plastic bladder/tamper cover under the lid.  What kind of manufacturer omits such, in this day and social climates?  Just an abysmal, disappointing and pathetic experience with vendor/manufacturer.Having read this, Buy at your own prerogative!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Not for me
Review: I have thick curly frizz hair. I was looking for something that would manage my frizz and not leave my hair feeling nasty. I still had frizz and it left my hair feeling nasty for sure. This was an overall no for me

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: It really does enhance your curls!
Review: This was the product that helped me discover I actually had curly hair. I apply it with my hair being really wet (not damp but actually wet) and I section my hair. It is very thick so depending on your type of curl is the amount you should use. If you have a more loose curl you don’t need that much product. I recommend also using any of their Gels, they hold the curls for longer but they don’t make your hair crunchy because there medium hold. Since I discover this product I’ve I stopped looking for any other hair cream it is my one and only go to product. Highly recommend it!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: It’s a meh from me
Review: Really thick, i prefer the curl style milk because its thinner and cheaper. I am currently transitioning from Heat damaged hair and i am trying diferrent products. I have 3-4a hair, though I don’t know exactly my hair type. But I am only 13 yrs old so I have to economize my money. For its price and quantity it brings I dont really like but I do recommend it. I pair it with a gel and my hair looks good. Love the smell tho. It is overhyped though, i have mixed feelings about this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: NOT the same!!!
Review: This is a completely different product than what it has been for the past several years!! If you've been using this, beware that it isn't even remotely close to the same!! It now has a very noticeable and opposite effect. Waste of money!!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: my hair fell out
Review: I bought this product and two others, shea moisture black castor oil treatment masque for dry hair and shea moisture strengthen shampoo, used these products for month and my hair literally started to fall out. I discontinued these products and brought another line of products, the maui hair line products and my hair has stopped falling out and doing much better.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: More than expected!
Review: I got so much more in this jar than from any local grocery store or hair supply store for the same cost. I love this product. It mixes well with other gels & does not leave any white residue. It leaves the hair soft with a nice sheen. Smells good too.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Greasy and heavy feeling
Review: Very disappointed in this product.  It is very heavy and greasy...not for fine Caucasian hair.  It did not even make more curls.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Cheap
Review: This feels like it dries my hair out. Maybe Shea Moisture isn’t for me. I really wanted to try it because it was highly recommended and it’s definitely affordable but I guess I’ll have to shed the extra few bucks on other better quality brands because this feels like it was worth about the 8 bucks I paid for it.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Must-Have for Curls
Review: Finally! After 2 decades of straightening my hair with a flat iron, I decided to embrace my curls (3B). I tried many curl conditioners, but it was still too drying. Seeing all the rave reviews, I am glad I gave it a try! Truly moisturizing with shine. I use this with Shea Moisture Coconut and Hibiscus and you got a winner. The scent is heavenly. Will never use any other product!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Too heavy and thick
Review: This is very heavy and thick, it leaves my hair oily and wet looking. It isn’t even that great of a moisturizer as hair is still dry feeling with oil film. It also does nothing to enhance curls. I feel I will end up using this as a pre-shower moisturizer rather than a leave in. Positive is that it smells nice...

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Beautiful soft curls! New favorite product!
Review: I have naturally curly hair and have a hard time finding products that actually tame frizz like they claim or make hair too crunchy. This Shea cream made my hair look silky beautiful and the curls felt smooth like satin. I love this! It’s my new favorite product.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Easy quick and versatile
Review: I like it a lot. It is versatile quick,  and easy to use. Can be applied on wet or dry hair. Helps with frizz and with making waves in my wavy/curly hair look more put together neater shinier and wavier. I don't use too much of it at a time.  Less is more.  It's the only product I use on my hair to style it.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Not a exact product I’d use on my hair
Review: This product was good overall, I was all right with the silkyness and the scent. But after I had put it throughout my hair and after it had dryed, my hair was very dry. I didn’t put too much or too little even though it seemed that way because I had to add so much to my hair to get it moisturize that only half of the jar was left. To be honest it could have been my type of hair. Like that my type of hair wasn’t meant for that product but I did not have the best experience with SheaMoisture Smoothie curl enchanting

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Must-Have
Review: Curly hair holy grail right here. Moisturizing, defining, and it lasts. The only problem I have with it is that the scent it just not for me. I can totally see how others like it, though (It's sweet and coconutty but I don't like the smell of coconut). I noticed the best results when I used it right after I washed my hair when it was still very damp.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Amazing
Review: I'm so happy they have this size. I love this product. The smell is amazing and it does the job just right. Be generous when applying. My curls look amazing once it drys.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Love it
Review: I saw this product was recommended by Bretman Rock and I’ve been looking for a good hair product for my curly hair for a while so I decided to try it. I immediately threw out every other hair product I owned after using this because it’s amazing. This and their anti-frizz mousse is what I use now.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Meh
Review: Creates nice curls, but is drying. My hair needs moisture, but I found that if a add hair serum into a dollop of this product, it helps. Has a nice smell. Would not purchase again.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Works wonders on curly hair
Review: I purchase this for my son whose hair is extremely thick and very tightly curled. His hair absorbs moisture like a sponge, and this product helps with moisture retention. Also add shine and texture. I would recommend to others.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Poor packaging
Review: This product was delivered, and it wasn't sealed in any way which makes me really hesitant to use it. The lid was almost coming off and there was no seal to keep the product from coming out. It smells good though, which I knew right away because the whole box smells like it lol

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Sheamoisture should have left their products alone!
Review: Sheamoisture has changed something in their products. I used to LOVE them. Now I will not buy them. A real bummer.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Very nice
Review: Amazing product. The scent can be a bit strong so beware if you don’t like the sweet smell of coconut. But the product works just like the description says. It moisturizes and softens my hair. I’m a guy, I have a perm and it does a great job of eliminating the frizz and all around softening my hair. It’s also a very large amount of product. I’m on my second perm, and I haven’t even gotten through half of the product. This will last (depending on length of hair)

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Excellent product
Review: It works great on my daughters curling hair

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Does not moisturize
Review: This product does the opposite. It made my hair very dry, and lost its natural shine. I stopped using it after 2 uses.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: *This product has worked great Many but just not for me. It se
Review: Very different And I was excited to try it after seeing an enthusiastic video review of the product. Personally she’s moisture in general has not been good (at all) for my hair. I have split ends and the product really does not help to smooth or moisturize my hair very well. It has a different smell and after a few hours it’s not very appealing, in my opinion .

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: AMAZING
Review: OK this is an absolute game changer for me. I have been using a different leave in conditioner product for years and years. It worked pretty good but did not match up to this one even a little bit.This product smells so pretty it leaves my curls soft and shiny. This will definitely be a staple in my routine. I love it so much and highly recommend it

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Great for curly hair
Review: We have family of natural curly hair and we love this stuff it works amazing leaves your hair soft and beautiful

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Not what I expected
Review: The smell is amazing but it doesn’t make me have soft bouncy curls. It feels more like a hair gel consistency and my curls dry hard and not very well defined. I have 3b/3c and I don’t think I’ll be repurchasing.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: I love it
Review: I use it for my twists or my braids. Keeps my hair moist and shiny. Works well with wet line gel and smells great. I have medium length 4b/4c hair

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Works great
Review: I really like this stuff. And a little bit goes a long way. A couple parts of my hair look dry and don't curl like the rest of my hair, I put a bit of this on and scrunch it up, and it curls like the rest of my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Perfect addition to curly hair regimen
Review: Use enough product through whole head. Makes curl pattern perfect & moisturizes out frizziness. I rewet each morning (no washing) and May or may not need to add more conditioner. Perfect hair every day!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: The best for curly hair!
Review: I love this product!  I have curly hair and I use it right after washing my hair. I also use it the next day on dry hair to freshen up my hair.  It’s amazing!  I don’t use as much when my hair is dry..  I would start out using less then add more the next time you use it to determine what your hair needs!  Thank you Shea MoistureSmoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Not too much hydration on my hair
Review: In my case, I didn't obtain a great hydratation level. I have a dyed hair , no decoloration. I have used other creams that gave better results. I will no buy it again, but I think for other type of hair it could be good.The smell is very nice.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: No safety seal!!!
Review: Product arrived with no seal on it. Just had to contact Amazon for a replacement. If the replacement arrives without a seal or if the seal isn't completely intact, I won't be using that one either!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Awesome
Review: Love best leave in conditioner

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: No safety seal
Review: No safety seal. I asked and it's supposed to have one.  Came twice without it.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: TOO GREASY!!
Review: Way too greasy..made my face breakout and skin itch. I read the reviews b4 purchasing it and despite the alcohol and neem oil( pesticide) contents I thought I'd give it a TRY! But now sorry.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: This is my go to hair dressing
Review: I love this particular product, it has served me well. Makes my hair soft and silky and manageable. I really like these of all the products for natural hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: I have used this product for years because nothing else is as good.
Review: My hair is dry and naturally curly but like tends more towards unruly frizz than curl most days. This product sooths the dryness and tames the frizz while encouraging soft curls. It's quite simply magic for my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: So glad I found this
Review: I love this, my hair love it also. It has a scent but not unpleasant or strong. It's  moisturizing and makes my hair soft. I will definitely buy it again.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Definitely worth it.
Review: I have incredibly curly, poofy, thick, insane hair, and this cream is one of the amazing products I'm using to keep it from being dry and frizzy. It's wonderful. Would definitely recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Great for curly hair
Review: I use this product line for my long curly hair. It's the only thing so far that my hair really seems to love. I use the hair smoothie in between washes and conditionings.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Curly Hair Galore!
Review: I LOVE this stuff. I love it so much that my cousin (who also has curly hair) asked for it too, lol! It's perfect to not make your hair feel really super heavy but still gives it that nice buoyancy.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Curl Enhancer!
Review: Love it! It really helps enhance my curl when used properly! I distribute it through my wet hair really well, then dip my head in cool water, scrunch and plop with a towel! It enhances my curls great!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Crusty hair
Review: It doesn’t feel great. Yes, it does get rid of your frizzy hair but it also gives you crusty hair, and it’s very hard to brush from all the tangles and crust. I just use a little bit of coconut oil now to get rid of the frizz.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Scalp became an itchy mess.
Review: I used to buy this years ago no problem, but switched to the Yucca &Plantain shea moisturizer, since they discontinued that version. I bought this one again, this time it caused my scalp to break out into hitchy hives. They must have changed the formula since then. What shame. Do not recommend,  but it smells nice though.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Best stuff for curls
Review: Best product for curly hair ! Works awesome leaves hair soft and moisturizes smells good

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Moisturizing in textured natural hair
Review: Love this line I'm wavey curly, my daughters are wavy curly, kinky curly and spiral curls. This works in all our hair types even my husband who has kinky curly hair. I buy this line a lot.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: Smells Great
Review: I use this product after i get out of the shower to help increase the wavy/curls in my hair… it smells great but sometimes it dries and hardens sort of so that my hair is not actually dry or smooth

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: No more frizz
Review: Not to sticky.  Leaves hair soft.  I'm not getting the frizz.  Jar is huge and is going to last forever!

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: love it..will buy again
Review: we have all types of hair at our house and we all love it! finer hair use a little less...thicker/coarser hair..use more..makes nice natural curls without being crunchy.

Product: SheaMoisture Smoothie Curl Enhancing Cream for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free and Paraben Free 12 oz
Title: TOP 10 REVIEWER
Review: This Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus Curl Enhancing Smoothie w/ silk protein and neem oil is actually a LEAVE IN treatment, not rinse out. This is according to the directions on the container. The product description on this Amazon web page says differently. Here is the exact working on my container:"Section hair and apply product sparingly to damp or dry hair. Do not rinse out. Style hair as desired. For best results, use as a styling cream for twist-outs, braids and wash-and-go styles. "I assume a change at some point. So I just wanted to clarify what you will be getting in terms of directions.It is a lovely product. I imagine it is extra great for those with tighter curl patterns. It seems to both moisturize and provide a little hold. Calms frizz. I happen to have a mix of textures. Some straight, some wavy, some cork screws. I have long nearly waist length hair, so much of the curl is pulled out from weight. Any shorter bits curl rather tightly. I would include pics, but at this time the photo loader isn't appearing on my screen. I will keep checking back as I did take pics of the bottle as well as my hair. EDIT: came back to add pictures. Sorry, the cap to my bottle was broken and I keep contents in with plastic wrap and a rubber band.It is a 12 ounce container, and since a little goes a long way, this should last awhile. I have used it on wet hair, and I have used it on dry. My hair is a little crunchy once it dries on dry hair, haven't felt that when it has been applied to wet. It is a good (for me)  SCRUNCH & PLOP product. After shampoo & conditioner, I get out of shower and lightly towel dry hair (either with towel or cotton t-shirt). I bend over to let my hair hang upside down, I emulsify a bit between both hands then scrunch it in. Scrunch scrunch, scrunch some more. Then between the pre towel drying and the scrunch action, my hair is semi dry. I then plop it into a t-shirt for a bit to help hold the scrunch. OR, if I was one to use a hair dryer, I would then proceed with that. Keep scrunching. It doesn't dry crunchy, so not much more is needed.  I would consider a light hold gel on top to continue to the scrunch and to help it hold even further.. but all that added stuff is up to you. It is totally nice on its own- whether for super curly hair, or even as a nice smoother for straight to lightly wavy. Run a little over your hair to keep fly aways in place and to help control frizziness from humidity.I've always had good luck with Shea Moisture products. Quality formulas at a budget friendly price. I would recommend this. I think it is versatile enough to be worth a try.
