Review: Ich finde das Produkt ganz OK. Es riecht ganz gut und meine Haare sind auf jeden Fall gut hydratisiert. Es ist aber dennoch Recht teuer

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Masque for Dry Curls Coconut & Hibiscus Hair Mask with Shea Butter 12 oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Wow my hair lovesss this! And the smell is amazing

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Masque for Dry Curls Coconut & Hibiscus Hair Mask with Shea Butter 12 oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Me deja el pelo suave, volveré a comprar

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Masque for Dry Curls Coconut & Hibiscus Hair Mask with Shea Butter 12 oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Muy bueno deja el cabello suave

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Masque for Dry Curls Coconut & Hibiscus Hair Mask with Shea Butter 12 oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: El producto es falso!

Product: SheaMoisture Hair Masque for Dry Curls Coconut & Hibiscus Hair Mask with Shea Butter 12 oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Voici dans quel état j’ai reçu ma commande. Il manquait la moitié du produit qui s’était déversé dans le carton…

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Best thing that has ever happened to my hair.
Review: Life changing. I am 34 and all my life I have never liked my natural hair. It air dries ugly and any product I have tried with a diffuser was a heavy fail. So basically I have straightened my hair for as long as I can remember....UNTIL NOW!!This magic foam is epic! I never thought a hair product would change my life but this one did. It's so incredibly light weight, you feel like there is nothing in your hair. I get volume and definition without any of the drawbacks of normal products.I follow the directions of a guy on YouTube named Brad Mondo, he recommends basically saturating your hair with the foam to the point it sound crunchy like you didn't wash the shampoo out. Sounds weird but it works.Given how long my hair is, I probably use about 35 pumps throughout my hair before using a diffuser, possibly more. This gets me about 5 uses in a bottle. Worth it.I am kinda bummed my second bottle doesn't pump foam as well, it's much drippier but it still works.MY METHOD...So what I do is saturate my hair with the foam on 50% air dried hair, diffuse it switching between low hot and low cold and then I spray a few sprays of sea salt spray when I'm about 75% done. Keep diffusing until completely dry and BOOM. Glorious, voluminous, unexpectedly fabulous hair!Hot damn I feel like a babe. I'm sold for life, I've already purchased extras so I never run out.Life changing. Buy it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Overall a good product
Review: This product helps with frizz and definition but doesn’t hold by itself. I just ordered a gel to use after applying this. Also if you have fine 2B/3C hair, I wouldn’t recommend following the directions for how much product to apply- it left my hair limp and greasy looking. just one pump per side works best for me! Overall I’m happy with the product- smells amazing, makes your curls defined/frizz free, but doesn’t hold.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Good product but not best if you want something to shape the curl
Review: I have very curly hair, like thick ringlets. I love this brand but this mouse would probably work better for less tight curls since I usually like my mousse to shape the curl and this one is not thick enough to do that. It’s more of a watery foam. Good scent and does help with frizz but simply not great for my personal hair type. Probably won’t purchase again but would most likely work for someone with wavy or loosely curly hair :/

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: FRIZZ FREE, CURLS INTACT & FABULOUS SHINE!!
Review: LOVE LOVE LOVE this product! I had very straight hair growing up as I got older my hair started getting curly (I grew up having perms put in my hair twice a year) My hair was straight as a pin and very thin Now it’s curly and thick! My hairdresser recommended this brand After I couldn’t find it at my local drugstore She said check Amazon I use the SheaMoistue for curly and thick hair in the Shampoo,Conditioner, the Frizz Control It has a wonderful scent leaves my hair soft and manageable and as with the shampoo & conditioner you don’t need very much to get the job done with EXCELLENT RESULTS!! I LOVE EVERYTHING about this line and would HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS! (Not to shabby for a white girl)

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Love this and all healthy!
Review: I will be using this from now on! It works for my hair, my daughters hair, and my husbands African hair! Great for the whole family and it’s super healthy! I scanned it into my “think dirty” app and it’s in green which means super good and no toxic ingredients!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great product
Review: For me, this curl mousse works wonderful! I have naturally wavy thick hair and it always does the trick. Unlike other mooses, it doesn't make your hair crunchy.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Love it!
Review: Leaves my hair feeling soft. My hair is rather thin and this product leaves my hair feeling light and enhances my kinks and waves in my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Exactly what my hair routine needed
Review: I have been using this line of products for a while now, but just started adding this to my routine. I put it into my hair when it is damp and then let my hair air dry. This product helps control my frizz perfectly without my hair getting crunchy!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Curly Girl Appreciated
Review: I love Shea Moisture products for my curly hair.  I just want to be upfront that I have very pale skin, wavy and thin dry curls. What works for me isn't always going to work for everyone. I have tried over 20 different products/ brands trying to whittle it down to what really works for me.  So my biggest issue recently has been that I want to be able to either air dry my hair or diffuse dry my hair without it looking and feeling dry and frizzy. I also don't want something that has a chemical smell, makes my hair crunchy, greasy, or has parabens and sulfates.I tried most of the other Shea Moisture curl products but none of them have been perfect enough except for the conditioner/ shampoo.  So I wanted to give this a shot. This has been the best one so far for me. Be careful and only use a little until you know how much you really need because it leaves your hair shiny so if you use too much it will make your hair look wet or greasy. A little goes a long way. There is absolutely no frizz or dryness. For now, this is exactly what I wanted and it's affordable which is a bonus.It definitely smells really great and is very light weight and does not add crunchiness but my curls are still really defined and hold pretty well.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not recommended
Review: I liked the enhancing curl smoothie & the mask. But, this product was a disappointment. My hair went so dry and looked unhealty.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Frizz free!
Review: This product has changed my hair! I have beautiful curls without the frizz!! Magic 🎉🎉

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Obsessed!
Review: I LOVE this stuff! I just had a baby and don’t have time to blow dry/curl/straighten my hair all the time anymore and wanted something that brought out my natural curls and waves without damaging my hair. I was also worried about it being sticky like most mousses, nope! It brings out my natural curls, does not get frizzy and lasts for days! If anything I can just touch up the next day. Plus, I love this brand since they don’t use bad chemicals in their products. Worth it!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Light enough for Caucasian hair
Review: This works nicely on my 2b/2c Caucasian waves/curls! It's light enough where it doesn't weigh down my hair. I put it on wet and then add a little more when I refresh the next day.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: A luxurious must have for all curl types & everything in between!
Review: I'm not sure what "sheerness" or "thickness" have to do with a hair product, especially this one lol, buttt... This product is a liquid, and comes out as a simple foam mousse through the pump. I have used this for years, and it works fairly well to keep my crazy curls maintained and in tact. It smells like coconuts and fresh fruity something, like when you walk into a Bath and Body Works, only not overpowering. I have always gotten complimented over the years on how I smell "like a fruit bowl" or "coconuts" when I'd completely forgotten to put on deodorant or used perfume or scented lotion in those crazy high school mornings LOL hopefully you get it: IT'S THIS STUFF, IT SMELLS JUST THAT FAB! I don't have a specific hair type sadly, I've got a little of everything, it's wavy, curly, and coily in different spots, and this stuff helps with ALL those types all over. It also helps lock in moisture too, and makes it feel hydrated, soft, and smooth, and helps keep the frizzies at bay. I would totally recommend for anyone who has CURLS or coils or a mix of both, sorry but wavy hair doesn't need much hold so I wouldn't recommend because I don't see how it could benefit. I suppose this could help with frizz control for wavy hair, but curls and such, definitely a must to try out, I would highly recommend, it has never disappointed. It also doesn't leave much of a sticky or greasy feeling. Just be sure to apply after spraying your hair with water or when it's slightly damp after washing, or you might think you need more product and put too much in(then it will feel sticky). Remember: a little goes a long way! Give this stuff a whirl for your curls, you'll be dreaming of white sandy beaches and baby crabs and coconut drinks and palm trees swaying in that salty breeze :)

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Good luck with packaging
Review: Should have listened to the other reviews about the packaging issues. Luckily mine didn't leak but, it's completely missing the clear cap that goes over it. Shouldn't there have been a seal to have kept the cap on? Cap isn't even in my box at all.Scent smells good but, for all I know someone just mixed coconut oil and water together and put it back in this bottle. Haven't used in my hair yet but, the stars only come from the good smell and the fact it didn't leave my fingers sticky.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not for me
Review: Perhaps I'm not the target hair type (thin, fine, wavy) for this product, but I bought it because I thought it was curly-girl approved. Maybe it works for other hair types, but for me it does nothing. On the positive side, it didn't do anything BAD to my hair. It just... disappears. I've tried in almost dry hair to style, as well as putting it in wet hair to try setting it. Nothing.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Love!
Review: First time using mousse - my hairdresser recommended it to combat frizz (I have very thick, long, 2b/2c, extremely frizzy). I am never looking back- not only did I not have frizz, but my hair was so wavy and soft, the texture was even and not stringy. I usually just use oil but I’m NEVER going back to my old routing after this!!! Put it into very wet hair, let it air dry, and voila. That’s literally it!!! (No residue, very light scent, and dried on softy even though I put a lot in my hair, did not dry hard like gel)

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Love this lightweight curling foam
Review: I truly love this product. It is so lightweight and doesn't have any hold power so its not crunchy. It creates the perfect curls without looking wet. Again, it doesn't have any stay or hold power so if you want the curls to last, use hair spray. The curls will relax throughout the day even with spray. My hair is extremely challenging because its thin, wispy, no volume, very fine. Its frizzy when I iron, when I hot curl, when I let it air dry. I have been using moose for the last few years but brands vary soooo much that its hard to find a good fit but it still looks wet when defused. I don't care if curls relax as long as its not frizzy. I will be a returning customer. I do wish there was a refill option to reduce plastic and do I don't have to order so many individual bottles.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Frizzy Curls
Review: I'm not a huge fan of the texture it leaves in my hair. For me this has just been okay, but I hope I can find something better in Taiwan.I usually opt for curl creams rather than mousses, but I tried this since I moved to Taiwan (a place known for humidity). If I place this on the crown of my head it leaves a texture and if I massage it to get rid of the base-like texture then my frizzies come back.My partner has tighter curls than me, this does not do well in his hair at all. While walking his hair just falls apart and goes limp. He has tried using more/less and his hair either clumps or just frizzes terribly.I have been pairing this with conditioner until I can hopefully find a cream in Taiwan that can hold our curls well.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Don’t waste your money
Review: If you have curly hair and need something to help with frizz… do not use this. It doesn’t help at all

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Empty bottle
Review: This have never happened to me. The product has arrived as empty bottle.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Very disappointing
Review: After reading all the great reviews, I was hoping this would be just what my hair needed. Sadly it left it feeling like straw when it was dry. I don’t know what happened to the moisture.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: After reading other reviews, I did NOT expect it to provide any hold and it did not. I wanted it for the frizz control, which it did. I have very thick frizzy Hawaiian hair. My hair usually responds well to coconut oil and shea butter so I thought my hair might like this product. Unfortunately, while controlling the frizz it made my hair look dull. It was not oily which is good but I don't want dull hair. It is liquid in the bottle, comes out as mousse, but as soon as you put your hands together, it returns to liquid. I do not see the point in the mousse effect if it's going to be applied as liquid. I also don't like strong fragrance and this has a pleasant mild fragrance.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Didn't work for me
Review: Tried this several times over the last few weeks on wet, damp, and dry hair with and without diffusing. I have medium length, low porosity, fine, high density 2a hair hoping this mousse would be a light weight style product to enhance my natural waves. I used about 6-8 pumps every time on my hair while scrunching with my hands  and every time my waves just fell after a few minutes. It doesn't hold my hair at all, prevent frizz or fly-aways, or give my hair more volume. I suspect my hair isn't absorbing the product like it should. Instead, I found a gel that works better for me. Most likely will not be buying again.I give 3 stars because it will probably work for some people, just not for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Fantastic product for dry hair
Review: I have been using more and more sheamoisture products, moving away from Giovanni to something more natural that works well. This mousse is fantastic. Smells pleasant, combs in nicely. However if you have a lot of hair you need A LOT of product not the 4 pumps they say not he bottle. Minimum 6 for me if my hair is already wet right after a shower. Also add a pump on the comb and work it in if you have issues with tangles in your hair. Otherwise I'm 100% recommendinf this. Also look out for other sheamoisture products at bulk stores like Walmart and Costco they have big bottles for a cheaper price that standard sizes at other stores.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Good But Not For Me
Review: The product smelled really good and I was so excited to use it based on the good reviews. Unfortunately, it made my hair feel extremely greasy. It was so greasy to the touch that it was uncomfortable, and didn’t provide my hair with much hold since it had no cast. I have 3b-3c curly hair and unfortunately, I had to return it because it made my hair feel like a grease ball.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Light weight curl definition!
Review: Works great!I have over processed bleached hair that I love to dye different colors. Because of all this abuse my hair is dry and brittle. Its usually difficult for me to bring out my natural curl without weighting it down. But this stuff really works!It smells great and makes my hair shiny with out it looking greasy.Also, most products contain so much alcohol that it will make my hair color bleed onto my hands while applying. This mousse does not have alcohol that causes my fantasy hair color bleed or run.It you want a light, curl defining, hold buy this!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not an anti-frizz product!!
Review: This product actually had a drying effect rather than a moisturizing effect. I braid hair regularly and braids that would have lasted significantly longer, looked horrible just a few hours after application.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: I’m done with all Shea Moisture products
Review: This product is water and fragrance than anything. It comes oilut as a thin watery foam and it had absolutely no affect on my hair. It doesn’t feel or look like it contains anything other water. I smells decent but who cares if it doesn’t work. This was a last ditch effort to use Shea Moisture products because it has been recommended on so many occasions.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: GREAT frizz control!
Review: I rarely write reviews, but felt compelled to do so for this product. I have waist-length very fine wavy hair, and lots of it, so my hair's often frizzy. It's also colored and highlighted, so dryness is a concern. I usually use Redken's Frizz Dismiss, but wanted to try something new. The Sheamoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control is exactly what I need!!I use about 10 pumps (again, waist-length hair) and spread it throughout, then "crunch" my hair to activate the natural waves. This product makes the waves much more defined and smooth with zero frizz. I love it!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: No es buena calidad
Review: Creo q es una copia. Llevo un año comprando ésta marca y es excelente. Pero el de este vendedor no se parece en nada a no que llevo usando.  Su olor no es agradable

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Frizz control without sticky heaviness
Review: This is of foamy consistency and it's light , yet it smooths and holds without heaviness or "crunchiness." I have horribly fine, wispy, thin hair with a tad of natural curl.  This stuff is great:  it holds without heaviness.  I run it lightly thru my hair and then scrunch up from ends to roots.  Sets and holds a natural curl ( even with bad hair).

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great Product!
Review: This product is absolutely great for anyone with curly hair that is usually too thin or fine for gels! It's light on your hair, but still helps create the needed cast around your curls to help them last throughout the day. Highly recommend this to anyone looking for a good mousse to use!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Love SheaMoisture, not so much this mousse
Review: I live this brand - I have their shampoo, conditioner, deep conditioner (smells so good I was to eat it), etc. But, I am underwhelmed by this mousse. I don't find it does much to help my hair find and hold it's wave. And it still gets frizzy. For now, I haven't found a styling product I like better than Devacurl or Keristasse Curl Manifesto.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not  a styling product but does make hair feel moist.
Review: I have very curly hair that tends to frizz in humid weather.  This product was recommended for curly hair styling.  Not as advertised.  This may be the worst styling product I've tried in 20 years.  If you want to look like Phil Spector during his murder trial and smell like a pina colada, this might be for you.  It just doesn't define curls or hold hair at all.  It did leave hair soft and frizzy instead of dry and frizzy but I won't buy it again.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Ineffective - does NOTHING for my hair
Review: Honestly does nothing for my hair, no matter how I use it. Extremely light weight - maybe thats what makes it ineffective.. seems sometimes like its just an empty, airy product. Like your not putting anything in your hair. And it certainly seems that way.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: So light weight, doesn’t work!
Review: I love this line of products, but this particular product does not hold my curl?!  What’s the point!  By the time I got to work I had to braid it down before it poofed up anymore. Like I used nothing. Very disappointing.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great definition without being heavy
Review: This smells soooo good, first of all. I gave it 4 stars because my bottle had a defective pump, but luckily I was able to decant it into a different mousse bottle and try it out. The mousse itself gives beautiful hold without weighing down my fine, low-porosity hair, and the silk protein doesn't seem to be a problem even though I typically avoid protein. I apply while my hair is soaking wet and it dries beautifully with nice voluminous curls.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Very nice!
Review: I like it a lot!!!! It really enhances my waves/curls, and it smells really nice. The only thing is that you have to be really careful not to put too much on any piece of hair, bc then it gets that crispy (idk if that's the right word lol!) texture like you get from hairspray. Overall this is a great product though, I use it almost every day :)

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great product with safe ingredients
Review: Wow this stuff really seems like the holy grail of curly hair products. I got it when I noticed that the stuff recommended by my salon contained DMDM hydantoin, which is a "formaldehyde donor known to slowly leave formaldehyde when coming into contact with water". I'm so happy I had to replace the old stuff because this new mousse works so much better (and is a lot cheaper too).

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great addition to my wavy girl routine
Review: I follow the curly girl method. After the squish to condish phase I apply some curling cream, followed by this product. I get pretty good hold, without being crunchy. I apply quite a bit as I then wrap my hair in a turbin to remove excess water and than apply more if needed. It leaves me with defined waves and curls. I will continue to use this.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: AMAZING!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Give this stuff 10 stars.
Review: I don’t have a single complaint about this product. It is so incredibly light, which you can tell the minute it hits your hand. My hair is thin, wavy, and very prone to being frizzy. It controlled my frizz and I can’t even tell I have anything in my hair. It smells good. 5 hours in and it’s NOT drying out my hair. Seams every product I use sucks the life out of my hair. This is great!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Smells good, but does not work
Review: The smell is great. As far as working, it did nothing. It did not help my curls at all. Still frizzy, which is a huge let down

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Perfect for lighter weight hair
Review: Tried this on my thick coarse hair and it was only moderately moisturizing. I will stick to Original Sprout Curl Control. For my daughter’s thick fine hair, it was perfect and easy for her to apply herself. Smells strongly of coconut, which is pleasant if you like that beach vacation smell. :)

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: My go to
Review: My go to favorite product for my hair. It works on different types of curls so I’ve recommended it to my friends with loose curls to tight curls. Plus I’m weird about strong scents, and it has a light scent so I’m a happy camper

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: I'm not sure how to feel
Review: Honestly, I don't love the product, but I don't hate it. It's a cheap product, which is great, but it doesn't really get the job done. It does de-frizz, but if you're looking for it to hold your curls, you'll need to combine it with another product. The consistency is pretty watery, so you don't really notice it's there. The smell isn't strong, it's subtle and pleasant.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: It lays your hair very quickly and doesn't flake!!
Review: I didn't understand the power of styling mousse like this after braiding my hair bit now I am a true believer. This stuff does not need to be reapplied very often, doesn't flake weirdly or smell strange. It dries very quickly, like not even a full hour if wrapping time needed and it keeps the hair shiny and slayed for quite a while. I love this mousse!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Product too cloudy…
Review: Product appeared tampered with or old …slimy liquid on outer container (but does not appear to be from other product purchased) and liquid content inside appear cloudy. Tried but was unable to contact Amazon customer service via phone or email. So product remains unused in package received  because I’m sure if product is safe to use. And the inconvenience of returning this product to Amazon just makes returning not worth it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great product,  but...
Review: I buy this mousse all the time at target, but bought it here for convenience. The bottle was wrapped with some special grip label so that it doesn't leak. The product did not leak, but the label was extremely difficult to get off! Took at least 5 aggervating minutes!! It was wrapped around multiple times and all crinkled. Couldnt get scissor under it and can't use a knife on a plastic bottle. I lost my grip because the stuff is so strong, knocked over my coffee and then had to clean that mess.  I think I'll make the trip to the store and spare myself the aggervation.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Does nothing for frizz
Review: I will say the product smells amazing, it adds nice volume to your hair and a little structure but does absolutely nothing about the frizz. If anything I think it makes the frizz worse, I will not be buying again.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Doesn’t Quite Foam…….It’s Runny
Review: I’ve purchased this in a drugstore and it came out in a thick foam. This is part foamish and clear like in the bottle.  I tried cleaning the pump in case it was clogged.  Didn’t help. Not sure if it is old product. It left a dullness on my hair after it dried.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Las Vegas cold dry weather
Review: My daughter has thick corse heavey wavy hair.  Her hair was feeling dry frizzy and brittle. After applying this to her hair and wrapping it in a old t-shirt her hair returned to her natural curle and it keep her curls for days. Amazing how dried out her hair was. She would apply this to her hair approximately every 3 days after washing her hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: .My mousse
Review: I typically purchase this product at brick and mortar however the last time I wanted to purchase it was out of stock. I'm a fan of it. It's not bad on the sticky texture like a lot of other brands. The best use for me of it, is when I combine a portion with water in the spray bottle. It does wonders when I'm wearing my hair wavy or braided up.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Okay
Review: I purchased this to use on my wigs...It was okay, I did like that it was not sticky, scent was subtle and pleasant not overbearing but I'd rather stick to my argan oil mousse cuz it offers softness and shine for not only my wigs but my natural hair as well!!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Doesn't Weigh Hair Down
Review: I have caucasion wavy hair that can get frizzy.  Love this product!  This is the first mousse that I really like!  It helps me keep my Curls without stickiness or or oiliness.  Keeps hair light and bouncy for days.  My daughter (who has naturally curly hair) also uses this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Too light weight
Review: Purchased this so I could let my hair airdry and not fuss so much with it.  It ended up being too lightweight  though and my hair just kind of fell.  Didn't like the results.  Also not so sure the scent was anything that great - I was expecting more based on the reviews.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Different ingredients
Review: Different ingredients on bottle than online, not sure if its the real deal. Also, why is liquid yellowish.  But my hair did feel soft after using this but no shape at all, just flat. This is not creamy foam, its liquidy like soap. Not for wavy hair, too heavy.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Perfect for natural curls
Review: My 9 year old has beautiful curls, and I have finally found the perfect curl quencher in this foam.  This Foam, leaves her curls looking bouncy and moisturized.  I am always using Shea Moisturizer products on her hair, but this is by far my favorite.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Maybe not for bleached hair
Review: My hair is bleached and fashion colored pink, I have a lot of natural wave and I wanted some definition, this just felt sticky, and made my hair feel stiff no matter how little I used. I agree with reviewers that say you need to shake it to get it to foam, I think my hair might just be too damaged, and the product was too heavy for it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Smells great, a bit watery
Review: This stuff is great for curly hair if you are trying to avoid chemicals and dryness. It is a bit on the watery side, but it smells really good. You need to use a bit more than the average mousse as it is very thin and light, but I have used 2 bottles of it now in 13 months, and I am going to keep using it to control frizz.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Lightweight, good for wavies & thin hair
Review: I love this curl mousse for my 2b/2c/3a hair! It’s lightweight and is slow to cause any product build up.I use it mostly for refresh days when I don’t want to overload my hair with product!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not for me
Review: I was hoping for a product that helped moisturize (at least a little) as well as style. This product left my hair feeling like straw and I had a lot of breakage with it. I love this brand and this line but I won't be ordering this again.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Game changer for my wavy hair
Review: I got tired of straightening my hair all the time so I bought this product and their conditioner for curly hair in order to tame my waves. With both these products, I just wash, condition, scrunch, let air dry halfway, apply mousse, and done. Instant waves. I absolutely love these products.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Recommend!
Review: Both of my kids have thin curly hair. One has curls between 2A and 2B. My other child has 3A curls. This works well for both of them. Tames the frizz, keeps their hair soft, minimizes tangles, and smells good.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: No safety seal
Review: I didn't appreciate my mousse already being opened and no safety seal at all... seems like a warehouse deal that I didn't get a warehouse price for...

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Item arrived very damaged with no cap
Review: The mousse itself is great but unfortunately the item came very damaged with no cap resulting in a scratched bottle and some leakage.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Weighed down hair and curls
Review: More watery unlike a typical mousse. Weighed my hair and curls down. Wanted a change from normal routine; even coworkers commented that my hair wasn’t as big and bouncy.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Soft hair
Review: This stuff makes my hair soft and touchable not sticky at all.. I have curly hair and it always frizzes, this manages it.  I don’t get as much of a curl with this mousse as I do others but I love the softness it gives my hair and the no frizz

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Didn't work for me
Review: This product is very watery. It just saturated my hair. Not a mousse at all.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Review: I’ve been using this a short while I have frizzy curly hair that goes out of control. This in my hair after I dampen it. Does amazing things. I was able to dry shampoo and do that to get a few more days of an actual hair style. Not just a bun. That is amazing. It’s not greasy and the shine is perfect!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: I really wanted to like this stuff, but...
Review: I really, REALLY wanted to like this stuff. It didn’t do anything for my hair except make it smell good. I have long hair (navel length) so maybe that’s part of it, but still frizzy over here. Been looking for a mousse-like product that’s made cruelty-free to replace the store brand garbage I’ve been using for years. This isn’t the winner.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great lightweight mouse for curly hair
Review: Likes…lightweight, does not pull in my hair or feel sticky.Dislikes I need to use at least 8  pumps to get the curls to stay in my hair. I have medium-fine natural curly hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Amazing
Review: I have about 5 of these hair products from this company and I use it  every day the scent is amazing great with my hair and really gives me a confident boost I also read a story of how they came from very intresting and unique Love this product !!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not vegan.
Review: Product is not vegan like advertised. It contains silk.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Works well for me
Review: I needed something that was a light mouse that I could get from a pump due to the arthritis in my hands. This is perfect and is working well to replace my previous brand of mouse. Perfect idea. Great product. Mild scent (important for my asthma). My hair does very well with the product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Love It
Review: I use this for my twist out. The product is light and not sticky. The scent is awesome and very subtle. Not too loud. I use this product weekly and a little goes a long way!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Worst ever!!!!
Review: This is the WORST product I have EVER used! Absolutely NO HOLD whatsoever.  My hair looks like a GIANT fluffy frizzy disaster.Naturally curly hair so want a natiral feel but this is AWFUL! For you hairs sake do NOT try!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Wont buy again
Review: I really do not have much to say about this product. My hair still looked frizzy after applying. I have used better products. Only good thing is that it is lightweight and smells fine. No I will not be buying this product again and I bought a couple bottles too.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Love this
Review: Super moisturizing and defines my curls beautifully. No overpowering scent and extremely lightweight. I do go through a whole bottle in two weeks though, thank goodness the price is cheap.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not for me
Review: I just don’t like it. I don’t like a manual mousse pump the product doesn’t stay puffed when it comes out and it’s a runny mess. It doesn’t do anything for my curls. My hair looks fluffy with no hold. I returned it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: OMG YES!!
Review: This completely transformed my curls after just one use! No frizz and such beautiful curls made with this product. I am very impressed and surprised, especially because this is so affordable!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Don't feel like touching my hair after
Review: After 1 hour of the application my hair are frizzy again, also at that point I didn't feel like combing my hair with my hands. Had to apply it multiple times to avoid frizz. Not good as claimed imo.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: It’s not bad!
Review: This mossue not back. I liked its hold Bc After doing my hair it’s not a film on my braids like the gel which gets in my parts.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Left my hair dry and frizzy.
Review: Was so excited about this when I read the description but it immediately left my hair more dry and frizzy than it was.  Disappointed .

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Good for type 2C curl.
Review: This is perfect for those of you, like me who have type 2c curl. It’s light enough not to weigh down the curls but bold enough to hold the shape. It does seem to dry the hair a bit.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not What They Said
Review: Not happy with this. Feel like I was fooled.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not strong enough
Review: I have thick hair and a lot of it. This does not hold my hair. By 10 AM, my hair is frizzy. I think it’s an ok product, but doesn’t work great on my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Buena calidad, buenos resultados
Review: El vendedor es muy responsable, el primer envío presento un inconveniente e inmediatamente lo reemplazo. Recomiendo tanto el producto como al vendedor.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great for curls
Review: First time user for my natural wavy curls. Light weight and keeps my curls bouncing.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: had high expectations
Review: shea moisture makes great products but this one is not it. makes my hair feel gross and the mousse itself is really watery and doesn’t have the same texture as other mousses. it’s been sitting in my cabinet now for months because i don’t like it

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Alivens Lazy Curls
Review: SheaMoisture Curl Moose brings to life soft curls that have become lazy with the passage of years and allows me to bypass the hait damage of a heated curling brush. Now I can just shampoo, hand fluff, and go.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Helps with frizz
Review: Encourages curls. For my 4c hair, I use a leave in conditioner, then a little oil to seal after applying this product. Helps with frizz but does not eliminate completely.  However, does any product eliminate frizz completely? :0)

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Curls
Review: I am still not sure if I like this for my hair living in Fl with the humidity and curls it is hard, but soft for my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Didn’t come sealed at all
Review: Arrived with no cap or seal. Smells like coconuts but weighed down my curls horribly. Not sure it’s the accurate product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great for frizz
Review: I have extremely curly hair and this controls frizz in a way that is healthy. All I will use for now on.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: WORKS for perm rods on mixed hair!
Review: Loved the results of using this mousse with perm rods. Hair looked and felt soft and moisturized for DAYS! Love.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Works well
Review: Overall I like this mousse a lot. I wish it was a little more moisturizing, as my hair gets overly dry which is why I wanted to try this in place of gel. But for the most part, I like the results.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not sure i should trust the content
Review: Box arrived with the Mousse top part showing out the box, didn't have any cap nor was packed on a individual bag, no seal or anything to protect or at least leave a reassurance product couldn't be tempered. Everything else on my order was fine but that bottle easelly someone could have mixed something and rebottle. Smels good but not sure if I'd be using it

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great to apply several days in a row
Review: Love this moose!! You should know it is very lightweight and doesn’t have a strong hold, but it is great for those of us who don’t wash our hair very often :) I can apply it several days in a row without my hair feeling weighted down, which is a huge bonus not to have to wash the usual moose gunk out.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Love love love it!!!
Review: This is by far, THE BEST MOUSSE for dry curls that doesn’t weigh them down or leave your hair looking wet, sticky, and stiff. It has just the right amount of hold to prevent my curls from frizzing but still allowing some volume and bounce to them. I absolutely love it and will continue to use in my daily routine!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: El envase vino vacío
Review: El producto recibí vacío. El envase parece usado porque la etiqueta está pelada. La caja en la que recibí no está húmeda ósea que el producto tuvo que haber salido vacío. Una vergüenza.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Awesome Product
Review: I use this particular product all the time when I want the natural curly look, because of my hair texture nothing else actually works besides this product line.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: It’s okay...
Review: It didn’t really handle the frizz but if you want something natural with a soft smell then it is fine

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: A Good product!
Review: I like most of every product I’ve  tried of Shea Moisture. They work well for what they are suppose to do. Satisfied!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Nope
Review: Did not do anything for my hair. I might as well have just re-wet it. Also, not a fan of coconut smell.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Doesn't control frizz
Review: I love the smell of the product, but it comes out foam and sticky. I used this at least three days in a row but no changes to hairs shine or frizz

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Just buy it
Review: I love this stuff. I just ran out of my 2nd bottle so I ordered a 3rd..then a 4th the next day because I forgot I had already ordered it. The fourth bottle I received did not come with the lid though, but it appears to be unused.Update: Ordered it again and did not receive a lid.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Good for frizz, but has no hold
Review: It doesn’t really have hold, but it’s good for frizz control. It’s nice to use right after washing my hair to moisturize it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Moisturized curls
Review: Great product for Roller sets, or just freshing up those dry curls. I like how the product doesn't leave a residue nor buildup.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Well worth the money
Review: Very light, doesn't weigh your hair down at all. Stops tge frizz in my curls and leaves my hair very soft. So glad I found this.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Left my hair oily
Review: Just left my hair oily and as for curl —left lumpy.I do not recommend it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not anything
Review: No hold, does not keep hair from frizzing it is like putting on water!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Smells good
Review: Smells good and adds texture

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great product to start your day!!!
Review: This product smells amazing and something about products that smell so good just makes for a better day!!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not for me
Review: I have fine textured curly hair- this product doesn’t work for me. Dries it out and frizzes up. I love their other products like curl smoothie- that really helps the moisture content.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: good!
Review: It’s so lightweight doesn’t give me a cast but a good lock on my waves.  Definitely good to get that beach low maintenance look.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Perfect to crunch your hair with
Review: I had cut my long hair decided to try this. It is perfect for making curls!!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Ok
Review: Leaves a residue feeling on your hair and if you use too much it will look like you scrunched it in the early 2000s

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not worth buying.
Review: Does not work as well as other products like curling smoothie. Using it and bot using it gives same results.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Good lift for your hair
Review: I was looking for an alcohol free hair product that would ca my hair a bit and lift on top. This is as good as it gets for an alcohol free product. I also have a had time with toxins and Shea moisture is a wonderful product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Love it
Review: I like that it doesn't leave my curls hard and it's not heavy. Leaves my curls soft,bouncy and shiny.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Not for me!
Review: Too sticky in my hair. Didn't care for it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Best mousse around
Review: I have curly hair and I use this mousse to hold my curls. It works like a charm.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Genial
Review: Hace los risos más definidos los fija y no te pone el cabello duro

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Just eh
Review: Not the best, product for me, weighed my hair down, I have thin hair

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Curls look nice
Review: Curls look nice but it leaves hair feeling dry… might want to try it with a curl moisturizer

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Smell great! Stops frizz.
Review: Keeps my hair from frizzing! Smells fantastic and doesn’t leave residue on my hair or scalp.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Leaves flakes!!
Review: Leaves too much fakes and white stuff in hair.. it does leave your hair soft but too much white stuff ti have to keep picking out of your scalp and hair during the day not worth it and I didn’t even put a lot in!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Good product
Review: My daughter has curly hair definitely define the hair .. apply on wet hair

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Love
Review: Paired with the smoothie cream and some gel, it works amazing for my curls. Definitely recommend & will buy more when I run out

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Mejor espuma
Review: Para retocar los rizos es excelente. Amo este producto

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: not for curly
Review: not for very curly hair

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Fresh Air For My Hair...
Review: Not the empty bottle chile...

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Didnt love it
Review: I did not love it. Very watery and seemed to dry out my hair

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: It works
Review: This product does work , however if your in Texas you know the heat will make all hair types frizz. This keeps my hair from frizzing for about 3 hours indoor and 30mins-1hr outdoors.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Makes hair shine and hold it's body.
Review: Easy to apply and makes hair shine and wasy to manage.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Just as described
Review: Good product works as described

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Non drying
Review: This mousse is wonderful! It is NOT crunchy and drying. Great for us curly girls. Great for human hair wigs as well.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Very nice!
Review: Still learning how to style/manage my daughters curly hair but this stuff is awesome so far! No frizz and super soft curls! We loved it!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Just ok
Review: This is ok.  Still leaves hair frizzy. It’s not a thick mousse it’s foamy watery. I probably won’t by again. I love many of their other products though.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Still have frizzy hair
Review: It doesn’t work on my thin blonde hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Smells nice but I can’t tell much of a difference
Review: It smells rlly nice and is light but I can’t tell a difference for my hair

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Very light weight
Review: Very light weight and smells good!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Doesn't work, head full of frizz
Review: I was very excited with the reviews of this product, however I've used it 3 times and it leaves my curly hair so frizzy.  Disappointed.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Softness
Review: Great for fine hair, very few tangles.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Good stuff!
Review: My curls look amazing with these products!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz

Title: Works on Dreadlocks
Review: Product works well on dreadlocks, much to my surprise! Definitely a winner. Smells great,  light weight, moisturises the hair well. One pump goes a long way.Applied it to my damp locs, then put it in Bantu knots overnight.  I was surprised at the definition. Curls held up pretty well.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Awesome

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great for fine curly hair
Review: I have very fine hair, and my curls fall/dont take very easily. Most products such as gels, lotions, and other mousses are way too heavy and leave me with straight but poofy hair. This is the only styling product i trust to encourage my curls and keep them going (since my hair is so fine i have to refresh every day/every other day). I have tried so many different products and this is the only one i have stayed with for 10+ years, along with the shampoo and conditioner from the same line.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Wonderful product for thick curly hair
Review: I have super thick curly/wavy hair, partially wavy and lots of corkscrew curls. This is wonderful. Not crispy crunchy old school mouse. It comes out of a container in sort of a soft wet foam rather than the old style super thick foam. It offers a soft hold and well defined air dried curls for my really thick hair. LOVE IT.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: No joke the best hair mousse i’ve ever tried
Review: I LOVE THIS STUFF. My hair is naturally very wavy, but also VERY frizzy. And with my hair getting long, it’s been weighed down a lot so the waves haven’t really been holding with my usual Gariner mousse. BUT THIS - this mousse is lightweight, but SO effective. It doesn’t leave my hair stiff, and hold natural shape so beautifully! Will continue to buy - 10/10

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Absolutely not
Review: NOPE. My hair is a spiral curl. This is what I got from this product. Zero definition. It’s frizzy. Never using it again.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Meh for 2b/c hair
Review: I ran out of my garnier curl mousse and picked this up to try something new. Love the smell but it doesn’t give great definition/hold for my hair type

Title: Container Opened, Can't Return
Review: Bottle looks as if it opened and spilled or was with items that spilled but product still used. Though full, label is sticky and appears old. No option to return. All I could do was cancel my "subscribe and save". With no way to know whether previously opened, having no tamper proof plastic, I'm very uncomfortable with using product on my hair. BUTTER BEWARE!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz

Title: Works for curly hair

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Perfect for braids.
Review: Perfect for wash day with braids. I use this after wash/conditioning my braids and then put a wrap/scarf on my hair for at least and hour. Keeps the frizz down and my braids stay looking fresh. Braids one month old in pic posted.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Finally!
Review: Finally I found a mousse that suits my 3-A/3-B curls! It's not heavy, sticky, crunchy, but keeps frizz under control.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great product for long lasting, frizz-free curls
Review: I used to use the deva curl foam, which I do love, but is super expensive. This works just as well for a fraction of the cost (and contains as high quality ingredients, if not higher, than Deva curl). I apply it in the morning right out of the shower and my curls are still intact and frizz free at the end of the day.Also, personally I like that the company uses fair trade ingredients in a lot of their products. Definitely worth supporting an ethical company, especially when the product is *genuinely good*

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: I think I like it!
Review: Oooh...first day trying it, and for my fine hair, this works nicely! Curl are held softly and full, but not frizzy.  My curl tends to draaaaag down easily with a lot of products, but this feels light and nice. Only one day in, but I look forward to trying it for day 2 hair, and also perhaps with some other smoothing or curl-defining products. But I could definitely see this being something I use on its own often!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: So soft curls
Review: I bought the shampoo, conditioner, style & curl milk, and this mousse. I’ve always hated my curls because I’ve never found products I love. Well I love these and leave my hair to air dry and not up in a bun all the time now. My hair is not super thick or tight beautiful curls but wavy and frizzy. Especially in this Florida humidity, sometimes straightening your hair is a waste of time. Every time I use these products I feel like it enhances the curls. And they are so soft still, not all stiff and crunchy. 🥰😍 Also love that there is not a strong scent.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Will buy again!
Review: I put it on wet, dried non crunchy! That never happens. Super soft, no frizzy crazy. I don't think it really has a smell but works so good. No bad ingredients like alot of things we buy. You should definitely try it!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Lightweight and holds well without flaking

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Exactly what you want it to do!!
Review: Native American hair, wash every two days and use this daily on my wavy hair. Never greasy the next day. Smells sound and feels lightweight in your hair. I use on my hair only when it's dry though, just for frizz in the mornings

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: The equivalent of putting foam soap in your hair.
Review: This product was the consistency of foam soap. I bought it for a trip to Mexico after reading that it helped thick dry hair with the intense humidity. I also purchased because other reviews commented on how nice it smelled.  The product I received was the equivalent of foam soap.  It did nothing to block the humidity from frizzing my hair.  It felt like once the product dried it evaporated completely from my hair.  I have very thick wavy hair that is hard to manage in humidity and I really had high hopes for this product. I was definitely disappointed. It is not at all a mousse and it is also not scented at all.  I will say it is very light weight, but I am convinced that this is because the product is actually just foamy water.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Frizzy
Review: Leaves hair very frizzy.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Soft Curls Without Going Flat
Review: Light pleasant scent. Controls frizz, leaves your hair soft and touchable for perfect curls. I have naturally gray hair with some curl. SheaMoisture Mousse been perfect for my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Chris are soft snd no frizz !
Review: Love this for my curls . No frizz and curls are so soft ! Scent is awesome !

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: My hair was fried off after having hair down to my waist
Review: I wanted to replace my mousse for something better, and after coming across another review about a woman in her 30s using this I thought why not give it a try. It has been a little over a year my hair has been fried and I’ve been trying to let it grow out, feels like a bristle brush I cry every time I look at it my hair was my identity. I had my hair in an updo for my wedding because it was so damaged. I used this stuff in my hair and WOW ITS NEVER FELT SO SILKY SMOOTH I WANT TO CRY. Gonna stock up on this. I blow dry it afterwards to give it a beach wave effect but it doesn’t have much hold at all since it’s so lightweight so I add a little hair mousse just to keep the texture. Add to cart, close your eyes and place order I’m telling you this is the best thing you could ever do for your hair. You’ll realize after your next shower how silky it feels!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Great product
Review: liked it a lot used it on my braids

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Meh…
Review: Very light weight, which is fabulous for curls, but it just didn’t give me much frizz control. I didn’t notice any difference in using no product vs using this product. Also, the whole bottle was used up in two weeks. For me, it wasn’t worth the price.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Used product
