Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Lightweight but doesn’t work very well in my hair
Review: I have very damaged hair due to many dye jobs, so I was hoping this would help with my frizz out in Hawaii. Unfortunately for my hair, it doesn’t control the frizz much, and the frizz it does control is only stuck together. However on the positive side, it smells great and feels lightweight in my hair, so it may just be the fact that my hair is trashed already that it doesn’t work for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl Mousse for Frizz Control Coconut and Hibiscus with Shea Butter 7.5 oz
Title: Back for my 4th bottle
Review: My stylist wanted a bottle, so I surprised her for Easter early!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Make your curls Pop and Shine
Review: This product is very moisturizing and excellent for natural hair styles and wash and go. I would recommend this product for type 3b 3c, 4a Hair. I used it instead of gel to really make my curls pop. After deep conditioning I add leave in conditioner to damp hair and then a detangler. I add this product last and comb through with my fingers and let hair dry and defuse and my curls pop for a week.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have 2c-ish curly hair, and though this product can be heavy, I find that if I apply it to freshly washed hair that I've only just squeezed the excess water out of, and apply in moderation then it works really well. I'm very sensitive to scents and so a lot of the other leave in products are out based on scent alone, this is one that I am not allergic to and so it's my go-to. My hair is waist length, thin and fine, and I use about a large grape sized amount. I use prayer hands to apply it and then comb it through and scrunch. Then I put my hair in a microfiber towel for about 10 minutes and I find this is the perfect amount & procedure for my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: The best curl cream I've ever had.
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   I have naturally curly hair and I am trying to get it back to being healthy, so I'm doing the curly girl method. I was using cantu curl activator, but got this because I couldn't order the other one on Amazon during this time.Well, I am so glad that I did! This cream does a much better job. It moisturizes my curls very much, and it even adds bounce. I have included a video to show just how bouncy it makes my curls!In addition, it has a very strong coconut scent. This might be a bit too strong for some people, but I love it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: It works miracles ❤
Review: Listen ive only had this product less than a half hour. Only tried a small amount about ten minutes ago and here I am writing a review. The scent alone won me over but the instant change in my hair speaks volumes.  Its just that great my hair is soft moist and smells like paradise if thats even a scent. I cant wait to shampoo and condition with the products tonight and and get the full experience. I didn't rate the drying properties yet because my hair isnt dry at all. If they mean did it leave it wet the answer is no but its really moist as in not dried out then 5stars it is. And i have extremely dry hair as in m6 hair usually drinks products and be dried out in no time. Not with this. I highly recommend l.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Great product
Review: Great product- softens hair and holds curls!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: REALLY wanted this to work
Review: I have been on a "curl journey" and have been searching for the perfect leave in that was affordable. I REALLY wanted this to be the one. I have 2c/3a hair thats super frizzy and coarse and so need a lot of moisture but this was overly moisturizing and left my hair feeling weighed down and greasy (which never happens). I tried to use less the next time I used it, but then it just left my hair frizzy. Also I had read people having trouble with the bottle and I totally agree, i didn't think it would be a big deal but it's so hard to get out of the bottle, I had to take the cap off with my second use.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Daily Moisturizer
Review: Ive been using this product for years. I use it as an intense moisturizer whenever I wash and dry my hair. After I dry my hair its still generally moist, I then use this to start my moisturizing process.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Smells and works great!
Review: Amazing smell! One of my go-to’s for curly hair. Moisturizes and doesn’t leave my hair dry.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: May be too heavy for some types of hair
Review: This smells wonderful, but it is super thick & difficult to get out of the bottle. I have 2b wavy Caucasian hair & purchased this based on positive reviews from a different website. I used a small amount on freshly washed, just out of the shower hair, and let air dry. This left my hair sticky & gummy. It was not moisturizing but also didn’t leave my hair crunchy. It was just very heavy & made my hair feel & look dirty from the heaviness of the product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: White hair? You need this.
Review: I used to be a mall 'Santa'. My hair was a little salt and pepper so I had my hair bleached white. Eventually, I learned how to bleach it safely by myself. I haven't been a Santa Claus for several years now but I still bleach my hair. I think it looks good that way and I get lots of compliments. Of course, I use a 'blueing' conditioner periodically to keep the yellow out.But, a couple of years ago I found this product. I found that after washing my hair and before using a gel to style it, I can work in SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk and it not only makes my hair a beautiful bright white, but it also makes it easier to style...even using a low temp hair dryer....to style it into shape before working in a little gel. It works so well for long white hair...and real beards...that I wrote to a large 'Mall Santa' providing company I formerly worked for and urged them to memo all of their more than 300 'Santa's with information about using the product.  It smells great...coconut and hibiscus....and is great for your hair. Not sure but I would guess it would be nice for hair that's other than white, also.  Try it!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Holy Cow and WOW! UPDATE
Review: No matter how many products I try, I keep coming back to this curl milk! It’s wonderful. It’s moisturizing. But most importantly, for me, it blends with my favorite gels!! YAY! Life is about the little things... I’ll keep this curl milk as my little thing.  (UPDATE):  After two purchases... COME ON SHEA MOISTURE!  Put this milk in a different container.  Why do I have to cut the damn top off to get to the product?  Can't you see this milk is TOO THICK for this packaging.  I (we as customers) need you to do better.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: 100% for thick hair
Review: I can’t get enough of any Shea Moisture product but if you have thick, curly hair you don’t need to make another purchase but Shea Moisture. My hair holds curl for almost a week with no curling iron or rollers to deal with. The shine and feel of my hair since using this product is extraordinary. I use the shampoo, conditioner and smoothie together and also condition my hair a couple of times a month with the leave in conditioner. Stop buying those other brands because this is all you need for healthy and curly thick hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: The best thing for curly hair!
Review: I have never used a product like this before. I have curly hair and use conditioner. Typical, I would use moose and or gel to manage my style. I wanted something that was lighter, not sticky, and wouldn’t make my hair oily and last All Day!!! I read reviews and decided to order. I googled style milk and curly hair style tips and I have to say….. after showering i towel dry my hair. While it is still damp, I place a dime size dot in my palm and work through my hair. A few tips said that I could use a gel AFTER adding a milk or leave in moisturizer to get a wet look and that’s does seem to work. This leaves my hair soft, light and smells like coconut. If you add too much, it will make your hair oily but you just have to find your right amount. I have had this a few months and my hair seems to be in a better condition and it doesn’t seem like I’ve used hardly any out of the bottle!!! Definitely my new hair secret!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Too thick, weighs hair down, dries it out.
Review: Very thick ! Had to store it upside down and squeeze very hard to get any out. Also too heavy for my thin, wavy hair . Makes it sticky and knots it when I try to run my fingers through. I even tried mixing some with water and putting it into a different container.Did nothing for moisturizing and actually caused drying and frizz.I was really shocked, because I usually like the products from this brand. Very disappointed .

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Yes buy it
Review: OMG I love it. It smells so good and works great.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Works great, smells even better
Review: I love this stuff. First off, it smells AWESOME, which is truthfully one of the most important metrics for me when it comes to hair products. I usually apply it on wet hair just after getting out of the shower, scrunch and plop for a bit to get some of the water out, then diffuse on cool, and my curls come out much shinier and better defined than if I do the same routine without this product. Well worth the money I spent on it and will definitely be getting more when I run out.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Works pretty good for my 2b/2c hair type!
Review: I bought this cause it was cheap and I needed to get away from cantu. Cantu is the only styler I've ever used and this one is way better for me. I saw the reviews and was a little sceptical but it was 5 dollars so I didn't have much to lose. The scent is not overbearing to me I think the cantu smell is way worse. It's smells like a calm coconut scent not really like dryer sheets like people are saying. It is kinda hard to get it out of the bottle but it's fine. It doesn't weigh my hair down and it definitely does moisturize my hair. There's not so much dryness in my hair and my curls are actually defined. I thought this wasn't gonna work on my hair type but it really does!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Not good for my hair
Review: This product made my hair very hard

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Is this Actually White Glue?
Review: I wanted very much to like this product. I wanted it to make my 3C curls smooth, soft, shiny and defined. Well, I really disliked this product. First, it is so thick that it cannot be dispensed from the  bottle. I could not squeeze it through the cap, I could not squeeze it with the cap removed. It is almost a solid. Not a liquid. I had to mix it with water to get a usable consistency.This product does NOT leave my hair feeling moisturized, at all. It leaves my hair feeling slimy, coated and heavy.I would not purchase this again. The packaging alone frustrated me so much that I was already furious by the time I finally managed to get a tablespoon of this goop out of the bottle.I do not recommend this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: This hair product gives my hair LIFE!!!
Review: I love this curl and style milk!!! It helps tame lots of unwanted frizz and enhances my natural curls... All you need after adding this to your hair is some moisturizing oil (argan, avocado, almond, and or coconut oil to name a few) and curl defining gel... Then braid or twist your hair, leave it on for a few days, and take it down. Before you know it, you will find yourself with well defined curls and waves that'll last for over a week.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: I must've gotten a bad batch
Review: This conditioner was so thick it wouldn't come out of the bottle even after letting it sit upside down for days on end.  I even left it in hot water for an hour and nothing.  I had to take the cap off squeeze the bottle hard for clumps of conditioner which was not creamy.  It was dense but it didn't moisturize my hair.  If anything it left it dry and hard to untangle.  The shampoo wasn't much better.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Absolutely, LOVE this product...
Review: This is the only product that I have found that tames my curls. I have naturally curly, unruly, frizzy hair. All of my life I have struggled to find a great hair product. I have found it with SheaMoisture curl & style milk. It smells so good and leaves my hair soft, silky, smooth, and best of all it tames my frizz. I have tried so many other products that say that they will eliminate frizzy hair, however, they either leave my hair feeling greasy, oily, or they will work at first but as the day goes on they ultimately fail. I have been using this product for about 6 months. I wanted to make sure that the product really worked for my hair and it has exceeded all of my expectations. I recommend this product to all my friends, family, and anyone I think would benefit from using it. I definitely suggest purchasing this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Your curls need this
Review: My hair was a frizzy mess. This stuff has saved me from hassling with taming my frizz all day. It keeps my curls together and my hair looks healthy! It’s magic in a bottle!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Great product for curly hair
Review: I really love this product but it is so thick that it will not come through the little hole in the dispenser top so I have to unscrew it every time and store it upside down. Having said that, it’s a great product at a reasonable price for those of us with curly hair. The smell is very pleasant without being overwhelming.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Eh...
Review: Purchased because I was trying to use the line of products for my son's hair (I have the shampoo & conditioner combo, plus curling creme). Didn't expect it to be so thick.Didn't seem to do much to his hair.  Leaves a bit of a film.  I've also tried dilute it in some warm water to make it more like a spray.I'll try again to see if either way works (out of bottle and as diluted solution).I've also ordered the mousse to combat frizz, will see if it works.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Greasy, heavy, overall ineffective
Review: Pros:Smelled pretty niceA little goes a long wayDoes enhance curlsCons:Very greasy productLeaves your hair heavy and flatCurls/waves only last about an hour or two because I have fine hairOverall:I have very fine but thick 1B-3B hair and this product did not work for me at all. It left my hair greasy and weighted down. While my hair did curl to some degree with this product, my hair became frizzy and lost definition with the use of this product. My hair is simply too fine to have this product but it may work for other hair types. Overall, I would not recommend this product for individuals with similar hair types to me. I will be returning this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: New recipe perhaps?
Review: I know a product consistency can change based on weather and temperature but it seemed like the overall recipe has been changed. It's thicker and denser. It used to be thinner and runnier. But now it's heavy and leaves a white cast. And I've used this on me and my daughter's hair (she's 4a and I'm 4c). It used to penetrate our hair and moisturize it effortlessly. Now, it's like a thick custard that'll just sit on top of the hair to seal in moisture. I'm extremely displeased with my purchase. I also mixed it with purified water and am not still happy about the outcome.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Best Shampoo!
Review: I would love to see a larger bottle with a pump possibly. I am allergic to many shampoos. They give me sores on my neck or a sore throat. This shampoo is the best ever. Smells beautiful, moisturizes but doesn't leave hair weighed down. I'm not allergic to the scent or ingredients. It won't destroy you if you get it on your face or you forget to rinse some out. It gives beautiful curls. My guys keep getting into my shea moisture products. Shea Moisture is my favorite!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Decent
Review: I have very long 2A/B hair & started the CGM back in September. My hair seems to like this more now that it's winter, in the warmer months it didn't seem to do as well with it. I've used it as a leave in just by itself without styling & it seems to help my curl memory. I've used it underneath a few other stylers too & it works well. I don't need a ton, maybe a quarter sized amount for my entire head so it's lasting me a while. The smell is nice without being overpowering.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Change the container
Review: I love Shea Moisture! I’m just not feeling the squeeze bottle because the product isn’t one you can just shake gently and the product pumps through. I have to hit it, shake it, and squeeze pretty hard and then still have to take the top off to get the product out which wastes too much time and energy. I have arthritis in hands and a bad shoulder so this is torture. Maybe change the container to a screw off top.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Incredible effective product!
Review:
Video Player is loading.Play VideoPlayMuteCurrent Time 0:00/Duration 0:01Loaded: 100.00%0:00Stream Type LIVESeek to live, currently behind liveLIVERemaining Time -0:01 1xPlayback RateChaptersChaptersDescriptionsdescriptions off, selectedCaptionsCaptions off, selectedAudio Trackdefault, selectedFullscreenThis is a modal window.



   I'm currently growing my hair down to my butt and it's 3/4 of the way there and I have tried every anti frizz serum on the market almost and had found this by accident but tried it anyway and so far it's been the best product that I ever bought for my long thick wavy/curly hair!! There is no such thing "as a little bit goes a long way" with super long curly hair and expensive ass hair serum or thick conditioner. My hair is so thick and so frizzy. I am constantly fighting humidity in the Midwest but also want long beautiful healthy hair that isn't dry dull and frizzy or greasy from "serum" or stiff from too much mousse and gel. My hair just soaks up this product and it looks absolutely beautiful all day I no longer have to use hairspray either or mousse just the hair milk while its wet/damp and go. No frizz. No greasy dirty weird shine. Just pretty natural looking healthy shine and its ability to moisturize all of my hair every day is amazing! The conditioner is incredible as well!!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: High Quality and Adaptable to Different Hair Types
Review: I have fine, wavy/curly hair, and I love using this product after I've showered. It helps define my curls and eliminate frizz without being stiff or greasy. My husband also loves using this in his beard, and we recently began using it in our daughter's very fine thin hair to prevent tangling and knots. The value and quality of this product has been incomparable among the products that I've tried over the years.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Love this!
Review: This is the first product I have tried that actually separates the curls in my very curly “white “ hair!! Can’t say enough good about it!!My only negative is that it’s impossible to get it out of the bottle! Even squeezing with all your might barely gets anything out! It would be much better in a jar!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Too thick
Review: It's just too thik/conditioning for my hair. I expected the coconut smell/scent even though it's not my favorite. The stuff is so thick it would barely squeeze out of the bottle. My hair felt like I was using mayo. I'll still use about once a week as a deep conditioner and wash out in morning. Can absolutely not use this for during the day wear.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Always comes rancid.
Review: I have bought this product more times than I can count, if I had to estimate, probably around seven or eight times, because as far as moisturizing goes, it does a pretty good job. That said, it's incredibly thick and heavy, and it has ALWAYS come with signs of going rancid. I think its a problem with this specific product, opposed to the actual seller, as I've bought it in store as well as from the official Shea Moisture website. It always comes slightly oxidized with a strong "wet dog" and "play-doh" smell to it, that to me, makes it borderline unusable. Oils going rancid isn't a massive threat to your hair, and as long as it's not moldy it's technically safe to use, but when I can find products that perform better in a similar range, I'm not sure this ones worth it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Amazing Product
Review: Highly recommend! I have thick, wavy hair. It gets frizzy easily but most curl products leave it feeling stiff & weighed down. This stuff is amazing! It provides exactly what I need without leaving my hair feeling like I have a thick buildup of product in it. It smells good too! I wish it came in a larger bottle but a little really does go a long way so it's still worth the price!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: the bottle ruins the product
Review: What good does it do to develop a good product and then attempt to sell it in a bottle that is impossible to use? This thick styling cream needs to either be in a soft squeezable tube or a jar where you remove the top and dip into the cream.  I am so annoyed that I spent money on this product -- never again (in this packaging).

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: This is the only thing that ACTUALLY gets rid of my frizz.
Review: This is the best anti-frizz hair product I’ve ever used. The reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is the bottle! The bottle sucks. It’s really hard to get the product out. I wish they’d put it in a squeeze bottle like toothpaste is in but bigger. Otherwise, the product itself is amazing.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: I had high hopes for this product. I’ve used Cantu but it dries out my hair so I tried to use the SheaMoisture Curl and Enhancing Smoothie but that didn’t work for me. (I have 3c/4a low porosity hair.) I bought that from Walmart and got a refund. I bought the Curl and Style Milk hoping that would work for me. It left my hair frizzy. I don’t think SheaMoisture products work on my hair but i do love the smell of this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: amazing!
Review: I did some research on curl cream before I bought this and I decided to try one for a decent price before getting one from a salon or Ulta and paying double and it not working. this product though is amazing! my hair is usually frizzy and the curls are different on each side of my head. i used this and not only is the frizz mostly gone and the curls are the same all around my head... the curls are more like coils and it looks so healthy and amazing! definitely will keep buying!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Great curl cream and amazing scent!!!
Review: This Shea moisture is one of my favorite of all the Shea moisture products. The scent is so amazing. To curl milk is not too this or too thin and works great used first as a leaving and/ or in combination with other creams and gels. I also think this product would work great for many curl types as it’s not greasy or too heavy as long as you start by adding a little and work your way up.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Good for the money
Review: My curly hair look beautiful......I loved

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Very Disappointing
Review: I was so trusting and excited to try this product for my course, thick curly hair. Unfortunately, it did nothing for my frizz, even though, I wrapped my damp hair in a towel for about 10 minutes after applying so the product could work best with the heat of the towel. This is how I got optimal results from other products. This produce worked as well as dollar store products have in the past. Wish I could have tried before buying. Expensive experiment especially if I have to keep this trial and error experiment going.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: A problem for the manufacturer!
Review: Overall, I like the product however, it's so thick I can't get it out of the plastic bottle.  It won't come out even it you turn it upside-down.  I need to find a narrow stick to scrape it out when I want to use it.  I won't reorder it because of this.  The Shea Moisture in the jar is user friendly and works quite well.  This is a total disappointment!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: I have natural curls, and I LOVE this! No more bad curl days.
Review: I have tried dozens upon dozens of products for my super-curly-white-girl hair over the past 45 years. No joke. This one is my new favorite. Holds my curls: with bounce and without frizz. I mix it with argan oil and apply them together, and I love the results. I have shoulder length thick hair and just a dime-sized amount covers my head. Even my family has noticed the difference in my curls, and the lack of ponytails that I wear when I'm having a bad curl day. No more bad curl days for me!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Weighs down my thin hair
Review: I wanted to love this product but it’s such a thick cream it really weighs down my hair and I have really thin hair. Didn’t work for me and I wouldn’t recommend it if you have thin hair because it will make it look like less. Smells nice thoAlso, it’s true that you can’t get the product out of the bottle. It’s so think that it won’t pour out so you gotta open the bottle and smack it on your hand to get a little. Poor design.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: I finally found a solution
Review: My naturally curly hair would often frizz after only a few hours, especially after brushing. This product is a game-changer! It has also allowed me to blow my hair straight without the usual frizz. This product works better than anything I've tried so I am surprised the price is so reasonable  My hair has never looked better both natural or dried straight! I am excited to try all the Shea Mositure products!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Okay Product
Review: When I bought this at the store before I loved it for my curls and finished the product. After purchasing this product online, it arrived and didn’t have the same easy consistency as the one before had. Functional-wise I think it works okay, but it is really stiff and difficult to squeeze out when that shouldn’t be the case. I’d advise trying to find it at the store first before resorting to ordering online!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: So moisturizing, gorgeous fragrance, leaving my hair so soft.
Review: This product leaves my hair so moisturized, and soft. The scent is gorgeous and lingeries.However as the website explains it is for a certain hair curl which was too heavy for me.They explain how to mix it with conditioner etc., but it’s a little heavy for my hair.Try it for your hair because the benefits are awesome if it works for your hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Too oily
Review: I used this to do overnight foam curclers with my daughter. It did curl her hair but it is too oily and did not hold her curls that long that I have to use hot curling iron on her before she goes to the stage.. the hair spray I used also didnt help because her hair was already oily from this product. Waste of money

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Amazing!
Review: Great product.  I bought this to try on my thin, grey, frizzy hair.  I am surprised it works great for me.  My hair is softer, shiney and the ends are not frizzy.  My only problem is getting it out of the bottle.  I am going to look for the product in a jar not a squeeze bottle.  My daughter tried it and she loves it also.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: So blah
Review: I LOVED the smell, unfortunately that's the only thing I liked about this product. I have curly dry hair and this product left my hair dull and not moisturised at all. I couldn't even run my fingers through it without them getting stuck as if I have washed my hair for 3 weeks. I tried using it a second time, but it just made my hair look dirty and felt heavy. I definitely don't recommend this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Not for Fine Curly Hair
Review: My search was for outside fine curly hair products and this was the first one. The organic part is awesome. None of the bad things are in this products. And it's Fair Trade which is wonderful. The small print on the bottle that said For Thick Curls but nowhere else. So if you have thick curls and want a healthy product for your hair then this is it..

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Didn’t live up to the hype - don’t buy
Review: Was very excited to try this as I have heard nothing but great things about SheaMoisture. I have type 2c/3a curls and this seemed like a good fit. The smell is unremarkable which is rather have than something overpowering. The cream is very thick but didn’t really provide any hold. It didn’t give curl definition at all, and my hair didn’t seem moisturized but instead looking very greasy even though I just showered. Very disappointed

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: I can't get this product out of the bottle!!
Review: I was not very please with the way this product leaves my hair, but the worst is how difficult is to get this product out of the bottle.  The product is too thick to come in this type of package.  It would be easier to use if the product comes in a jar.I don't recommend this product!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: YES!
Review: I wasn't sure why but lately my hair had been feeling really dry (maybe the weather?). My hair needed a serious moisture boost. I tried a few different things like different oils and deep conditions, but still felt my hair dry. Yesterday, after I co-washed, I applied this product and it gave my hair a really good moisture boost and shine, but without weighing it down or making it look greasy. Now I'm not sure if it's the co-wash coupled with the cream, but my hair is feeling heavenly right now!! ( I don't usually condition-wash but just wash regularly but since I had washed my hair just a day ago, i co-washed to reduce dryness). Yes sheamoisture!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: a must have for curly hair
Review: this is a wonderful product for curly hair! it leaves my hair very soft, moisturized and the scent is nice. fair warning a little goes a long way. i have curly, shoulder length, fine hair and this is just the right amount of product for my hair type. i will definitely order again.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Hair is stiff after use, and no real conditioning at all
Review: I thought this product would leave my hair softer and would provide moisture to my thick, curly dry hair.  No.  It made my hair very hard to comb, and even if I air dried it, the curls were still stiff and unmanageable.  Have curly,  dry, color treated hair and was disappointed it didn't help with conditioning.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Formula change? Not great
Review: I rebought this item on amazon because I bought it from a store originally. I think they’ve thinned out their formula because the batch I receive is literally ...water. It holds no moisture and does not help in de tangling in anyway. I’m pretty bummed because I finally thought I found my perfect conditioner. Hopefully it’s just a batch issue.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Excellent for my curly hair and NO FRIZZ
Review: I love this product! I have natural curly curly hair and trying to keep it moisturized and not frizzy is a challenge. BUT NO MORE!! This has helped my hair! Not only does it smell great, it conditions and controls my frizz even in humidity and rain!! Also I can get up day 2-3 and wet and go only adding a small amount of product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: It's ok
Review: This made my hair feel super greasy. I don't feel like I used that much, but yet it made it feel stiff, like straw, and greasy in some areas. Love the smell! I was looking forward to this product, but I'm not really happy with it. I think the texture of my hair changed after having kids and I was hoping this would make it look like it used to before kids, but not at all.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Does not dispense
Review: II used for the first time today. My problem is the conditioner is so thick that it will not come out of the dispenser. I have to screw off the lid and put my finger in to get anything out. This will not work. The scent is a little strong in the beginning but it seems to have toned down. It’s a nice scent. And it seems to be doing a good job on my hair, which is great. But the container is a real problem! I don’t think I can use it!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Can't get it out of the bottle!
Review: I can't get it out of the bottle! How did everyone get it out?? I'm thinking about cutting the top and putting it in another container. It should be in a tub.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Wow my hair is so pretty!
Review: My hair has never looked better!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Super Moisturizing
Review: This product works perfectly for my daughter's dry hair, in conjunction with other Shea Moisture products and Jamaican Black Castor Oil to seal in the moisture. It's thick, smells really good, and truly seems to keep her hair moist. Will definitely purchase again.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Really nice product
Review: I love this hair cream so much! It really made my hair feel so nice and moisturized it well. Only thing that sucks about it is the bottle it comes in. Trying to squeeze the cream out was really difficult. Luckily I had an extra “pump” that fit perfectly so I just pump out the product. Other than that it’s a great product

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Used to love but now my hair hates it
Review: I used to love this product and it used to work wonders in my hair when I was in high school. Now my hair hates it and get dry after a day. The scent is great and the price is good for the amount you are getting, but I dont think I can use it anymore. I am still a lover of sheamoisture and will stick to their deep conditioners

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: It’s not for me
Review: It came fast and as described but it’s just not for me. Smells awesome. It’s very thick, like a lotion and hard to get out of the bottle. It makes my hair look so greasy and wet, it also makes my hair very hard and crunchy. I have natural very curly thick hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Didn’t work for me
Review: This product was waaayy too moisturizing and I have curl dryish hair so… it made my hair flat and just gross feeling. I tried using a small amount and still no luck. The leave in conditioner though slaps. Not this though.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: love this stuff
Review: I decided to let my nature curly hair shine and not straighten it and damage it. This stuff works great and it doesn't weigh down my curls and holds great without leaving your hair feeling crunchy. Buy this stuff all the time

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Good product, impractical container
Review: Would give it a five if the bottle wasn't so inconvenient. It's impractical to put such a thick substance in a bottle with such a small opening. It's a workout to try to get a good amount out per squeeze. Would be much better in a jar with screw on lid. Does dry on white if you apply too much.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Amazing
Review: I have about 5 of these hair products from this company and I use it  every day the scent is amazing great with my hair and really gives me a confident boost I also read a story of how they came from very intresting and unique Love this product !!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: The benefits WOW!
Review: This stuff combined with the shampoo & conditioner is mind blowing. I can not sing the praises of Shea Moisture Curl products enough. The difference they have done on my hair. I will not use anything else ever again. What once was a rats nest is now a waterfall of soft maintained waves. Try it you’ll not regret it!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Conditioner/Leave In
Review: This product is VERY thick coming out of the bottle.  I have to beat it out.  It does seem like it does a good job after I get it out.  I'm using it as a leave in AND as a deep conditioner.  I'm not sure I would buy again, although I do like their other prodcuts.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Would Not Recommend nor Buy Again
Review: This product left my hair dry and flakey, even though it is a cream and not a gel. I am a black women and my natural texture is a 3C. I used this product on freshly washed and conditioned hair and still got horrible results. The shampoo and conditioner were Shea Moisture products and I used it for a second day hoping that the results would improve, but I was wrong. Would not recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Fix the bottle
Review: I love this product . Smells fantastic . Make my curls look great . I wish they world rethink the bottle . So hard to squeeze out . I have to uncap and shake product out , it’s kinda annoying . If you don’t care about fighting with the bottle some it’s a great product .

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: A bit greasy
Review: I have thick (and a lot of it) but soft long wavy hair.Overall, I think it’s a good product but it wasn’t the right product for me. The texture was just a touch too greasy for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: This is too thick and greasy.
Review: This stuff is way too thick and heavy for curly hair. The texture is just so heavy . I only used it once, I should have returned it, but it was too much a pain. The texture of the product is like a super heavy lotion… and drags down the curl and feels like you put crisco oil on your hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Leaves hair natural feeling
Review: For someone who has thick hair and has struggled for years trying to tame it without frizz, I FINALLY found a product that doesn't weigh it down or cause dryness.! Soooo happy with the way it makes my curls natural. I love the fact it's a leave in conditioner. Easy to apply where needed. Not heavy on scent.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Amazing but so small
Review: I love this milk it works amazing for my hair. I have 3B-3C curls and this is the best but is sooooo small like I was so shocked when I got it like this doesn’t last long if you have a lot of hair but the product is amazing.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Doesn’t define for my hair
Review: The scent is great and it does moisturize my hair. The one thing I don’t like about the hair milk is that it doesn’t really define my hair. I have different hair types throughout my head. I have 3b, 4a, 4b hair types.  I notice a little bit of a difference, but not what I wanted. I use it like a leave-in cream now

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: good but difficult to open
Review: i love shea moisture and this curl and style milk is great for styling hair, i usually water it down some bc it’s SUPER thick and difficult to get out the container. but i would definitely buy again!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Condioner
Review: The conditioner is great, but Way TOO THICK to come through the pump. It needs to have a regular cap. It's frustrating to get it out while your hands are wet and slippery.  That's my only complaint.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Love it
Review: My hair is puffy, curly it would get dry and really really tangled. I been using this for a month now. Love it. One thing I love I can put this on and won't even have to comb my hair thru out the day and stay moisturize. Love it

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Not too happy
Review: Not satisfied . This product did not worked out for my type of hair. I have dry curly hair. Not the moisturizing effect I expected. Not a leave in conditioner, leaves my hair as if it needs to be washed again..

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: My fave
Review: My go to styling product for years. I tried the curling smoothie but it was too heavy for my wavy hair (2b~3a) but this milk is light enough so that it has bounce and enough moisture.Package was intact. Happy with the delivery and handling of the product as well.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Great Product
Review: Well, I been using this product for awhile and I am truly impressed that it does not make my hair feel "crunchy". It remains soft and manageable all day. This is my fourth time purchasing it but not from amazon. Going forward; I found it cheaper here so it a WIN-WIN for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Amazing!!!
Review: I don't normally write reviews but I feel like this product deserves some credit. I have 3b curly hair and I always have trouble finding a good product for my hair. I took a chance on this item and OMG!! Its amazing!! First of all it smells really good like coconuts. The texture of it is smooth and creamy. It leaves my curls soft and beautiful! I noticed even after a couple of days of not washing my hair, my hair is still shiny and soft. I'm glad I decided to try this out.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: This is amazing ! Love it ! Think you will too!
Review: This smells sooo good! Keeps my curls defined without the gunky feeling that gels have! Very soft and conditioned as I have coarse curly red hair ! This is all I’ll be using from now on!!  Yahoo ... happy I discovered this and decided to get it ! :-)

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: 5yrs Later I'm still a True Fan.
Review: My first bottle Purchased was very thick I couldn't get it out. I did Try another bottle an it worked very well on my 3a 3b Natural hair. 5yrs later I'm still a True Fan.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Feels so good
Review: Makes my hair really soft and smells so good.  I put on my hair while wet and allow it to air dry.  Will buy again.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Perfect for dry curly hair!!
Review: I love this product! I have really dry curly hair so I use this as a moisturizer/leave-in conditioner every day. It doesn’t have a strong scent and leaves my hair with a sheer/soft texture, even 12 hours later!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Loving this styling cream
Review: This styling cream smells amazing and feels so great on my hair I love using this right after I use their other products shampoo & conditioner by Shea Moisture

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: TOO THICK
Review: While the fragrance of this is really good, I have yet to get any out of the bottle.  Far too thick and no way to get it out of the bottle.  I cannot recommend it since it is just too thick to get out of the bottle.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Love this product
Review: I love this product! I purchased this for my daughter who has thick curly hair.  Its amazing on her hair. I helps moisturize her curls while leaving a great smell and not too greasy!  Its my go to for styling her hair daily.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Smells Amazing But....
Review: It smell amazing but after using for 3 time you need to open the containers lid because by squishing it it doesn't come out at all.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Greasy and hard
Review: I tried this product because it was recommended by my sister in-law. I have curly hair that tends to get frizzy throughout the day. After I applied a dime size amount through my hair it became greasy and hard. I could barely run my hands through. Terrible. Mayb work for you but is a definite no for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: It’s okay
Review: It’s okay, it left a white residue in my hair but I tend to have a heavy hand when it comes to my products. Also it’s difficult to get out of the bottle because of the thicker consistency. I have 3b/c hair, There are better products out there for around the same price.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Love it
Review: The scent is fine, not strong. This is my go to for a wash and go and it keeps my hair moistured. I feel like there's not enough product for the price.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Hard to open, sweet smell, VERY thick
Review: The scent was very strong. It smelled like a coconut  pinacoloda, sweet. I didn't like it. The bottle was also incredibly hard to open, I squeezed so much it left a dent. This moisturizer is also very thick so you have to use a lot to get it on your hair. Wouldn't recommend it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Type hair
Review: This product is a protein based moisturizer. If you are a 4c Type natural hair. I would not recommend using on a everyday basis but overall is a good product.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Smells amazing!
Review: I'm not usually a fan of coconunt smells but this smells amazing and it definitely keeps my frizzy hair in control so definitely loving it so far!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Works amazing!
Review: My son loves this product He has very curly hair that can frizz easily. He uses this every day and his curls stay in tact. He calls it liquid gold.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Hair still dry
Review: Too thick and hard to squeeze out of the bottle and doesn’t  leave hair moisturized hair is still dry product is not that good

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Shea moisture
Review: This is my go to for leave in.  I have VERY LONG thick wavy/curly hair I’d say maybe 2C-3A curl. You don’t need a lot of this product and you the scent is amazing. Like a coconut pineapple scent. I found this cheaper on this site so this is where I’ll be buying.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Magic!
Review: My thick, coarse, curly hair looks like a bale of straw without this magical potion!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Only use a small amount.
Review: This product is So thick that I was afraid I was going to break the bottle trying to squeeze it out so I ran it under hot water to loosen it up. Pretty scary.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Love it
Review: I have naturally curly and frizzy hair. These products really help keeping it tamed. Smells sooo good. Thank you.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Unable to use
Review: Removed foil seal. Product was too thick to get out of bottle.  Even after squeezing and shaking.  It did have an awesome scent.  Don't know what was wrong.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Very difficult to get the product out of the bottle
Review: Works good moisturizing my hair, but it is very sick and it makes it very difficult to get the product out of the bottle! I have to vigorously shake it and stick my finger in to get it out. Bad packaging.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Excelente  cero frizz
Review: Me deja los rizos increíbles , no había conseguido con ningún producto lo que conseguí con este. super recomendado para cabellos rizados

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Bounce! Bounce! Bounce!
Review: I mix this with the milk smoothie and it’s the perfect combo for my mixed children’s hair. Keeps their curls bouncy all day and never looks greasy! They have very soft hair and this is my go to! I recommend to everyone!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: I love the way this makes my hair feel!
Review: A friend recommended that I try this.I love the scent and how it makes my hair feel so soft and smooth.Will definitely be purchasing again!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Good product!
Review: This product is great to apply after the shower to help make my hair super curly! I was expecting a more milky, liquid substance, but the product is actually quite thick and more like a hair lotion. I usually use a dollop of the curl milk, add some water in my hand, and apply it to my wet hair after a shower. That's my favorite way to use this product!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Scent is a little much, and it’s a little thick
Review: Not for thin curly hair. It’s a little thick and leaves a residue if your hair isn’t thick enough to soak it all up. I don’t like the scent it’s too much.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Does what I says and smells amazing for days!
Review: This stuff is great, it's just hard to get the last bit out of the bottle

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Too Much product is needed for good results.
Review: It smells nice. It feels light weight but too much product is needed to keep hair looking moist. My hair is naturally curly but can get dry out during the day. The curl definition is there but I mean if your hair is fully curly and your just looking for a product to keep your hair nicely moist then this product is not the best.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Creates beautiful curls and bounce.
Review: Love this product! It has made such a difference in my curls. Creating soft bouncy curls that last all day. I love the smell as well!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Works well
Review: Seems to work well Inise it on locs so it adds great moisture and softness

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Great product!
Review: Love the fabulous scent and moisturizing qualities. Leaves my hair soft and easy to manage

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Too thick
Review: Too thick to squeeze out. Once I got enough out it was great.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Yucky residue!
Review: Left a horrible residue on my hair after only one use. Had to wash my hair again after I got home from work. Scent was ok.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Ammm...
Review: Deja un olor agradable, pero al pasar el tiempo de aplicarlo da un aspecto reseco, casi lo mismo que usar gel estandar.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Difficult to get out of the bottle.
Review: I think the product is great, but it is extremely difficult to get out of the bottle. I am in the process of transferring it to a tub-like container so I can use it easier.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Too thick for my hair
Review: This is too thick for 3b or close to 3b hair. cant detangle with it or comb through easily. Great price, great scent but too greasy and thick. Definitely adds moisture though.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Not happy with it
Review: I hate to do this after a bought this product a few months back, but I got busy and forgot .What a mess it is to get it out of the container for starters. Secondly it just creates a grease layer on the hair but not sure it moisturizes it. I have to toss it because I cannot even get the product out of the bottle…thick and not fluid.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Great!
Review: Highly recommend. Just wish it was easier to squeeze out lol.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Nightmare
Review: Absolutely hated it. It is thick as quicksand for one step. I leaves your hair white and sticky. It looked dirty. Really really dirty. I immediately washed it out and will never reuse. Definitely a waste of money.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Natural curls all the way !
Review: Great for natural curls. A little heavier then I’m use to but with trial and error ive worked out the right amount.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Extremely difficult to get out of bottle!
Review: Nothing special about this moisturizer but I can tell you it's very difficult to get it out of the bottle which sucks!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Needs new style of bottle
Review: I like the product for my hair, I would have purchased it again except it is really hard to get out of the bottle because of how thick it is.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Good. But frizzy when dry
Review: I feel that it is amazing while my hair is still wet however it still leaves my hair frizzy once it dries up.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Too thick to pour
Review: I have used this product many times in the past.  This is not like the curl and style "milk" that I used in the past. It was a good deal so I ordered 2 bottles. It is so thick that I can't even pour it from the bottle. So I hardly ever use it because of the struggle getting it out of the bottle. It smells great.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Love! Love!
Review: This stuff is great! I can actually let my curly hair air dry without it looking like a frizzball!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Product spilled!!
Review: The product arrived open and some of it spilled. So far dissatisfied. I hope it works for my hair

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Love this product
Review: Love this hair product. I am one year into learning and loving my kinky curly hair. I’ve try so many products and I found out less is best! I use this and a little oil for my wash and go or Twist outs. This product leave my hair soft and bounce.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Good product, but hard to squeeze bottle
Review: Works very well for my super-thick 3B/3C curls.  I use it as a "base" layer before applying gel.  Have given it 4 stars, because it is difficult to get out of bottle.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Won't buy again.
Review: Smells good and leaves my daughter's hair soft, but does nothing for curl definition or to control frizz.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: smells amazing
Review: I love the way this curls and shapes my hair

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: All Shea products rock!
Review: Have curly hair- this works great!

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Love in a bottle
Review: Shea moisture is top notch for naturalistas

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Meh
Review: It smells decent but I don't find any value in using it.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Know if the lotion is thick or thin.
Review: This product is too thick for my grade of hair. I wanted to try it due to the success I've had with the other products.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Not for me….
Review: Not for my hair. Was too thick and the smell was unbearable.

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
Title: Smells terrible
Review: Idk what scent this is but all it smells like is chemicals and vile, leaves hair feeling gross and crispy kind of hard to wash off And leaves scalp extra dry and itchy

Product: SheaMoisture Curl and Style Milk for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus for Curl Definition 8 oz
