Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I usually like SheaMoisture products, but I'm not quite sure what to make of the SheaMoisture Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Gel Souffle Styler, 12 Ounce.  It smells great, but when I went to get some out of the jar, my finger sprung back up like it hit a tiny trampoline!  Again and again my fingers bounced around without making a dent in the gel.  I had to dig in and I brought up chunks of what looked like the clear gummy bears.  The gel would not break down and when I put it on my son's hair at the end of his hair care routine, the chunks of gel were clearly in his hair.  I even had chunks of gel fall onto the couch.  The most bizarre product.  I am not sure if it's supposed to be like this or not.  However, I would say that my son's hair was actually better off without this product than with it.  At almost $18, I don't really see the value in this particular product.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: How I use this product... If anyone cares 😉 3b/3c curly girl.
Review: I love this product. Yes, it has a weird gelatin consistency but you have to play with it to make it work. You have to figure out how much and how to apply. I have thick fine and coarse (due to the quantity of hair) 3b and 3c hair. What works for me is applying after towel drying and after applying a leave-in conditioner (same brand and scent). Then I separate my hair by sections, I apply a small amount. TO APPLY: take a SMALL amount onto your hands and rub it with the palm of your hands. This will change the texture and make it more pliable to add to your hair. This stuff becomes super oily yet thick feeling goo. So do not add it to the scalp. I personally apply it close to the scalp, but not on the scalp, to the ends, and work with a Denman 7 brush. Apply and brush by section after applying. It is super moisturizing with a light hold but really you have to give this product a chance. If your hair does not need extra moisture this stuff is not for you. But if you are like me and your hair sucks up moisture this stuff is awesome with a light hold.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I really liked this product.  I have other products from this line, but haven't tried this souffle until now. It is really nice. I don't agree with the other review that it is just for ethnic hair. I have wavy hair, and it was nice and made my hair fluffy. Fluffier than it has ever been on cgm. So it is a little oily, and has a thick slip like texture. I scooped a little, and let it melt between my palms and applied it to my hair. I also used it on wet hair after my shower. It kept my waves nice, and together. I will include a pic of my hair before I broke my cast. It is also nice for piecing on dry curls. I use it to style my son's super curly hair.Edited: It is AMAZING! I have now been using this product for two or three weeks, and have had a perfect hair day every day since. My wash days are the bomb. I also use the shea moisture curling cream, and them I apply this on after. Don't be afraid of the jelly like texture. Just scoop a little into your palms and melt it between them a little. It has helped keep my curls together and soft too! If I want an extra hard cast I use a curling mousse too. Otherwise it keeps my curls manageable and soft, but my clumps and coils stay!I definitely recommend.  You just have to play around with it. Not too much, and I use it on wet hair. I've refreshed with a tiny bit of it, and water too. I get tighter waves/curlies!

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: My Fav Wavy Hair Product!
Review: I love Shea Moisture products. They revived my hair after brutal hair loss after having my sons. I had over a year of lots of chunks of hair falling out. In my personal experience I had to play with which ones worked best for me. For example I cannot use the whole coconut set because one of them or the combination of the make my hair fall out but if I use this and the conditioner with the black Castor oil shampoo 🧴 and that combination worked perfect for me. My hair got stronger and it stopped falling out. It’s started growing healthy again. I started rice water rinses and following the Curly Girl Method and boom. Back to normal. This product just a little goes a long way. I have thin wavy/curly hair. It works for my husband and two sons as well. They have thicker curly hair. It’s a great product.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: What happens when a bigger company takes over?
Review: The Black women know what they're talking about! When we used to get this product, it was the consistency of an older product called Dippity Do; you didn't have to rub your hands together, get spoons to break up the globs so you could rub your hands together. This is result of the product being on shelves too long and drying out. We want to support OUR OWN but there's an entity -Unilever- that is banking on us to be loyal to a brand with hard earned money and a lackluster product and performance. I would rather cut off my hair (think Symone Sanders or Tiffany Hadish) than spend a penny on what doesn't work.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Formula changed this is garbage now!
Review: This product turned to crap real fast! This is not the texture or what this is supposed to be like at all. I've used this product for years and this is the 1st one that came as a hard jello lump inside. You cant even mix it up because it breaks into smaller tiny chunks that you could never put in your hair. I bought this at a store so this must be the new formula. I contacted the company waiting to hear back. I can never use this product again what a disappointment I will have to find another brand don't waste your money this is a nightmare.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Use very sparingly and it works wonders on frizz!
Review: This was sticky the first couple of times I used it because I'm not used to using so little of a product. Whether I apply it to wet or dry hair, though, this is AMAZING for the frizz many of us deal with in the South.  It is a great product for defining curl and keeping it through the day. I've never used a product this consistency before, (a little softer than gelatin but stiffer than most hair gel).It takes less than a dime size amount to do my long hair, so even though the jar is a little expensive, it will easily last for more than a year. I just get the smallest dab, rub it between my hands, and run it through my hair from bottom to top (yes, in reverse so you don't get too much product on top.) It keeps my style all day.  I would highly recommend (and I do see a lot of vine reviews on here, but don't discount them, because most of us take our job as Vine reviewers very seriously and only write very honest reviews.) If you haven't found a product that works yet for your frizz yet, this is well worth trying.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have straight hair and most curling gels can keep my hair curled. Most of the time it's very hard to keep curl in my hair but when I use a curling gel it hold longer. This did not work for me. This pulled the curls out as I ran my fingers through. However, when I used it on wet hair and dried it, it worked okay. I also didn't like the texture of this gel. It reminds me of the "Gorilla Booger Gel" you can get for your kids at a pharmacy. It feels like boogers. However, if you rub it in your hands to warm it up a bit, it will become a normal gel texture. I do believe this will work great for those that have frizzy, curling hair that you want to tame. It took my artificial curl out and also controlled the frizz. If you have wavy or semi curls, it may work for you. However, I think it would be best for those really curly girls that need help taming them. I would not recommend this for straight hair girls, but would for curly/frizzy hair girls. Just remember to warm it up in your hands before using.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have naturally curly hair, so I am always looking for new products that will help tame the frizziness and make the curls look even better. I am satisfied with this Shea Moisture curl product.Although it made my hair a bit crunchy (which I do not love), my curls were definitely more controlled than normal, and they held all day long. I have to fight less in the morning to make them lay nicely.I put it on each night after showering, then let my hair air dry. It's definitely a bit oily, so wash up well after use. It also has a very unique texture to it, which took some getting used to. It did not make my head feel heavy, though.I also love that Shea Moisture uses more natural ingredients, including no sulfates. They have won the trust of my family for many years, so I am excited to introduce another product from the company into my routine!

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Really?
Review: Sheamoisture what gives?  The old formula (Glycerin, water, Corn Syrup, Pectin, sheabutter, etc..) would moisturize  the hair for at least 5 days if you needed it to. The trick was to use on wet hair in the shower. No stickiness, just soft hair.  The new formula (Glycerin, water, Corn starch,propanediol, sheabutter... ect.) , you get moisture for  maybe 1 day and not that well.  Hair feels coated but not soft.  The old formula was the only thing from Sheamoisture that I  could tolerate.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Excellent 100 % natural product
Review: Amazing. Since it’s natural the consistency can be tricky , I just left it in a hot place for a day or so , and it melted like an oily gel.  I put a quarter sized shape and scrub it in my hands until it melts like oil , and then put it in my hair. It leaves a natural shine , it restores hair over time, tames frizz, prevents breakage , moisturizes while styling the hair. I love it! I use it with the other Shea moisture coconut and hibiscus products.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: We LOVE the shea moisture coconut & hibiscus line!
Review: We've tried several products from the shea moisture coconut & hibiscus line and each one we've tried has worked really well for my daughter's hair type (curly, 3a/b, low porosity). It keeps her hair hydrated, soft, and smelling so great. This gel souffle is one of the few products in the line we hadn't tried yet and now that we have, we aren't disappointed. This gel souffle keeps her curls in ringlets and reduces frizz throughout the day without being crunchy, stiff, or sticky like other gels. I'm super pleased with it. Also, the price of shea moisture products are reasonably affordable compared to other curly hair brands so that's a plus.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I use most of the products from the SheaMoisture line. This was a nice addition. I don't normally wear my hair curly, but sometimes I air dry it and let my natural curls have their way. This helps keep them from looking and feeling dry and brittle. It smells wonderful and it doesn't leave a flaky residue if I don't wet my hair again the next day. If you have curly hair, I would definitely have this available on my vanity.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This product smells nice, but man is it gross feeling! It’s kind of jell-o like but stiffer. The best way to use it is take a scoop and rub it together pretty vigorously between your hands and it will become more gel like. I apply about two little scoops and comb it through with a wet brush. I scrunch after and let it air dry. It does okay, I feel like it does cut back on frizz a bit but it’s definitely not a life changing product or anything. The texture is too weird for me to want to continue using.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I use this for my bi-racial son who has very curly hair. In the morning I just wet his hair and pick it out a little then add some of this in (about a quarter size) - a little goes a long way! It helps keep his curls nice and tight and moisturized. I love that it is sulfate free and smells amazing!

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I'm not fond of this gel. The texture is almost like thick Jell-O. To use it, I have to grab a chunk of it and rub it in my hands to melt it. Unfortunately, I never could get it to completely smooth out. I tried it in my hair and my children's hair and there would be leftover little chunks of it throughout our hair. Also, even trying to use only a small amount, my hair felt horribly dirty whenever I tried it. I just wanted to jump in the shower and wash it out. It's not for us, though. On the bright side, it does smell nice. Plus, if you like a super hard cast on your hair, this will probably get it for you. (It did on mine.)

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: I get the bad reviews, but this stuff works!!!
Review: Yes, this curl gel is clumpy and a little challenging to manage. But is smells great, and more importantly, it WORKS to tame my long, frizzy, blonde, colored, unruly hair. As I am growing older, my hairdresser is saying my hormones are making my hair even more prone to frizziness (I know right, how dare he?!?) So over the course of the last coupe of years, I have tried frizz-taming goops from the salon and the drug store. Shea Moisture Curl Souffle is the one I keep coming back to.It is clumpy - but I just put a little glop in my hands and rub together until it softens into more of a gel consistency. I don't mind the extra work to have frizz-free curls.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: For thick curly hair works great!
Review: It is hard a consistency but it melts into my hand.l after rubbing it in. It is for thick curly hair and does have oils in it it may leave your hair greasy if you have very fine hair. Works great on my dry over processed curls. People should read the label and ingredients before purchasing and before leaving bad Reviews. Worked great for me dry or damp. You only need a small amount. It also controls frizz .

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This stuff is a semi-solid gel and a little hard to get out of the jar. But trust me, you don't need much. A little bit goes a long way. I get a little out of the jar, rub it between my hands and then apply to my hair, starting with the ends. Rub it in well. At first your hair might feel a little greasy, but as soon as the gel dries, that goes away. My  hair is manageable and has volume and shine. It holds it's style till the next shampoo. Truly. My hair naturally is straight and fine. I would recommend this product. Remember, wait till it dries before deciding that it doesn't work for you.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I liked it in the beginning- it smells good, looks nice in the curls and makes them look hydrated but the messiness and difficulty grabbing the product from the container...and not being able to spread evenly into the hair because the consistency is similar to water beads so they're little beads/chunks that don't break apart well to apply to the hair. Just was too much hassle to use on a regular basis, I ended up throwing it away 👀

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Amazing hair for dayzzzzzzzz
Review: I LOVE this stuff! I can put it in the night before and do nothing else to my hair, and I’ll wake up with perfect wild curls! Not even kidding—I go to church with my bed head!Picture one is at the end of day one, and picture two is at the end of day two (having showered the morning before, and gone through a whole day of outdoors).

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Awful product
Review: I just bought this product yesterday and thought that surely this product wasn't how it was supposed to be. It's a hard, lumpy jello texture. Started reading reviews and found that I'm far from being the only one with this problem and apparently it's been going on for several months.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Do not buy!
Review: I didn't know what this product was prior to opening I thought it was just gel but the texture and consistency is that of jello. The scent is disgusting and I would not put this on my hair or my child's hair for that matter. Disappointed taking the product back where I got it from.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Unusable
Review: Like the other reviews this product is unusable.  It was a solid clump of gel like substance when I opened it. I could barely get it out of the container. It just stays in chunks like rubbery glue.  I even tried adding warm water. The stuff is all over my bathroom.  Disgusting product.  So disappointing.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I am not sure if I got a lemon, but it wasn't fully sealed inside, and it smells so sour that I don't want it in my hair. The texture is also rather unpleasant and you have to work it in your fingers for quite some time in order to even be able to apply it to hair.I don't think I'll be using this gel, but I am leaving a neutral rating - perhaps I got a bad jar and it got affected by the air since it wasn't sealed.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Use to be a great Product (DO NOT BUY!!)
Review: A few years ago i used this product when the company was just starting to pop off. I was amazed with the quality and the ingredients in the original product. The Soufflé's used to have silk protein as one of the main ingredients which would made your hair grow really fast and and the strands were thick and strong.Five or six years later I buy the product again, I noticed immediately that silk protein was NOT on the packaging or listed in the ingredients, which was very disappointing. I open up the product to use it and its in a solid form (not the smooth, slippery, gel like consistency of the original product) its messy, impossible to apply, basically useless. What a fall from grace. Please don't waste your time and money you will be greatly disappointed. They only reason I haven't return this product is because i don't like returning stuff.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Shea Moisture missed the mark with this one.
Review: I use Shea Moisture curl products (shampoo, conditioner, smoothie cream, other) and I was expecting this to be good for my curls. First, the texture is thicker than jello; you're not even able to glop in your hands in hopes that you can warm it up to make it spreadable. Secondly, the smell is just BAD. Most times I can move past the smell for the sake of the results, but not with this product. This just doesn't work.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I suppose you have to have the right kind of hair for this stuff. It's a fairly wet gel, and does smell good (like coconut), but it seems more for a stiffer kind of hair, not so much the wavy type, if that makes sense. Certainly doesn't work for me, and doesn't work for my wife, but we thought we'd give it a try to see.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I don't know how to feel about this SheaMoisture curling gel souffle. I usually use their curl enhancing creme which I love, but this is different. The texture of it puzzled me. You have to dig a chunk of it out and rub it between your hands for ut to smooth out. It's also heavy on my hair since it's a gel but it doesn't make my hair hard. I prefer the curl creme to his. I didn't like the result fornthe $17 price tag.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Shea Moisture is a brand that is widely available in all retail stores.  Price for this product is affordable.  Gel is made with coconut and hibiscus oil and has a soft feminine scent.  One can apply a small amount if gel between hands, warm it up between palms and spread throughout the hair.  Hair can then be styles with hair dryer and curler.  Product is easy to store in a bathroom cabinet.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Used product!
Review: I received this today and the lid was not screwed on tightly and not sealed! The product itself is crusty and clumpy and only 3/4 of the product is in the container. I won't be buying from this seller again. Buyer beware!

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have 4c curly hair and this is one of the only products I use to keep movement and curl definition, I absolutely love it and it smells great. I've been telling my siblings about it and they all all love shea moisture as is so this is definitely going to be a big yes for me.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Using this product, I felt like I took orbies and stuck them on my hair.  Using it on dry hair, it was pretty much like Jell-O on my hair and took two days before it felt dry and stopped feeling sticky.  When it dried it left my hair feeling soft.  Using it on wet hair, it worked to control the curls.  It didn't last long, but while it lasted I liked it.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Impossible to Use
Review: This product is chunky and hard and remains that way even if you try to rub it in your hands to smooth it out. I am seeing all the horrible Amazon reviews. I bought this in store and it was the same as the reviews I’ve read. I think this is just the quality of this particular product and not a bad batch.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Shea Moisturizing Hair Cream is my favorite hair product. I have short wavy/curly hair and I love the way it feels. I thought I would give the gel soufflé a try, but don’t really like the goopy texture of this product. It does look fine on my hair, but the gooppiness is not my preference. It is a good product and will leave your hair shiny.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Love it
Review: Not sure why everyone hates this product. I Really like it mine was not jello consistency at all. It is a thin oily gel and very creamy and easy to apply. I have wavy hair that is very dry and this smoothed all of my frizz and made my waves lay beautifully. Also this product will last forever on my hair, do not need to use a lot a little bit gets the job done.Please keep this product around I will be buying it every time I run out 😄

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: NOT A BAD BATCH ITS MOST OF THEM!!
Review: The consistency is like crumbly jello.I have seen videos where people have two of this product side by side one is thick liquid looking and the other like the solid glass jello type. Everyone thinks they just got a bad batch but when I looked futher into it these reports have been happening for years (possibly 5)I love OTHER shea moisture products but this one... not good.Do not get if you are struggling getting curl clumps, it can make hair stringy!

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a weird gel, the consistency of it is weird. At first I thought it was cold outside so it got like that when they delivered it. But it never changed consistency it’s not like a regular gel maybe that’s the way it’s supposed to be but it doesn’t go well in hair.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: One more step
Review: I haven’t purchased this product from Amazon but I will say that the hard jello consistency is the same if you buy it from a Beauty supply store. The formula has changed. I have found that if you put the product in a blender it will revert to gel like texture that we are used to. It is inconvenient but once you get it on your hair it works magic.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Terrible
Review: This is nothing like the product I’ve gotten before. Like other reviewers, the gel had the consistency of jello and was impossible to use.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: do not buy!!
Review: They changed the product to a jello-like consistency. It does not spread and crumbles on your hair. The company has admitted the product is defective but has done nothing to take it off the shelves. Save your money and buy from another company.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Smells heavenly!
Review: Has good hold and makes your hair smell amazing! Great product and I own the conditioner as well. The gel is great for curls and waves. Has been smoothing and again, heavenly scent!

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: awful
Review: This product is typically great but I wont ever buy it on here again.The quality of the product was awful.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Terrible
Review: This is like a solid gel. It was very clumpy and gooey in my hair.  Very difficult to work with and did not do anything for my hair expect to make it clumpy. Yuck!!

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Works great
Review: Great product. I like this brand and have tried a few of their products. This gel is very hydrating and a little goes a long way. It smells great and is prefect for thick curly hair.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Great for textured hair!
Review: Be careful! This product is definitely meant for ethnic hair. I made the mistake because it is curly girl approved! It was a bit heavy for my hair though. It smells amazing!

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: This is not the original product  this is lumpy and disgusting. I have been shopping around and cannot find the original.  Did they Dicontinue?

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Clumpy. Bad product.
Review: I wish I would have read the reviews. DO NOT BUY. VERY CLUMPY AND SHOULDN’T BE!

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Should be soft and not clumpy
Review: This product is suppose to be soft and NOT clumpy! But from hair store not amazon

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Terrible
Review: The worst experience. I was sticky the whole night. I thought that ants were going o come over me. The  next morning my hair was so hard. I will never buy this again.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: horrible
Review: trash. dont waste your money. just makes your hair sticky and gross and then you have to wash your hair again. instead get the Curl Talk Gel from Not Your Mothers. I use that every wash day after a leave in conditioner.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Trash
Review: It’s like jello consistency. It literally clumped up in my daughters hair.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Horrible for 4b/4c hair
Review: This product made my hair curly , however it felt like sandpaper. The texture is rough and NOT moisturizing at all!! I would NEVER recommend this or buy this again.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Not a gel
Review: Not a gel so hard could not use it

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Not your regular curly hair gel
Review: This gel is not it, I couldn’t even use it in my hair it wouldn’t dissolve it’s like hard jello. Very disappointed.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Clumpy
Review: It’s so clumpy why I thought this was a gel not what I expected 😩

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: THIS IS A KNOCK OFF VERSION! DO NOT BUY!
Review: Do not buy this it is a knock off. The texture is just hard gelatin and doesn’t spread like the real product does, just holds these hard chunks. I am pointing to the real product empty in the picture, you can see the subtle differences in packaging. EXTREMELY disappointing

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Great on my curls
Review: Loved how it styled my hair! My curls look great

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Bueno material
Review: Si llego bien

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Been using this line for awhile now and love everything about it
Review: Love

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: NO SIRVE
Review: Vino dañado como chicle

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Review: Shea moisture hit the texture right finally on this . Even if it's thick I heat it and let it melt abit .. this can't be used heavily and most times best on damp hair not soaking wet -tap dry abit .. and smoothe it in and trust me it allows whatever product u use after seem like woa!! Very moisturizing !!!This is also very great for finger  curls on hair... this takes some playing round with like how much u need and it's always minimal and how u use if to smooth in or if yo use alone without lean in .. based on the style I use no leave in etc etc thanks Shea moisture this leaves my hair so moisturized I cut it low TWA and it's same as when I had it long I have natural 3c 4a and some 4b curls ! I had to come here to say yessssss!!!

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Leaves hair greasy
Review: Left my hair feeling greasy. I guess other than that it works well but not worth using.

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Amazing and Reliable For Looks
Review: I really liked this product because it made my curls pop out more. It made my looks attractive because of shiny hair and the defined curliness. It’s worth your money and every time I run out I am willing to buy more. I recommend this to anyone who has curls and are interested in their looks

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Great product!
Review: Everything about this product is great. This product does dry hard similar to using gel. If that’s what you’re looking for then this is good. This wasn’t particularly what I was looking for because personally I don’t like my hair feeling crunchy like that. This also pairs really well with the shea moisture curling style milk. No complaints 5 stars

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: El producto está defectuoso, la consistencia es dura y no se deshace por completo al momento de aplicarlo en el cabello, debería ser más suave y aceitoso porque un mes antes compré uno en un viaje a Estados Unidos y la textura era completamente diferente. Que lástima que a méxico nos manden porquerías y no los productos reales

Product: Sheamoisture Curling Gel Souffle for Thick, Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus to Moisturize and Protect Hair 12 oz
Title: Report abuse

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Would definitely recommend
Review: OMG!!! I have tried so many products for my son's hair and this is by far the best! I haven't used the shampoo/ conditioner yet but the detangler and butter cream are wonderful.  They don't weigh down the hair and smell decent! The proof is in the pictures!!! Would definitely recommend

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Great product for mixed children
Review: I really like these products. My children are Caucasian/African American and have very curly hair. Their hair smells really good and is so soft after their baths. My oldest son has more coarse hair than my youngest and it will get very tangled after just sleeping but this product has definitely helped. I only give 4 stars because the shampoo/conditioner doesn’t lather how I would prefer and it’s a little difficult to get all over their thick hair. Besides that I love everything about it!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Good on soft loose curls as well
Review: I’m thoroughly pleased with these products. My son has very long curly hair that knots up in no time at all. His hair texture is medium, not too thin and not coarse either. I didn’t know if this product would be too heavy since his curls are on the looser side, but it wasn’t at all. He hates shampooing and conditioning, so making it one step has been awesome. I am traditionally very anti combined shampoo and conditioners because they never work on my hair. But this really does work and his hair is left feeling smooth and bouncy. I am concerned about it building up on his scalp or hair because their isn’t a true shampooing step here. But we’ve only just started using it. The curl butter is great. I put it in damp towel dried hair before bed and his hair is still relatively easy to comb out in the morning without detangling spray. The detangling spray is great as well. I’ve tried other Shea moisture brand detangler spray, it built up and left his hair feeling almost sticky if I used it more than once in between shampooing. Also tried two different Sun Bum/Baby Bum brand detanglers, and I wasn’t impressed with either of them and their smell was too strong. So far this set is winning. I recommend it.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Good for fine tighter curls
Review: My daughter has beautiful 3b/3c fine hair, also she's a toddler so I needed something easy. Now this doesn't lather, but it's more like a co-wash I suppose, her hair feels clean after,  not dry. The spray is not heavy on her hair or even on my fine wavy, it's great for detangling dry or wet hair (on curls I only recommend damp or wet not dry) . The curl butter is great on her hair, even on the consecutive days after wash day to freshen up, only a little tiny bit is needed on damp hair. The boys hair is 3a, 3b, its short so it doesn't need much product, but the shampoo and a tiny touch of curl butter looks amazing;) I love it's safety ratings on EWG, as opposed to other curl products out there.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Would have liked a full tub of curl cream.
Review: Well for starters the curl cream isnt even half full nor did it have any kind of seal. I’ve only used the detangler as I just got it & it worked pretty good!UPDATE- got a replacement & its no different. Not sealed & half full. So this is an error on the company.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: No Lather or moisture. Don't buy.
Review: I hate that there was little to no lather. Horrible shampoo and conditioner.  It was watery.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Great for toddlers and babies, not too heavy or greasy, smells amazing.
Review: I’ve had a hard time finding products for my toddlers hair because they’re all too thick, they make his hair greasy and his curls droopy. I had tried the SheaMoisture detangler before and loved it. It’s perfect for detangling and refreshing in between washes. The two in one shampoo and conditioner is great and makes washing fast and easy. It doesn’t have a real “lather” effect like plain shampoos if that is what you’re looking for, but I didn’t mind. The curl butter is also a nice texture and really only takes the tiniest amount. Each product has a good amount for how much you use on a kids head, not to mention they smell amazing. Overall it’s perfect for my sons hair that is very fine in texture but very thick.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Perfect for Kinky Biracial
Review: On the very first day I saw a difference in my daughters hair. She went from a puffy wavy Afro to curly Sue. Even when I washed her hair later that night I didn’t need any detangler because her hair was still detangled. When my daughter’s hair is wet, she has gorgeous spiral curls but once it’s dry and combed it turns into one big puff. These products allow me to style her hair without it losing any bounce or curl. I am very satisfied. The only con is; I will admit that the cream container isn’t completely full but I understand that this is a very good price and these are expensive, natural ingredients so for the price, I still have no complaints!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Small bottles
Review: Such small amount for the price.  It smells great.  The only problem I have with the curling butter cream is that it isn't sealed.  You opened it and bunch of cream falls out.  smh.  For the price I am paying,  I am not sure that it is worth it.  Won't be buying the trio again though.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Great for thick, curly kid hair
Review: Other, lighter formula detanglers and shampoos, like Johnson & Johnson's or Hello Bello's, worked okay on my kiddo's hair until she turned 5 or so. Then her hair became thicker and drier and those products just didn't cut it anymore. Her hair was like straw and got into knots so easily, combing her hair was a daily battle. In desperation, I turned to the internet and found this set. I'm so glad I did. It's true that the shampoo/conditioner has no lathering effect, but once you get used to that, it's fantastic. I've been using all three products for a few weeks now and they have made a dramatic difference. My kid's hair is soft and combable again, and she has curls instead of knots. I use the detangler spray in the AM before combing, followed by a dab of the butter curling cream on the dry ends of her curls. I wash her hair every other night with the shampoo/conditioner. A life-saver!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Great on my sons mixed hair
Review: My seven year old son has both Irish and Nigerian heritage.  His hair is brown, and as he has gotten older, it has gotten curlier and coarser.  This shampoo/detangler/cream keeps his hair clean, moisturized, soft, and shiny.  Thank you!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Great product!
Review: I purchased this for my 20 month old daughter. It smells great! We haven’t really used the cream yet. We wash her hair with the shampoo probably 2-3 times a week, but use the spray every morning. I spray a few squirts in my hand, mix with water, and run my fingers through her hair. I’ve noticed her curls are much more pronounced now and I think her hair is even softer.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Each product in this set of three has the slippery elm and marshmallow extracts. I was interested in trying the set because it is specifically for thick, wavy, and curly hair.The portion sizes of the products are extremely generous. The conditioner/shampoo two in one and the detangler are both 8 ounces while the butter cream is 6 ounces. Even the 6 ounce buttercream tub is quite big. Especially for how far it goes on kid hair.Up until now I have been doing two products- shampoo and conditioner for the kids. Anything to shorten the hair washing routine I am willing to try.The formula is a creamy and rich white. It has a subtle sweet smell that resembles a beach or sunscreen type scent. The main fragrance I pick up on in the product is coconut and it has just the slightest sweet scent of a flower. Because of this I find it appropriate for boys and girls.The detangling spray has an easy pump spray and has a slightly murky color to it. It smells similar to the two in one but almost has a little bit more of a licorice scent to it.It’s easy to use and definitely helps with the brushing of hair.The third and final step is to use the curling butter cream. It’s thick and rich but doesn’t require a lot. Of course it’s going to depend on how much hair the child has. It helps to control frizz and flyaways but it’s also helps with styling. My sons hair is quite thick so styling for him is simply brushing out and parting.This set of three really guides the user through each step from cleansing to detangling to styling. It’s all inclusive.I like that this is a safe product with no sulfates, parabens, phthalates or glycol. It’s a safer option than some of these salon products that aren’t necessarily for children. I would much rather use something that is free of harsh chemicals but just as effective.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have used Sheamoisture products myself for a few years, they’re great for hydrating curls and generally have a solid product line, so I was excited to see this bundle for kids. The products seem pretty similar to the adult versions and the strangling spray is one of the best I’ve ever used: it even rivals salon brands and detangles hair beautifully with a small amount of spray. The curl cream is beautiful too and really enhances my little ones curls. It’s a beautiful mousse like thick cream and it smells divine. The 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner was ok, and I will continue to use it, but I always feel like these products are quite drying and that you don’t get the full benefit that you would by using both shampoo and conditioner.  I deducted a star because I did find it more drying than what I would expect from Sheamoisture, but I do appreciate that some kids won’t put up with a 2 step shampooing and conditioning routine, so it might be perfect for them. Overall, it’s a great little set, and I would recommend it.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: My son absolutely loves these hair care products. The shampoo conditioner is perfect for him and easy for him to clean and condition it his hair at the same time. Th moisturizing cream curls his hair up and provides great moisturizer keeping his hair soft. The spray is great for the morning to refresh his curls and adds shine. All products smell amazing!! Highly recommend

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: It smells SO good!
Review: I know that the SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine is geared more for kids so I initially got it for my son who hates to have his hair brushed because he has curls like his momma but once I opened it and smelled it I loved the scent so much I started using it too and I'm so glad I did! We've always used shea moisture on our sons and has been a trusted brand in our household for many years. The detangler works great even on my long hair and for my son works out all his tangles with a lot less tears. He doesn't really need the cream so I use that by myself and it shapes and moisturizes my curls wonderfully and also seems to be helping with the damaged ends getting frizzy. All in all it is a great set. I would imagine this would be perfect for girls better as the scent is pretty feminine and I think is more geared towards longer hair. I for one am incredibly happy they came out with this scent and I'm definitely going to have to see if it is available for adults.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: There is nothing in the packaging and the product itself to call kids to want this set. There is a bottle of  shampoo/conditioner, another bottle of detangler and a jar of curling butter cream. The main ingredients are coconut, hibiscus, slippery Elm and marshmallow extract. The work KIDS is the only thing that has anything to do with children. I think that adults can use these products as well as kids. The scent is very light and I only smelled the coconut in the  shampoo/conditioner. The butter cream curling jar was not fully filled. It has the consistency of rice pudding and left my fingers. that I used to apply the cream to my hair, oily and shiny .

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Firstly, I love the smell of these products. The 2 in 1 shampoo/ conditioner is perfect as it’s quicker and more convenient as my daughter hates having her hair washed. The detangler spray works great too. It usually takes me a few attempts to brush through her hair as it’s so long & get tangled so easily. I haven’t used the finishing cream yet - but I’m sure it’ll be just as good as the other 2.The only downside to the shampoo is that it doesn’t lather. I think this is probably because it’s a 2 in 1 and so moisturising ?! Not sure. But still deserves 5 star rating.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Mother of two tendered curly headed wild boys lol I love the smell of this stuff and what it does in the hair. One main thing I’ve noticed is that it’s much gentle on their hair than most popular brands out there. They cry easily with the slightest tugs and tangles I have to get through but I found this making it slightly easier to do. I like to wash their hair in the tub as I find it easier to do it that way and with the shampoo and conditioner being combined it makes for a quicker wash day and less years from water in the eyes lol I like to use the detangler and cream on days apart from washes as well as it works very well with keeping their hair moisturizer and getting out the daily tangles for my their hair. After I apply I braid up their hair and it keeps it nice, moisturized and tangle free for a couple of days.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: My daughter loves her hair again!
Review: My daughter has really curly hair, and up until we stated using this product we were always straightening her hair. The hot iron was damaging her hair. Now that we’re using SheaMoisture KIDS and Shampoo trio, she feels confident with her hair being curly! This product really helps control the puffiness and leaves her curls looking bouncy and healthy. It’s moisturizing , have a lovely coconut scent, and really easy to use. We love SheaMoisture KIDS!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have two girls with two different hair types that require different products to be able to keep it manageable. I like that I can use this for both and it works well. I can detangle their hair easily and it makes the shampoo process easy and simple. It also makes the comb out process easy as well. I must say that it smells pretty amazing as well and leaves the hair feeling soft.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Nice Try-Me Set!!
Review: Not a bad set... the 2-in-1 wash and conditioner are more like a co wash, which makes it easy to use and the strangling spray works pretty well too. The curl creme is very lightweight and leaves a lot of shine and smoothness. It’s not the best product I have used for curls, but definitely good for normal days. My son did mention that it smelled like Play-doh, and I totally agree with that statement. He didn’t mind it at all, but I wasn’t a huge fan.It’s definitely a great set to figure out if this would be a good fit!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This trio has one winner in our family- the detangler. The detangler smells great and works wonderfully. It instantly loosens tangles and knots. It allows for easier brushing. On the other hand the curl cream was too heavy on my granddaughters ringlets and light curls. Even with a small amount of product it made her hair look oily. The shampoo conditioner combo did the same thing. It weighed her hair down and created an oily appearance to her hair. Maybe you will have better luck than us!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I really love this kids hair set. The shampoo is creamy, lathers well and leaves my daughters hair clean and easy to manage. The moisture cream smells wonderful and really keeps my daughters hair from feeling dry. The real gem of this set is the detangler spray. It has a hint of shimmery glitter that my daughter loves. It sprays evenly and smells nice. This spray makes my daughters hair so much easier to brush and has really improved our mornings getting ready for school!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love the body products by SheaMoisture but usually don't get the best results with the hair products. These are an exception, though. At least, so far- and hoping they continue to be! They're all gentle but effective. The detangler is probably my favorite since my daughter has very coiled hair and it helps a lot. The others work pretty well also and so far not drying- which is what has been the experience with some of the other products.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

I love the detangler. The shampoo/conditioner doesn’t lather which is different from other products but it cleans well! Overall, definitely worth a try for baby and toddler curls. Can’t beat it!
