Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: In love!
Review: Love all of these products and love this brand! I love what the brand stands for and how affordable it is for my family for high quality products!These 3 products all worked perfectly for my toddlers hair and will definitely keep purchasing!I used the detangle spray in my hair and I have really thick straight hair and it worked so well!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: love this
Review: best product only thing I use on my daughters hair

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Shampoo, Detangler and Cream For Moisture and Shine Coconut and Hibiscus Sulfate Free Kids Shampoo and Conditioner, 3.0 Count
Title: Report abuse
Review: I am so disappointed with this order. After taking nearly a month of coming it arrives with it being tampered with and barely any cream in the container!!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Did I just get scammed?
Review: I bought this for my daughters hair once and the formula was clear. We loved the smell and the detangling so much, I bought 3 bottles so we could keep a supply on the ready.The outside packaging was fine, but when I opened it, the bottles were slick with leaked product, and the labels were faded off in some places.The thing I really don’t understand is why 2 of the bottles have cloudy detangler and the third one is mostly clear. How can I be expected to use this on my daughter when now I’m not so sure this is even a legitimate product? Seriously disappointed.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Not the same product.
Review: One bottle is cloudy and one is clear. These are obviously not the same products. Arrived with cap off.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Not worth it imo
Review: Bought it because of a review of favorite youtuber (Jessica Braun) but it did not work for me. I am not a fan of its scent (it's sweet, especially the coconut) and I need to spray way too much for it to be effective, my hair turns wet. My favorite detangler is Not Your Mother's' 'Knotty to Nice' normally and I can't wait to get back to it as soon as possible. (Note: I have relatively light wavy, thin, oily hair.) If it is your first time and you aren't sure, not recommend it.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: fake bottle or formula changed
Review: Fake! I have ordered many bottles previously and they all have the same coconutty scent. I buy many bottles because there are several people in this home with very long and knotty hair. The last 4 bottles I ordered do not have the distinct smell, sprays like sticky water, and does not remove all the knots as in previous bottles. I AM NOT HAPPY WITH THIS.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Insect Inside
Review: I admit I didn't try it because when I went to use it on my granddaughter's hair I found there was an insect inside. Note that I received it on July 11th, two weeks ago, and it hadn't been opened. At least not by myself or my family.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: This Is Not The Real Product
Review: The first bottle I ordered of this looked like it had been rolling around in someone's trunk along with rocks for the last 5 years. Plus it had almost no smell and was only very, very slightly cloudy. AND, the bottle was sticky and not full. I contacted Amazon and they sent a replacement. Well, that one was worse. No lid and the bottle was full...of water. No cloudiness whatsoever. I use this product ALL THE TIME for my girl's hair and it is usually cloudy white. I don't know what is being sent out, but it is not the real product. Into the trash it went. Luckily, customer service is refunding my money and looking into the listing, so that no other unsuspecting customer gets scammed.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Product I received from Amazon wasn't quite the same as I received from the store
Review: I usually buy the product from the store but I came acrossed it on Amazon for a great deal. When I received the product almost It smelt the same and it had to be pearl white look to it where it's kind of shiny meaning the liquid but the whole bottle stays liquid like that even without mixing it up whereas the ones I get from the store seem to separate and the Pearl Light textured stuff goes halfway down the bottom and then the top half is more clear and you have to shake it I also noticed the stuff I received from Amazon doesn't seem to detangle or moisturize as well. I did read some reviews saying that the stuff they received was fake maybe that is a possibility I'm not a hundred percent sure but there's definitely something different about it. The bottles looked exactly the same but it did not come with a lid

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Great detangler for kid with lots of fine hair
Review: This is the one item I hoarded when the lockdown began: it works magic on my daughter’s hair and she loves the smell. I used to just use pure coconut oil, but her hair is fine so if I don’t braid it oil makes it heavy. She has a lot of hair and likes to wear it out, this detangler is light and saves both of us from tears too.The smell is sweet but not overpowering and doesn’t linger too long.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Fraudulent Product -- Buyer Beware
Review: This was most definitely NOT a legitimate product. We're long time users of this detangler in particular and I couldn't make it to the store so I decided to buy online. Biggest mistake ever.I got opinions from several people comparing the seemingly toilet water mixed with white mica powder and a dab of cheap conditioner that just all sits at the bottom to the legitimate product and everyone agreed I got ripped off.  Even the label was faded and gross as if it'd been dumpster dived, filled up and resold.I ended up having to just fill my old bottle with conditioner and hot water for the time being. There is no way I'm putting my daughter's health in danger with this unknown concoction that smelled like cheap conditioner and butt. I'm utterly disappointed and Amazon doesn't accept returns on beauty products. Stay away and just take a trip to Walmart if you can.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Works great for my friend's daughter's hair, not great for my daughter though...
Review: Let me start out by saying that this product works great for my friend's daughter's curly  hair! That's why I purchased it for my daughter for her wavy hair. It doesn't seem to work as well on her's for some reason. Her hair tends to get really tangly and matted in the back and she refuses to wear it up to avoid tangling during the day. This detangler didn't really do anything for detangling her hair so that I could brush it out. Her hair was dry when I sprayed it on so maybe if I try it when her hair is wet? It does smell amazing and it did moisturize her hair without being greasy at all and I sprayed a lot of it on her hair so that's a nice thing. I don't know if I will purchase again though.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Awesome stuff
Review: I stay stock on this.  I usually don't like shea moisture products but this detangler is the truth.  I have 4c hair and my kids 4a and it works great for all of us.  Nice light scent.  Moisturize and detangles without weighing down the hair.  I love it

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Do not buy
Review: So I was looking for a good detangler to use on my daughters hair and this is what I received. After almost two and a half weeks of waiting for my package to arrive, I get a bent up bottle (the packaged itself was fine) with a sticky tar or jam like substance on it.. and the label of the bottle is worn out like the bottle had been recycled or used previously. I didn’t dare use it on mine or my daughters hair but I’m pretty sure this isn’t the real deal just from the appearance and quality of the bottle I received. I don’t usually leave reviews but they have the right one today. This “product” will be going in the trash and my money will be refunded back into my account. At least the Amazon  customer service bots were helpful.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Love this Product!!
Review: I have really long hair and this stuff is great!  I used to buy the one for adults of the same brand that I absolutely hate, but had bought this for my daughter at the same time and I ended up using it.  I have really fine individual hairs, but have so many of them that I actually have incredibly thick hair as a whole.  On top of that it is really wavy, setting up the perfect storm for issues with brushing.  Just a couple squirts of this and I am able to brush my hair…oh, and it works well for my daughter’s hair too.  We have bought this product repeatedly and intend to continue doing so.  I definitely recommend!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Good product but terribly shipped
Review: Was missing the protective cap and had started to leak in the delivery box.  Also doesn't spray out... only dribbles.  Of course the seller doesn't do refunds or exchanges... it seems to be a good product but skip the hassle and buy in store or from another seller.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Fake item, do not buy!
Review: This item took over 2 weeks to be delivered, when it arrive it was not sealed and with no cover. I tried to return the item and it states not eligible for return. I believe it's water in the bottle and nothing else. I will not be putting this item in my child' s hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: The scent is delicious!
Review: I love this detangler, it smells so good and works like a dream! I know it is listed as a product for kids, but I have used it for years. It is difficult to find, so I was very pleased to find it on Amazon with a lower price than Target.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Great for kids or adults
Review: My daughter has hair thats right in between 3A and 3B and hated having her hair brushed but this spray makes things super easy right after washing her hair. Plus it makes her curls super bouncy and it has a nice smell to it. If you don't like the marshmallow smell it may be over powering at first but you get used to it after the 3rd time or so. Honestly the results alone are worth ignoring the smell while brushing

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: FAKE PRODUCTS???
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Got three bottles. One doesn’t have any wrapping nor cap, label faded off. They don’t look legit at all. The liquid is clear and the scent is strange. Doesn’t have the cloudy/ pearly white color like the one I got from the store. Also the bottles are sticky leaking everywhere. What a ripped off I got!! What is going on?

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Used Product?
Review: Product arrived without a cap, leaking, with the labeling rubbed off and smeared. I haven’t used it, and am hesitant to do so judging on the appearance. Did I get a used and returned product? The scent is very faintly of coconuts but it seems watered down. Everything else that I ordered in the same package arrived in perfect condition so I know it wasn’t damaged in shipping.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Old or used product
Review: When I went to use this I realized the label was worn in places and there was no cap on it. I squirted it because if it's new it should take a few pumps before squirting anything but it sprayed right away so it's been used. This is the first time using it so I don't know what it should smell or look like. Found out it's not eligible for return.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: I have ordered this before and it is a great product delivered in a timely fashion in perfect shape. This time I ordered 2 bottles and they came without caps on the top so they were leaking and the labels looked like the bottles were old or beat up.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Great for toddler hair
Review: I use this product on my toddler hair . She gets a lot of knots in the back of her head from rubbing her head during her sleep. It’s very good product for hydrating her hair and making it manageable to style . Her hair is very thin and it’s not heavy doesn’t make it look greasy . If I have to say a downside it would be that you have to really really shake it before use . If you forget you’re basically just using water with all the product sitting on the bottom of the bottle or straight product caking on her hair.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Cap missing and appeared opened
Review: Spray came without a cap and bottle looked damaged and used.  Contacting Amazon since they do not allow refund/return for this product.  Seems like bad customer service to send a damage product and then not rectify the problem.  In general when I bought this product from cvs it is great. I refuse to use an open container on my kids for safety.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: DON'T BUY
Review: Along with the others, I forgot to read the reviews before I ordered the product. I am a busy mom and I ordered it out of convenience. I buy all these products for my baby. Now, I still have to go to the store and replace the product. I'm not comfortable using this on my baby because it is not sealed and slightly damaged. The scent is not correct. Something that was supposed to be easy for me just became complicated... please stop this seller from selling more of this product.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Must buy clean great product
Review: Bought for my daughters unruly dry curly hair and sensitive skin. Immediate difference with softness and shine so tried it for myself who is very into clean safe products. My hair feels amazing! So soft just ordered for myself

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Watered down version of original product!!
Review: I am very unhappy with this product. I have bought this for years in the store and I decided to take a chance on ordering from Amazon. This is NOT the original formula, it's just a watered-down version with barely any scent and does absolutely nothing to my son's thick, curly hair. Trying to return for a refund but it says it's not eligible for some reason. I just received this yesterday so I know it's within the 30-day window.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Don’t buy it’s FAKE
Review: I smell a huge lawsuit!!!! I’ve been using this product on my daughters hair for like 2 years and I know it’s supposed to be thick white creamy consistency. Well I got this and thought maybe the formula changed?! I called the company and they said nope. So I had a replacement sent out same thing. Imagine if the actual product has been replaced with something super toxic and people who hadn’t used it ever thought this was the real deal but their child’s hair started falling out, imagine the devastation !!!! Who ever is doing this should be ashamed of themselves!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: I use this all of the time!
Review: It’s been my go to hair product for my one year old daughter. It works well for her type of hair (mixed). I also use their other products and have read these reviews. Mine have never showed up opened or destroyed. I have bought roughly five times within this last year. I use it often along with their other products.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Not just for kids!!
Review: SO GLAD I GOT THIS. My hair has been super dry lately and trying to brush it when wet has been a nightmare. This not only makes your hair smells amazing (and dry quicker, I’ve noticed) but it works wonders to de tangle!! It keeps my hair soft and shiny as well. Sometimes I spritz a little extra as I curl it in the mornings and it keeps it shiny and soft without feeling oily.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Amazing detangler, smells great!
Review: This is such a life saver! My daughter has really long, fine hair. She is really harsh on her hair and absolutely hates having it brushed out. I put this in after the shower and it brushes right out...so much less pain...for both of us!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: It came beat up looking.
Review: Its alright. I used it on my baby it works for his hair but probably wouldn't work on an adult with full head of hair because it dosnt work for my hair type full and curly, It had no safty seen or safty cap and the sticker was faded like it had been from somone who possibly dumpster dove for it, unprofessional and kind of sus.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: The best
Review: My daughter's hair just by looking at it tangles. It's wavy but more curly as you get to ends. She's also tender headed this is a huge lifesaver. I just spray give it a min and than part sections spary a little more in dry areas and we end up with detangled hair and argument free. She's 9 1/2. Lord help me.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Not the same product as in store
Review: When purchased, I notice the product has some shimmer within the liquid, but it it mostly clear. When I purchase this product in store, the liquid is cloudy and the shimmery substance settles to the bottom of the bottle. The cap was not taped and most of the contents leaked from the bottle.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Works really well and doesn’t weigh down curls
Review: This stuff works so well for curly hair! It smells great and I also like that it is high on the list for EWG “safe products”. The bottle lists a bunch of chemicals that it is free of which is a huge plus because I mainly use it on my kids. I use it on my hair occasionally (thick, wavy/curly) and it really helps detangle. I’m happy with it and glad it’s less expensive then what we used previously.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Horrible
Review: This product it just terrible. From what I read on other reviews I should have jus purchased this from an in store retailer. The version I was sent from here was garbage. The spray top doesn’t work at all. Also the actual product left clumps in my sons hair. Amazon did refund me but just want to forewarn people.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Honestly, wow.
Review: I’ll be honest I HATE the smell, it makes me so upset lol. But the detangling is the absolute best thing in the world. I am forever going to use this product on my child’s hair. He says EVERYTHING hurts when it comes to his hair but this stuff I don’t hear a PEEP. It’s honestly the best invention in the world for tangles 10/10 would recommend 🙌🏼

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Disgusting
Review: Not the correct product! No cap! The label looks old!! Looks like someone filled a fake product in the bottle! Buyer beware!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: non refundable, bottle opened, liquid spilled, label peeled off, liquid inside not clear.
Review: non refundable, bottle opened, liquid spilled, label peeled off, liquid inside not clear and different from target version. Can't use since and been trying to return and unable. would give a zero if possible. very upset.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Everyday use!
Review: My daughter has thick crazy hair and we use this every day after bath and the tangles brush out so gently and easily! We even use it in between baths when her hair is tangled or wind blown and it makes brushing so much easier! I love that you can use it on wet or dry hair and it doesn’t leave her hair greasy

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Product Cap Not Sealed
Review: There was nothing to hold the cap of the detangler product to the bottle of liquid and once I opened the LARGE envelope, the cap was separate from the bottle and the bottle was moist from the product leakage. Did not return since it was a small amount of leakage, but would suggest a smaller mailing package or something to seal/hold cap onto spray bottle. Product smells great.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Don’t Recommend 👎🏻
Review: Nope I used this on clean hair and it did not help with frizz and made my hair very crunchy 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻 It also smells a little weird like play dough

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Horrible packaging.
Review: I use this on my toddler. Great product. First time I had issues but the packaging was sad and effortless.  This item had no lid on it. Came open in transit and soaked the box and other products. There is none left to use. Disappointing.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: love this stuff so much
Review: i have tried every detangler and this is the best thing ever. i love there products and wont use anything else ever again anymore .this is the best. it doesn't stay in your hair afterwards so no grossness and smells great

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Extra Moisturizing Detangler for Curly Hair Coconut and Hibiscus Kids Detangler with Shea Butter 8 oz
Title: Not sure it's the real deal!

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: This is awesome!
Review: My oldest daughter has long, fine, straight hair. It has the ability to get epically tangled after a day of playing. This stuff works wonders to help keep her hair soft and shiny. The smell is lovely and doesn't last long, which is nice since we're not into scented beauty products. We've tried other detanglers (Original Sprout had too many weird ingredients and the smell was over-powering--CA Baby detangler didn't help detangle) and none have worked as well as this one for the long hair. Good stuff. I definitely recommend it. I even like to use it in my hair if I need a quick little fix to get my fine, straight hair to cooperate. The ingredients are all easily recognizable too. If we hadn't found the awesome and amazing Apple Valley shampoo bars for our hair, I would even consider the Shea Moisture shampoos, but we're trying really hard to decrease our use of plastic bottles and bar soaps work well in that department.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: A miracle, honestly!!
Review: My hair is super damaged as a result of rebounding my hair for years. Brittle, frizz, split ends... Also, my hair is quite thick. This product is UNBELIEVABLE!!! If you like coconut scent and are in need of a real miracle, try this. I have used it both in wet and dry hair. Honestly, I like the results better on dry hair. I use a little bit after the shower, before using a hair turban towel. Then, once I let it air-dry, I apply abundantly over my ends and general hair frizz. The result is really like a miracle for my hair. The downside of the product is the price!! But, oh well, something that works!!!!!!

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: Miracle spray!
Review: Oh my!!! This stuff is a miracle worker!! I have searched and used so many products on my toddlers very spiral curly hair that knots just from a sneeze. This spray has gotten rid of the knots in just a few minute process! We use it in conjunction with the tangle ease brush and it works wonders!! So happy! It says not to wash it out but we usually put it on dry hair, brush then leave it in over night. We have also washed it out and it didn't seem to make a major difference.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: Amazing for my daughters tangly bed head
Review: I cant say enough about this product. I bought this a year or so ago for my toddler daughters hair. She wakes up with a rat's nest on her head, especially in the winter with her flannel sheets. This isnt the cheapest detangler but also not the most expensive. I thought when her first bottle ran out I'd try a cheaper brand and I was SO disappointed that I returned it and bought this one again. It makes the hair almost oily to untangle it but it dries with no residue. I just spray a few sprays, work it in a bit and gently brush through with my Wet brush. The pics speak for themselves!

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: Detangle? Yes. Moisturize? Not for low porosity hair. Anti-Frizz? NOPE!
Review: So this spray claims to do 3 things: stop frizz, moisturize, and detangle. Lies. It only manages to detangle (I've only tried it on normal knotted hair. I don't know how it would perform on matted hair). I have 3b, medium density, low porosity, medium thickness, armpit-length hair. I spray the detangler, detangle my hair, but then start feeling it dry and frizz up not even 2 minutes later. I add different conditioners and stylers on top to try to tame it and it has limited success in moisturizing but still fails at controlling the frizz.It might be the coconut that is drying it out/making it feel hard since my hair is low porosity, so I wouldn't complain if putting an added conditioner would counteract that. But no. The frizziness is what ruins this for me. How can a product claiming to be anti-frizz make your hair more frizzy after application than before? Insanity. I won't be trying it again.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: I'd order from a different seller and give the product another chance because I love the rest of this line
Review: The bottles were not sealed and one had leaked all over the packaging. I hadn't used the coconut & hibiscus detangler from SheaMoisture before but it was VERY thin and watery compared the the coconut detangler SheaMoisture sells. The product I received does not have a strong smell. I had ordered the coconut & hibiscus shampoo and conditioner and curl smoothie for my daughters curly curly locks from a different Amazon seller and those products all had a pleasant strong smell and creamy thick consistency. I think I would order this detangler again but not from OxKom. I'd order from a different seller and give the product another chance because I love the rest of this line!

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: Great for most hair types!
Review: After using Suave Detangler for way too long on my 4 year old daughter's very long slightly wavy and often unmanageable hair, this was amazing! It made styling so much easier and I didn't need to use nearly as much. She has fine hair, but a lot of it and her hair wasn't greasy or weighed down from this product. I imagine this will be even more useful for my other daughter who has curlier hair when she gets a bit older.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: This stuff is AMAZING!
Review: I bought this for my son who is about to turn 1 next week. My kids are mixed, I am Puerto Rican and Panamanian and my husband is Greek. Both my boys are very hairy. My son has curly, fine hair. When he sleeps or lays on his back, the back of his hair tends to get matted and knotted. I spray this stuff all over his dry hair and then directly in the matted parts. I didn’t even need to use a comb, I literally separated them with my fingers! I am going to but tons of this stuff because I plan on using for my long, curly hair!

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: Nope Nope Nope!
Review: I was really disappointed with this. I use the 2-in1 shampoo and conditioner on my child’s curls and liked it well enough. This, however, is awful. It’s like a bottle of water with a hint of coconut smell. I saturated a curl, yes just one curl, and no go. I tried over and over and sprayed more and more and not a single tangle was detangled nor did his hair look moisturized. Maybe I got a knock-off? Returning and getting the previous Cantu brand spray. It wasn’t great but way better than this.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: Softening and detangling
Review: I got this for my daughter who has 3c/4a hair and this makes detangy her hair a breeze, she never says "ouch" anymore and barely notices when I am detangling her hair. It does not condition on its own or moisturizes the hair long term though, (which isn't its primary use) so I follow up with my favorite leave-in conditioner (Soultanicals Knot Sauce) and she's good to go. Anything with slippery elm and marshmallow root in it is going to provide amazing slip and this product is very much a staple in our house now. I use it on my 4b hair and it works AMAZINGLY well to rehydrate my protective hairstyle and helps me brush through my ends while retwisting my twists.5/5 would recommend.

Title: amazing.
Review: My daughter and I both have very thick, wavy hair and I usually keep mine short just to avoid tangles and the ouch of dealing with them - but kiddo has hair down to the middle of her back and loves it long *sigh*. many, many mornings spent with her in tears just for me to get it brushed for school - no more!! This stuff works miracles, leaves her hair ever so soft and smelling tropical and sweet! Honestly can't say enough good things. Let's leave it that I pay out the rear end to pay the international shipping fees to import this line of product to japan for myself and my girl. Ty shea moisture!

I have used it now every time I have washed my hair and it seemed to help get the knots out without losing as much hair as I normally do when brushing out - I am 5 foot 9 in tall in my hair is down to my knees for reference. It also seems to add some volume to my hair as well. I don't notice the fragrance as being strong or overpowering. I plan on buying this detangler again.

It makes her hair soft, manageable and it looks healthy, wavy and full of body. I use the detangler spray in conjunction with the curling butter cream. The scent is wonderful as well and she loves it!...I am sticking with this one for a while! :)

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2

This applied with a detangle hair brush made for a no tear/tantrum hair brushing and it’s a god sent LOL best purchase I have made in 2020 haha!!

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2

It is really oily, so that is probably what caused it.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2

Review: This detangler spray is the best I’ve tried! I have very long hair to my lower back, and I have two step daughters with tangly hair every day. This really helps make brushing easier. It does what it says it does- makes hair soft and smooth, helps tangles go away, and smells delightful.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2

Review: Three stars because it definitely gets all the tangles out which makes hair brushing much easier (and less painful), however, it also left my daughters hair looking very greasy. She has thick, wavy hair and it looked like it needed to be washed. On the other hand, my middle daughter has very tight curls and her hair didn't appear as greasy. Wish I didn't buy the two pack because I'll never use both for this reason.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: The Only Detangler That Works
Review: My kid does not have curly hair, he has 'wavy' hair. But, we prefer products that don't have a lot of ingredients that we cannot pronounce and that we don't want in his hair. We only wash his hair once and week and we do condition. We only use products with few ingredients that are as natural as possible. This detangler we have been using for over a year, perhaps two. We have tried four other "Natural" detanglers and they just don't work that well. They get tacky very quickly and they feel as though they need to be washed out right away. One even didn't seem to help at all, only seemed to make the hair wet and smell good, but did nothing to help.Like all detanglers, it isn't going to undo the knots for you. But it helps the hair slide and undo better than anything else we've tried and I now use this exclusively. I think it is the coconut oil that is really doing the trick with us, but I can't be sure.But it works! And we don't have to wash it out right away and it smells nice.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2

I love the fact theres no sulfates or anything to mess her hair up. Shes 2 and I'm very concerned about what goes on her hair. Thank you for being such a great product at a great price

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus KIDS Extra Moisturizing Detangler, Slippery Elm & Marshmallow Extracts, Anti-Frizz, Moisture & Shine for Thick, Wavy, Unruly Hair, Spray In & Leave-On, 8 oz, Pack of 2
Title: Great on baby with tangled hair
Review: Update : 12/2020Reordered the item,  both bottles came unscrewed and leaking. I opened the box before most of the product leaked so i was happy at first, i tightened the bottles and figured maybe they were just rushing to ship them out.. the problem is the formula is different.  (Or they sent me a diluted ones). I bathed my daughter and use it on her as usual and it is not untangling her hair nor it doesn't smell like anything.  It just smells like water.. very disappointed.........Original post:My daughter unfortunately inherited my tangles.  She was born with long hair and I obviously did not want to hurt her by brushing her hair. After searching,  I found this. I am IN LOVE and so is she. She is now 19 months and we use about 2 sprits on my palms for her whole head (so little goes a long way here) after showers. Focus on the knots and try to work it in but dont saturate that its dripping (like I said, you only need a little). The product is magic. It smells great and it untangles in no time. I use it with her pink wet brush. Great combo .

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus Kids Curling Butter Cream, 6 Ounce, 2Pack
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Ok first the smell I am in love with....but you have to be a coconut fan. But did I say it smells good - ok yes - so I bought this for my biracial son who has medium curls and mixed texture hair - smooth on the top and coarse in the back - it makes his curls more defined and soft but it does not give a lot of hold -I like that this product does NOT contain any parabens, sulfates or phthalates....Overall if you are a fan of coconut and are looking for something to give soft definition to curls this is your answer....

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus Kids Curling Butter Cream, 6 Ounce, 2Pack
Title: It. Works.
Review: For the vast majority of my life I've had the frizziest hair ever. Brown bears waking up after a winter-long slumber have sleeker hair then me. I bought this stuff from Target several years ago, figuring I was wasting my money on another product that wouldn't work. Well I was wrong. It has tamed my frizz - even when I don't use it after a shower, my frizz is so much better then it used to be. I'm a grown woman but I love the scent of the children's so that's what I use. I have to buy it on Amazon now - not sure if it was discontinued in stores or if it's so popular I can never find it. Either way, highly recommend.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus Kids Curling Butter Cream, 6 Ounce, 2Pack
Title: Works great!
Review: Ive tried many others for my daughter. This one is the best.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus Kids Curling Butter Cream, 6 Ounce, 2Pack
Title: Not satisfied
Review: It came fully package and closed. But the amount that’s in there for the price , it’s kinda skimpy if you ask me. I bought this item in stores and it came with alil bit more. I had to turn to buying from the seller because there weren’t none in stores. Overall I gave the ingredient quality a 1 because I don’t like how it’s not filled up like I thought it would of been. But it works great on my kids hair, Shea moisture has been my go to for my kids hair for 7 years now. As of today I use their kids baby shampoo , 2 in 1 shampoo and conditioner, their kids lotion even shampoo, conditioner and leave in conditioner for myself. Great Products, just wanted a little more quality for the price.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus Kids Curling Butter Cream, 6 Ounce, 2Pack
Title: Love!!!
Review: I can not tell you how much we love this stuff! I have two daughters with curly hair as well as myself, each of us with different curl types. This has been the best universal curl product we have found! It smells amazing, feels amazing, and forms beautiful soft bouncy curls that are very easy to refresh!!!

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus Kids Curling Butter Cream, 6 Ounce, 2Pack
Title: Great Curl Definition!
Review: This product is moisturizing for my hair without leaving and product build up. It defines my curls Nd there's minimum shrinkage. I know it states it's for kids but I find this product to work well for my 3c/4a mix curls. Other products can be to harsh or not enough hold. I'll only only have to apply this product after a wash and it'll hold the curl definition for 3-4 days with re application. Oh and it smells amazing!

Title: Bette than expected

This product really works for us as it smells good, has very little residue and it keeps her hair moisturized without the ugly build up.  I am very impressed and very satisfied.

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut & Hibiscus Kids Curling Butter Cream, 6 Ounce, 2Pack
Title: Tames the bed head frizz!
Review: I have 2 kids with super curly hair. I don’t have curly hair AT ALL so it’s been a struggle to learn how to maintain their lovely locks. I started using this after bath time and it really helps hold their curls, even after sleeping. They do still have some noticeable bed head that I use another product to take BUT it is a huge difference from the tangles and frizz they used to wake up with. I don’t shampoo their hair every night but I do get it wet before using this because their hair is fine (they’re 2 and 4) and if it’s dry, it’s too sticky/heavy. This probably wouldn’t be a problem for kids with tighter curls or coarser hair though. I am so glad I tried this because it really works and now my kids have gorgeous curls instead of wild rats’ nests. And it smells great!

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz
Title: Best scent and beautiful curls
Review: Love this shampoo!  It doesn't lather. Which I like, not sure why that's an issue for some. There is no need for shampoo to lather other than we have been conditioned to think that's the only way our hair will be clean.  This product cleans great, smells great and hydrates my toddlers curls! I won't use anything else leans!

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz
Title: Perfect for my son’s textured hair
Review: My son is mixed Mexican/Black and has beautiful curls. I was struggling to find something that would keep his hair from drying out. Finally found it! This product is great and makes bath time easy with only one step for his hair (I used to shampoo and condition his hair). Now I only massage this in and let it sit for a couple minutes and rinse. And it smells great! He loves it.

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz
Title: Not my favorite Shea Moisture product
Review: This does not suds up, which is supposed to be better for hair, but it doesn’t seem like it got my daughter’s hair clean. Her hair is long and thick in the back, and it was hard to massage into her scalp. The directions say to massage into hair & scalp for 3-5 minutes. Who has time or energy for that, lol? Especially since her hair doesn’t seem clean after messaging for 5 minutes. Also, I still needed to use a leave in conditioner to comb it, so I wasn’t impressed with the conditioning aspect either. I’ll stick with the Shea Moisture Baby Shampoo & Body Wash.

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This 2-in-1 is awesome! It smells amazing, untangles hair so well, but it doesn’t lather/get soapy like traditional shampoo or 2-in-1. It is kind of expensive for the amount you get, if you have long hair like my daughter and I, so for someone with shorter hair you’ll get more bang for your buck! Overall, really good and a great, trusted brand.

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz
Title: Great for biracial hair
Review: My kids are biracial, so their hair has different textures. This shampoo/conditioner smells great and keeps their hair moisturized, especially when combined with the detangling spray.

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz
Title: Good but doesn’t foam
Review: Good but doesn’t foam

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz
Title: This shampoo has terrible curds inside
Review: I tried to use this shampoo yesterday and it was as there were curds inside- I guess this was the conditioning part- I couldn’t make them to dissolve- they were all over my grandson’s hair It was terrible I couldn’t get rid of them I am sorry I didn’t try it earlier so I would be able to return it

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz
Title: Pretty good
Review: My 2 year old curly girl doesn’t love having her hair washed so this has been very helpful and it makes her curls look good for the most part— I have found I have to be as an actual shampoo every 3-4 washes though or her hair starts to look like it has buildup, you know that kind of dill waxy look? Yeah. I’ll still buy it again though!

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz
Title: Smells great until after dries.
Review: This brand has some great products but not this ooone. I bought this product for my daughter. To be fair it was for curly hair which she does not have. Only option available.  I was so excited it smelled amazing out of the bottle. I made sure I rinsed it really well but afterwards it made her hair look super greasy. The smell when it dried almost smelt like plastic. DO NOT RECOMMEND. If you haasave curly hair might be great. Except for weird smell.

It does smell heavenly.  I'm also not sure if its tear free so I just try to keep out of his eyes just in case.  I won't be purchasing again.

Title: Best shampoo for curly hair
Review: I love this shampoo & conditioner mix, it doesn't have all that junk most shampoos have and it leaves my daughter's curls nice and soft yet curly at the same time. Oh and I love the smell, makes me want to keep hugging her all day 😅

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz
Title: Gets out even the worst tangles
Review: My toddler has long, thick, curly hair. No matter what she gets in it (candy, syrup, etc), this shampoo combo gets it out! It even gets out the worst tangles thanks to the slippery elm. And it smells amazing. It doesn’t suds like just shampoo would. It goes on like a conditioner and coats the hair. By the time it’s been left on long enough, every tangle falls right out with a bit of combing.

Product: Sheamoisture 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner for Kids Coconut and Hibiscus Coconut Oil for Hair and Dry Curls 8 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: Nice product; horrible handling
Review: I was looking for a light cream to use for my 4 month old.  I like how it leaves her hair.  I heard people mention how the product cakes in the hair,  only a small amount is needed and it has to be rubbed in.  My only issue is that tough it smells great, the scent isn’t light. Also another issue not with the product but the seller.  This product arrived with the top broken  and it seemed as it the product was less than what was supposed to be there but I don’t think it had been used.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: Not sure what everyone's talking about mine was full
Review: I'm not exactly sure why the other reviews were expecting this to be filled to the brim...but it was literally the same amount you get at the store. If it was shooken up it's more likely from poor package handling of the drivers . Anyways my baby boy has super curly hair the back of his hair required more moisture than the front due to friction from sleeping on cotton material, this product helped put so much life back into his hair I love it and would recommend for anyone with dry hair . I even use it in the back of my head (kitchen) and it makes the texture super soft . I love this stuff

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: Not greasy, makes curls soft!
Review: My son was getting a serious ratty frizz spot on the back of his head from sleeping/car seat. Nothing worked very well and I tried a lot of conditioners/sprays etc. This cream is thick but not greasy, smooths his curls out and smells amazing!! A little goes a long way, so it will last a while.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: BAD SERVICE
Review: Am not very happy with this order. I bought this product for eight months old because of her hair and I was recommended this shea moisture product. First of all this product wasn't sealed properly and packaged came spilled all over. Secondly the products was half way gone. I feel like crying 😢. As an Amazon prime member I expect nothing but a satisfactory services and product authentication where necessary.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: Never Again
Review: I had purchased this after seeing a glowing review video. The first order I received, both containers were opened, one unsealed (looked as if it had been used and returned maybe?) and opened the second was unsealed and had big holes poked into the inner seal. I returned for an exchange. I had received the items, both sealed properly upon inspection. I tried the product and I felt like Christina on Mommy Dearest when she got into the setting lotion and Mommy chopped her hair. I could not comb or brush through my hair. needless to say, I returned it and I sticking with what I was previously using.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce

Review: I love this product. It has helped my sons curls pop out more! I use this every night he gets a bath. Highly recommend!

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: The worst stuff.
Review: I received yesterday. The seal of the top is open (broken). It looks fake stuff. It deserves 0 star.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: Missing product!
Review: It came with a big hole in the middle! A lot of miss product. Smells really good.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: Smells so good
Review: I bought this for my daughter. Her hair is so curly and it gets frizzy. It also does not stay in place very well. I use this when I pull her hair up and it holds her baby hairs all day. She is 1.5 so if it can hold her hair though all the hyperactive toddler activities it can hold anything.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: Good product
Review: My grandson is mixed and has curly hair. His hair was always dry and never looked like it had been combed. I bought this for him and  told his mom to use it daily. Now he has pretty curls. I also bought the detangling spray so his hair would be easier to comb. I highly recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: Works well; use sparingly
Review: This smells so good and works well for curly hair. Use sparingly or you will have a greasy wet look.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: Smells so nice.
Review: This product smells so great! I love the smell of shea butter! My niece has hair that goes everywhere and this stuff really tames her hair and shows off her beautiful curls. Amazon did a horrible job shipping this item. It was shipped with a book and neither was protected and the box was oversized.  For anyone who doesnt know, UPS has a drop policy of 6 feet. This means that items sent through UPS are supposed to be packaged to withstand a 6 foot drop. This doesnt mean that UPS throws your item around, but you know, thing happen. Had Amazon used some bubble wrap around this item or a smaller box or anything, the lid would have broken and the book would not have ripped. No fault to the manufacturer of this item. The item is great. You may want to consider what other items you purchase along with this item though. Even though the lid broke, the item barely leaked out, which is great.

Product: SheaMoisture Kids Coconut & Hibiscus Curling Butter Crème, 6 Ounce
Title: My product came in and it looks like it was used.
Review: It looks like it's been used. My first time opening it.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Meh
Review: I love the smell of this lotion!  Its very moisturizing. BUT...it doesn't squeeze well through the lid.  I have to remove the lid every time I use it.  Its almost too thick for the bottle.  The bottle crumples when squeezing it out. It almost would do better in a container rather than a bottle .  Other than that flaw it's a great lotion!

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: I love the product but...
Review: I love the product, it is not the first time I buy it (although is the first time with this seller). I know it works amazingly on my skin. Nevertheless, this is the first time that the bottle arrives missing some product. I feel disappointed. If I pay for an amount of product is it weird to expect that amount?

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Amazing moisturizer!
Review: I love this moisturizer. I wanted to stop using coconut oil because it was so thick and greasy that I always felt uncomfortable in bed or even when I went out. I wanted something that was going to moisturize my skin very well but still soak in quickly. That’s exactly what I got. It makes my skin feel extremely smooth and moisturized. Definitely worth the price!

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Smell overpowering
Review: The smell is over powering. I wouldn’t wear this to bed. Ima keep it as a hand lotion. It is very moisturizing. If anyone is familiar with that hair line it smells exactly like it. So it’s weird I feel like I’m putting on conditioner. I’m not sure about being for sensitive skin

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Love the lotion, hate the container!
Review: Please sell this lotion in a jar not a bottle!! I love the lotion. It is thick and creamy and not greasy. The lotion absorbs well, preventing frequent application. The smell is luscious.That being said, because of the thickness of the lotion, it is almost impossible to get out of the bottle! I finally resorted to actually using a bread knife (a dangerous prospect) to slice through the bottle so that I could transfer the lotion to a jar!!!Otherwise, a great product.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Nice
Review: Makes skin appear tone and smooth. I have already purchased my second bottle

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Smells delightful
Review: I have sensitive skin and I loved this stuff! It makes my skin super soft and smells SO good! I pair it with the coconut hibiscus sugar scrub and can’t say enough how much I like it. Definitely my favorite scent and lotion!

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Scent and moisturizing
Review: I like better the one with the Passiflora and pistachio scent. I could only get the bar of soap but how I wish I had he lotion. Did you discontinue it? It's smell do good.***the picture I sent you, above, is the one I would like; it smells so good. Do you still sell it? Like better than the coconut scent. Tq

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Hard to get out the bottle
Review: I like the scent of this lotion and the silky feel of it, but I don’t find it very moisturizing the way some more traditional lotions are. However, my biggest issue is that the bottle is just wrong for the this lotion and it’s hard to get it out. The bottle is made of hard plastic that is difficult to squeeze.  A tub would be perfect. It’s very thick so I don’t think a pump would solve the issue.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Very Strong Scent
Review: This lotion has a VERY strong, overpowering scent - too much for me. Also, while it is moisturizing due to shea butter and coconut oil, I'd have to say that plain Gold Bond lotion is way better - thicker and more healing and protective -  with no odor. There was nothing "illuminating" for me about this cream.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Smells so good and moisturizes well
Review: Excellent product I love it so much! It is quite a thick consistency almost more like a body butter than a lotion which makes it more difficult to dispense but it is so moisturizing and smells so fresh and amazing

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Possibly opened/used product
Review: This lotion smells nice and is thick but the bottle's seal was already off and stuck in the cap so I don't know if this is a used or authentic product. I'm waiting it hear back from Shea Moisture to see if this is normal or if I should return it for being opened or possibly used.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Buy with the scrub
Review: I love the scent and the thickness of this lotion. It leaves skin very soft and glowing.  The scent lingers so that's an added plus for me.  The bottle is a little hard to squeeze after awhile, but I've found if stored upside down, it will come out easier during the next use.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: From someone who hates lotion
Review: I have been known for my general dislike of lotion over my entire adulthood. Hated the feeling of it and did without for the longest time.Unfortunately I am getting older and the need for a moisturizing routine has become essential to prevent crypt keeper status skin. Bottom line, I love this lotion!It feels amazing, smells amazing and absorbs so deeply into it the skin I was throughly impressed.I was unable to find this product in local stores anymore but, am greatly relieved I will be able to stock up on my favorite lotion of all time right here on Amazon!

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: The best!
Review: We love this lotion and will be purchasing more of this brand! Even my husband loves it and that's saying a lot. It is very thick and smells good. Due to the thickness of it, I keep it upside down on my bathroom counter so it will be easier to come out..... and it has worked just fine.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Pleasantly Surprised

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz

I rarely write reviews so I'm honestly just letting people know this product really disappointed. Will buy from shea moisture website next time instead.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Great all over moisturizer
Review: Love this stuff. I'm in my early 40s and have very sensitive skin and allergies. I started using it as a facial moisturizer after showers, and my skin is getting so  soft, smooth and dewy... beats a lot of more expensive facial moisturizers I've tried. It does take a little  while to fully absorb, but lasts all day and a little goes a long way. Been using for several weeks now and have not had any break outs so far at all. I did knock off one star for the bottle/pump, which is not great. Would be better if this same packaged in a jar as the consistency is thick and creamy like a body butter. I just squeezed some out into another empty jar I had on hand.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Do not use on babies
Review: I was excited to use this on my newborn because of its natural organic ingredients. However, it made her skin red right away after application. Although it didn’t work for the baby, it’s great for my super dry skin!

It needs to come with a pump for thick creams and that would make it perfect.
