Title: My favorite ♥️
Review: The smell is amazing ! Leaves your skin soft for hours im obsessed.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: The smell is awesome
Review: This is so wonderful love the smell and it gets rid of dry skin righ away

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: lotion for dry skin
Review: this is very hydrating lotion  very pleasant scent

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Great smell
Review: Smells so good!

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Lasts all day
Review: This is great lotion! But the bottle is not the greatest. This lotion should be in a different kind of container.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Smells amazing but does not provide much moisture
Review: I was disappointed that this wasn’t more moisturizing. The smell is amazing, so I will continue to use it to perfume my skin, but I would never rely on this alone for moisture.

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Nice Lotion- Impossible to get out of bottle.
Review: Smells nice, very thick. It is body cream, not lotion. The squeeze-cap quickly clogged. Product is too thick to invert and shake out of bottle. I can't believe this product made it on the market like this. The packaging is absolutely incorrect for this type of CREAM.  I would not buy again on account of 1/2 of it is still in the jar and wont come out.Sticking your finger in the bottle to try to get the lotion out...

Product: SheaMoisture Coconut Oil and Hibiscus Illuminating Body Lotion for Dull, Dry Skin, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Packaged in the wrong bottle
Review: This really is some of the best lotion out there, but SheaMoisture uses the wrong delivery vehicle. I have to take the top off every time I use it and since it is so thick, I lose a quarter of the bottle because it doesn't move through the bottle. It should be packaged in a flat container with a large opening in which you scoop out what you need, like they use for some of their other products.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Game changer
Review: My hands looked like the Cryptkeepers. No amount of lotion was helping.I purchased this after reading both the positive and negative reviews. Obviously those that wrote the majority of negative reviews cannot read label instructions or ingredients.The scrub semi separates into chunks, shake the jar gently and voila its fixed. One review said it was salt. It's sugar, vitamin E and coconut oil with hibiscus. It smells tropical the scent is a little strong but I like it so no issues.I use it after the dinner dishes are done. I scrub my hands and work it into the cuticles a bit - it works amazing on dry cuticles. It feels great. Rinse and pat dry. My hands GLOW. The scaley skin is gone. The dull skin transformed. I put lotion on afterwards and it feels like it actually sinks in. My hands have never been in nicer shape and they no longer look like they're centuries older than I am.Could not recommend more highly.UPDATE - I took this in the shower. My whole body was glowing. I am prone to KP breakouts and I was worried it might cause a flare up but I'm smooth as silk. I used it before I shaved and probably got the closest shave of my life. Rinses clean no greasy feeling. This is replacing my $35 body scrub and I'm now keeping it in the shower and on the sink.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Returned product sent to me
Review: Arrived with the seal, but opened and obviously used. Very disappointed in Amazon. I’m going to try to return it because I don’t trust an opened skin care product.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Buy it girl 🤣😂
Review: Lovvvee loovvee use it after I wash body right before I'm gonna shave an a lil right after i shave an omg my legs feel sooo freaken soft 💯💯💯💕💕💕💕

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Seal was broken.
Review: The seal was broken when it came. I used it anyways because I really needed to exfoliate that day and just have kept using it and I've been fine. Probably not one of my better decisions though. It exfoliates well and smells good. Won't order again. Trying different products until I find the "one". Tree hut was my go to brand but I'm switching it up. Hate shopping in store but might just go that route.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Delicious scrubbing perfection
Review: Oh I love this stuff!! I’ve tried a bunch of body scrubs, especially for my inner thighs as they can get a bit darker due to some light eczema. First use my entire body felt like a cool cough drop lol but so soft and smooth, even my sinuses were happy. By the second use the dark spots faded and were almost gone. The scrubbing factor is perfect. I even sprinkle some at the bottom of my shower just to wake up in the morning. This is the only scrub I’ll use and will be stocking up! Highly recommend

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Not a fan
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   After actually going to the store I found out that this is indeed how the scrub is supposed to be made. It’s very moisturizing but aside from that I wouldn’t buy again still. I’m not a fan of the product and this is not the sellers fault but the scrub company .It seems to be a copy cat of the real thing. I haven’t tried the real thing but I have made at home scrubs and this is what it feels like with essential oils. It’s very dry and has little to no oil I added my own coconut oil other than that I wouldn’t buy again .

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Couldn't be happier!
Review: I love this stuff.  I ordered it because I was running low on my Tree Hut stuff that I got from Walmart and I couldn't be happier.  It smells wonderful, which was a concern of mine.The consistency is very different from Tree Hut, but I think it's a good thing.  It's not nearly as moist, which I think is great because the sugar is more concentrated so it will last longer.  It's way more moisturizing imo than Tree Hut.  I do use it in the shower though so I kind of add water to it as I use it.  Negative reviews talk about the seal being broken- mine was slightly broken but I didn't even think twice about it.  The product might just need a better seal.  I will be purchasing this again!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Broken seal
Review: Seal was broken so I’m going to return it wish I would’ve read the reviews first I would not recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Wow.
Review: I am not very beauty care literate...For years I thought I had dry skin, it turns out I have a build up of dead skin that I need to constantly exfoliate away. This stuff is amazing. Since purchasing it, I’ve been using it nightly. I think eventually I can work up to using this product a couple times a week. But for now I am really enjoying my nightly showers using this stuff. I get out of the shower feeling so soft, silky, and generally feel better about myself. It also smells amazing!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Spa treatment in a jar...
Review: This product is amazing. It was recommended by a nail technician who uses it for her clients’ hand treatments. However it is also a body scrub with just the right amount of thickness. The first thing that captures you is the scent. It truly, truly makes you feel and smell like you’re having a spa treatment, detoxifying your skin and calm your senses. Both your skin and you feel refreshed leaving your skin silky.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Gently Used!!
Review: It arrived in a box that was well packaged, once I opened the box the top was not secured on the jar and the protective seal was already open as if it had been removed already, the product is all clumped up in huge chunks, I am displeased and will trash this item, I don’t like to pay for things that has been GENTLY USED!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Tape the @#!$ Lid!!
Review: These body scrubs are a great product at a good price, especially on subscribe-and-save. But you don't seem to be paying any attention to all of the reviewers - including us - whose products arrive with loose lids and broken seals... resulting in oil all over the shipping box and everything that was shipped with it. It has happened every single time we've ordered. TIGHTEN AND TAPE THE LID SHUT BEFORE YOU SHIP THESE BODY SCRUBS. PLEASE! Better yet, put them in a sealed bag, as well. So far, nothing has been damaged, but it's inevitable the way subscribe-and-save items are combined for shipping. And the oil is supposed to arrive IN the product, not all over everything else.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: i’m disgusted
Review: It was already opened and it looks like it’s even been used before. there’s literally lint or something in there. 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Awesome!
Review: I've used a bunch if different body scrubs out there and this one is by far the best. Its a rougher scrub but gets the job done. I have very sensitive skin and Im surprised that I'm not beat red after using, which I love. Usually with a coarser scrub I look like a tomato, but bit with this one. The smell is really refreshing, not overpowering, and my skin felt really detoxed after using. You kind of feel like a human peppermint patty (in a good way). In that sense it does have a menthol/cooling effect which I can't wait to use in the summer, but it being the winter its kinda intense when the cool air hits you. Definetly wakes you up but you feel really refreshed. Strongly recommend!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Item was opened
Review: Waste all over box. It's seem the product  is heavy and should have been  sealed  more securely.  Always  product  didn't  last long. Use in one use. Smells great. Very relaxing scent. I slept like a newborn baby.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Was open when I got it.(second one too)
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Update: Got a replacement on 12/28/2021 and the product was open too. I'm just so over this! I really do like this product but it just seems that no matter what I'm going to continue to get used/opened product. Needless to say, I'm very dissatisfied and want a full refund. I'm not willing to use something on my body that has been used or I feel has been used.I was wondering why I could smell it through the box. When I took the plastic lid off the deal underneath was open and it looked as if the product had been used. The smell is amazing. Wish it wasn't like this cause I really wanted to use this product! There's just no way that I'm comfortable putting this on when the seal was broken and it looks used and there are black specks in it.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Great product
Review: Ive tried a lot of scrubs, this one is my fav.  the first time I tried it I knew it was the one for me.It doesn't melt, it isnt messy like coffee scrubs. It feels good on the skin and it exfoliates very well. I love that its minty, which makes my skin feel even more clean,  but the mint also invigorates the skin.  There is plenty of oil at the bottom of an empty jar that you could apply to your skin after bathing, I stead of lotion. Or add the extra oil ro your new jar upon opening it.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Item arrived unsealed and used! 🤮
Review: I absolutely adore this scrub and I was so relieved to find it on Amazon. However, the scrub arrived unsealed and appeared to be used. To rectify, I requested a refund and a replacement scrub, but that too arrived in the same condition. Do not buy from this seller!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: ok, but I'm not going to buy it again
Review: I bought this as an experiment, since it didn't cost all that much.  like most other body scrubs I've tried, it is mostly granular and dry, hard to get out of the container and mostly falling onto the floor of the shower before you can rub it into your skin. and I'm careful--I try hard to get it from the jar to my skin and rubbed in. what you do get rubbed in works well. it does make the shower somewhat oily. it's better than nothing, but I'm going to keep looking!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Received a replacement with a seal!
Review: I first received a jar where the seal had entirely dissolved. I toyed with just using it anyway, because it seemed to still be fine. But I decided to exchange it, and the replacement they sent me had a perfectly intact seal. In the photo, you can see there is a pretty big difference between the sealed jar (top) and unsealed jar (bottom.) The sealed jar is way more moist and less like dry sand. However I tried them both on my hands, and they actually seem to moisturize the same. As for the smell, I don’t love it. It smells like the tanning lotion they sell to use with tanning beds. It’s not a bad smell, just a little too strong for my nose :)

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Like others said it arrived opened
Review: I feel like this seller is opening these and taking some out or something, this seal doesn’t open like that in shipping. I’ve purchased this at the store and it’s amazing but it came opened and dried out. I read the other reviews and thought no way so many were already opened when they arrived, maybe I’ll be lucky. I was not. Love the product but definitely would nit buy from this seller again!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Amazing
Review: This has got to my favorite product of 2021! It leaves my skin feeling like a newborn. Even if I haven't shaved it still makes me skin feel great. Highly recommend

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Vegan friendly
Review: This product is great for dry feet, I use every day in shower; noticeable difference.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Received a USED jar
Review: the safety seal was half opened and clearly product was missing. This is really unacceptable and Amazon should not allow contaminated used products to be sold

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: The fragrance is nasty and way too strong!
Review: I can’t rate this for effectiveness, because of The Smell.  I could smell it before I even opened it (of course, the seal was broken as seems to happen with every other jar from this company).  I love the coconut/hibiscus scrub and the mint scrub.  I’m afraid I’ll have to send this one back.  I tried a tiny bit that was stuck to the lid on my hands, and the smell is very offensive to me.  SO strong, and I could not for the life of me wash it off.  I don’t want my body or my bathroom smelling like this nasty stuff.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Natural ingredients & makes skin baby soft!
Review: Trust me, I’m super picky, but it leaves your skin heathy and soft. Depending on how fresh it is, it consistency can be quite oily & has grainy pieces of salt (which I personally love), so if you like very mild scrub, it’s not for you. But if you just rub it in your skin all over your body and wait a little until it melts into your skin blending with oils, you’ll be rewarded with deeply moisturized and silky smooth body skin👌✨

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: There was a slight burning feeling after use
Review: The smell was okay, but the product was dry to the point that I had to add my own cocoa butter to the scrub and after using I felt a slight burning to my skin.  I will only use this product on my feet nowhere else because the product burns.  Only use on your feet and make sure you lotion after use.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smells great, not too oily
Review: This is my favorite body scrub for bath time! So many other scrubs have way too much oil and make me feel like I waterproofed sealed myself or something but this stuff has just the right amount of oil to keep skin feeling soft instead of slippery with an oily film.My skin is also very sensitive and many products give me temporary redness or bumps. This is one of the few that I can tolerate without any negative skin reactions.Definitely worth a try. Been using this stuff for years and it will always be my go-to scrub!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Overall good
Review: Came without being sealed so a majority of the oil leaked out of the packaging. It looked brand new so I’m assuming it was manufacturing. I have oil by them that’s similar so that was added and it’s been effective at getting rid of all the red, dry bumps I’ve always had on the back of my legs.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Love this exfoliator!
Review: It’s winter in Ohio. This means dry, dead, itchy skin. I needed an exfoliator to remove dead skin before moisturizing and chose this product. Fortunately, after using this on my entire body in the shower, I didn’t feel the need to moisturize further. Took out a whole extra step for me which is a plus. It leaves a bit of an oily feeling on the skin but it’s not overbearing at all. My moisture deprived skin actually likes how it leaves it feeling, lol.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Amazinging Soft Skin! Smells Like Hibiscus!
Review: I've used this product only once, and my overly print hands are so soft at night!!  It does help moisturize too!  The scent smells just like hibiscus and leaves a nice hibiscus smell on you without smelling like cheap perfume or poporroui.  I don't use it on my face, just everywhere else.  I'd recommend avoiding the eye area if you use it on your face since the sugar grains are thick.  I also think you get a good amount for the cost.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: CAME USED
Review:
Video Player is loading.Play VideoPlayMuteCurrent Time 0:00/Duration 0:28Loaded: 21.45%0:00Stream Type LIVESeek to live, currently behind liveLIVERemaining Time -0:28 1xPlayback RateChaptersChaptersDescriptionsdescriptions off, selectedCaptionsCaptions off, selectedEnglish (Automated)Audio Trackdefault, selectedFullscreenThis is a modal window.



   Idk if it’s normal for the seal to be broken and for the clumps to be there but this totally shocked me. My scrub came USED!!!! Please buy your bath essentials in store because this is one of many items I’ve bought that came in used, not as described or expired.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: SO STICKY AAAHHHHHHH
Review: I ignored the handful of negative reviews because there were so few and the positive ones were so overwhelmingly happy with this scrub. Boy was that a mistake. I don't know if I got a bad jar or what but it was very dry when I opened it. The scrub part itself was fine, nothing to write home about. But good God, it's SO STICKY. It's like I rubbed a layer of rubber cement across my skin. I washed the area four times and still couldn't get it all off. It's now making my clothes stick to me. Gross.It does smell really nice though. It can have a star for that.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: This stuff is great!
Review: So so happy that Amazon now carries this product! Been using it for at least 5 years. It smells great! The caffeine tightens the skin and wakes you up! The salt scrub exfoliates without burning or rash even on sensitive girly parts! Highly recommend

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Arrived opened and used
Review: I have purchased this at other retailers many times - the actual product is definitely 5 stars, but this order was not. Arrived open, used, oil everywhere.The actual scrub (previously purchased anyway) are amazing- great smell that’s not overpowering, moisturizing, just awesome stuff. Get it somewhere else instead of trying to save a buck or two!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Great product.  Too bad shipping is hit or miss
Review: I have this as a subscription item (1 tub lasts me 2 months) and absolutely love it.  The smell is very refreshing, but be careful.  If you use a lot of the scrub and don't have the bathroom vent on, the smell can become very strong.  The only reason I didn't give this a full 5 stars is that the shipping doesn't always go well.  I"ve gotten at least 5 deliveries already, so I feel I've given it a fair chance.  Sometimes the item comes intact with no leaking.  This is usually when there is some bubble packaging, and a fancy silicone band around the lid.  More than once I have received a cracked item, or the silicone band missing and the product has leaked significantly.  This last time I got lucky.  There was a good sized leak but it didn't ruin the food items in the box and the box was delivered just before the cardboard weakened and gave out.  Overall, great product, but the shipping is like playing Russian roulette.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smells amazing and makes skin silky smooth
Review: I have sensitive skin and this is an amazing scrub. The scent is addicting and sweet.  I have found shaking the container before each use evenly distributed the oil that settles to the bottom.  I love how it makes your skin soft and luminous long after using it!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: BEST ADDITION TO YOUR SHOWER OR BATH EVER!!! <3
Review: IF YOU HAVE SKIN THIS IS THE BEST THING EVER (I don't know if this would irritate sensitive skin because fortunately I don't suffer from that) BUT BOY OH BOY THIS IS THE BEST STUFF EVER! This stuff is not just for ladies! If you ever want to have the softest skin, use this stuff to exfoliate! Exfoliate everywhere!!! (Not your face or other sensitive areas) especially if you shave, exfoliate first! You'll end up having softer and smoother skin,  with less razor burn or cuts! And don't get me started on how this stuff smells. So heavenly 💖 💖 💖

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: NO SEAL ON ITEM! LOOKS USED!
Review: I ordered two of this item and when it arrived the box was covered in moisture. Once I opened the box there wasn't a seal for the two items and it was effortless to open. I opened the product and it came in chucks it definitely smells good but i will not use this item due to it not having a seal. Its a shame, i was excited to use it and the smell is wonderful. One should never put a product on their face that hasn't been sealed before hand.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: SMELLS GREAT NEED BETTER PACKAGING FOR SHIPMENT
Review: When the pkg came and I opened the box I realized the scrub was only held together with a thin piece of plastic only in the middle. Not even the whole thing and a good amount of the oils was in the box no longer in the container. I'm keeping it cause I don't wanna go through the trouble but overall smells really good and exfoliates well. I only used once so far so still need to see how well it works.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: It’s straight scrub crystals
Review: This product doesn't moisturize. I recommend using the crystals to scrub your hands/body daily, rinse, & follow up with a moisturizing lotion after. I use it twice a day and my hands & cuticles are so soft now. My hands use to be rough with dry skin from my diabetes. But this product has given my skin new life. Highly recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Lasting Awful Scent
Review: I have had body scrubs that were really nicely scented this one was horrible. The scent actually must have the ability to get into the bloodstream because I was tasting it and could not get rid of it for half a day. I liked the results of the product but the lasting scent was awful.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Loved it!
Review: This was magic in a jar. This can used in shower after shower or before, and leaves a wonderful sensual scent, soft skin.  Also, I use it to clean hands that are rough from house cleaning, leaving them very soft, not dried out, sorta sloughing the dead skin away.  No more cracked fingers for me! WILL buy more.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Disaster
Review: When I got this product, it just looked like all the liquid had evaporated and it was a big can of hardened sea salt. the seal had not been broken, so I decided to try it anyways. Shortly after scrubbing it on, I developed red bumps all over the applied areas (hands, legs, arms) and it lasted almost 10 days! I had to apply cortisone creams and take benadryl to counteract the effects and I'm pregnant, so needless to say was a complete disaster.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Favorite Things List
Review: Highly recommend this Shea Moisture African Wild Water Mint Detox & Stimulate Body Scrub. The scrub does not scratch your skin and dissolves as you scrub and does not leave you too oily. The menthol and stimulate after rinsing leaves you awake and refreshed. Or if at night, the stimulation and mint scent help relaxation. I have added a little bit of Shea Moisture Oil to increase the moisture when using. This is a popular product, b/c it tends to be sold out often. 5 Star

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Love
Review: Love the scent and I love how it leaves your feeling moisturized after the shower. I don't feel like I need to put lotion afterwards. The scent makes me feel like I have perfume on and I can smell it throughout the day.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Very moisurizing
Review: Since this product has coconut oil in it, it is VERY moisturizing. I feel it does an okay job at scrubbing, but it is very moisturizing. in the future I would probably use a different product because I don't like the heavy coconut oil feel after use, but if you have really dry skin this would be great.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Broken Seal
Review: This came with a broken seal so I returned it. Since it was already open, I could smell the fragrance and didn't care for it much. It's very over powering too. I will look for something else.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smell great but scratches skin
Review: The first time I use this I ended up with scratches on my leg that kind of felt like paper cuts.I assumed I just felt too hard, even though I’m used to body scrubs. So the second time I used it I applied with my hand and lightly washed and still got scratches. My teen daughter did aswell

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Arrived open
Review: The container arrived open and the product was dried out.  I figured I'd just add some water, and it would be fine.  It just turned into a rock glob.  So, unfortunately, I really can't review the actual product.  It smells good and, the tiny bit I did get out, is definitely rougher than the other scrubs I've tried.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Lasting Scent and Softness
Review: This is my favorite sugar scrub! I like it a little more course, and this one is. It has an incredible scent that last through the day, I get compliments regularly. I always lotion after a shower, but when I use this there is no need. Love everything about it!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Works great for my hands!!
Review: I bought this to help exfoliate my hands. It works well the scent can be a little strong at first but once you wash and dry your hands you can't really smell it anymore. I ise it a few times a week and have seen a HUGE improvement! I would recommend!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Good stuff
Review: Overall I give this stuff a really good review. I don't use this for moisturizing properties or care about the scent much. It's super abrasive and that's exactly what I'm looking for. This probably isn't good for sensitive skin.. my motive is deep exfoliation for body. This works and doesn't dissolve fast or melt away.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Love it!
Review: I use this product to exfoliate my skin once or twice a week. I have very dry, sensitive skin. This really helps my skin feel smooth and less dry. I like that is is almost like a sand consistency but you can feel that there is some sort of nourishing oils. I would recommend this product! The only thing I didn’t like is when it arrived, It had leaked oils into the box it came in with another item I ordered.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: It was open, leaking and seems different
Review: I have used this product from store multiple times, tried online purchase since it wasn’t available at stores and it’s different. It was also open and also leaking. Next time I rather wait and buy from store. Disappointed

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Bugs in Product
Review: Don’t buy this off Amazon. Go to target, Walmart, literally anywhere else. Opened this in the shower and saw small brown bits but didn’t think anything of it since it’s a natural product. The product seemed a lot dryer than I originally remembered, so I decided to mix it around. Turns out the little brown bits were tiny dead bugs. Absolutely disgusted. Never going to buy this online again. I love this brand and their products, but it’s not worth the risk.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Why my package is open?
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   since I received my package it arrived open and everything is dry very different from the presentation, I would like to buymore products of this brand the smell is very rich but I do not trust anymore.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Definitely an exfoliant
Review: I like how this is is a hard scrub so really gets the dead skin off. It's not like those liquid scrubs that do nothing. The thing I don't like about it Is that it makes your body feel oily after.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: BURNS! & became rock solid
Review: This products scent is very good but it is so strong that it burns your skin! The oil stays on your hands and if you touch any other body part such as your face or private areas, it really burns!Also, after two weeks, the scrub became rock solid with all the liquid on top, I couldn’t even break it up with a knife!Don’t waste your money, tree hut is better

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: just like visiting the salon
Review: Decided to try my hand at home manicures.  I may not be good at painting my own nails, but at least this scrub and a nice shea butter hand cream give me that fresh mani smoothness that I've been missing.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Great product for hands
Review: I purchased this product specifically for my hands. However,  i used some on my face... it is a nice exfoliating product. It left my hands smooth and soft... the scent is not strong, yet lingers a little while.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Seal broken twice!
Review: Product unable to use because both times my package seal was broken opened and dried up you can see the moisture all over the box very disappointing waste of money had to throw away twice!!! Smells good all over the box but didn’t get to use !

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Great product but doesn’t ship well
Review: The product itself works wonderfully, however it doesn’t hold up to shipping very well my first one had to seal broken and the oil leak through the box. I just received my replacement again the seal had popped open luckily most of the oil remained in the container. I’ve seen some that say they look like they’ve been used and then shipped out I don’t think that’s the case I think that may be due to the heat it just doesn’t ships well  BBC as hoped for.  Due to having my product replaced and using it and being very happy I would definitely take my chances on ordering this again.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smells great but..
Review: I love this scent but when the package arrived, both scrubs were dried out and not sealed properly. I’m not sure if it’s because they leaked in transport and unsealed itself but now I have to buy oil to fix them

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: I should have read the reviews first
Review: I was looking forward to receiving this.  I opened it up and it was completely unsealed!!  The seal was up in the lid and about 1/3 of the scrub was gone.  It looked as if someone had used it.  I won't be using it.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Love it but the smell
Review: It smelled a little too artificial for me. I’d definitely go with a different scent next time. It’s a lot dryer than I expected it to be but it wasn’t horrible.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Skin Like Silk!!!!
Review: On top of smelling heavenly this product was super moisturizing even after one use. I have never been comfortable enough to use an exfoliate on my whole body, but after a nice hot shower it works wonders. Stocking up on this.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Best scrub I’ve EVER used!
Review: I have on auto deliver and use it daily. It works great and isn’t greasy and my shower is not filthy like it is with other scrubs. Highly recommend and it’s the most reasonably price scrub I have found.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Like the product but it came kinda open
Review: Like the product but it came kinda open. Not too open that I was concerned about using it...but there is no protective plastic around the top and the lip opened and the foil wasn't 100% secure.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Love the tingly sensation from the mint
Review: Been using for about a month and I notice a distinct difference in my skin. Love the tingly sensation from the mint. Came recommended by a friend and I totally agree. Great price too!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Good product
Review: My skin felt smoother after using this product. I also love the smell. When used with an exfoliation glove I felt so much cleaner. Also, I saw reviews about the seal being broken but I feel it might be due to the salts from the product...

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Very moisturizing
Review: Wow! I would definitely recommend...the granules literally melt on your skin and its so moisturizing! I love it! The smell can be a bit overpowering at first but u get used to it and the minty burn on your skin..lol..was a shocker when I first used it but the feel of my skin after use sure made up for it. Use sparingly! Don't recommend if you have extremely sensitive skin..the mint and ginger together packs a punch...but ..I love it!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: It's ok. For detox the body mind and spirit
Review: I'd of liked a better stronger scent; but the cleanliness afterwards; makes up for this. I love scrubs and try different varieties. I might pass on another brand; just because I love sented essences. Overall, I'm quite pleased. Expensive though for non thickness.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: No thanks
Review: There was absolutely no seal on the paper between  the lid and the product. The scrub looked like it had just been clumped in. Good news is you can get a refund without returning the item.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Product had obviously been opened.
Review: The jar was opened looked stirred up, if you know what I mean. I was going to return it but my husband had thrown it away. So did not get to use the product but just a warning.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Rebirth through Mint
Review: Thoroughly enjoyed the sugar scrub it really gave off a cleansing scent that relieve the pressure in my nostrils upon usage the mint is overwhelming and it soothes the body! It's like emerging from spring water with a gentle embrace of mint dancing around your flesh clean and refreshing!!!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Scrub
Review: I really like this product. I do wish it was a little bit more moisturizing than abrasive. Seems like there could be more oil added to it. Otherwise I do like the product.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Seal opened!
Review: I just got it today. Seal was opened and scrub VERY dry! It is a shame because it seems that the product is good quality when is not opened!!!!!Good fragance

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smells amazing
Review: I love this scrub. The grain is pretty gentle but works. The scent is amazing and smells up my whole house! I use a ton of body scrub and I’m in love with this one!! I use it everywhere

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: The smell isn't my favorite but it is in no means bad, the smell wouldn't have stopped me from purchasing again. My skin is freakishly soft and smooth afterwards and it never is. But my main issue is it came with the seal broken and there was only a small layer that wasn't dried out. I got three uses out of it before I reached the layer that is as hard as a rock and I can't do anything with it. It is a fantastic product I would have bought again if the seal wasn't broken.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smells good…texture could be improved
Review: Added a little water because the texture seemed to be void of moisture and hard to get out of the bottle but once I did it has been great and smells delicious. Always get compliments on how I smell when I use this product and leaves skin feeling smoother and more moisturized

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Dried out-seal broken
Review: I should have believed the other reviews!  Unsealed, a jar of dry scrub-the have a problem with quality control. Dont waste your time and money, you too will get an open jar :(

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Doesn't work for eczema
Review: I bought this thinking it could help my eczema, except it only made it more enflamed than ever before. I also think it didn't come with a seal. So, I'm better off buying their African Black Soap products directly from Target. Smells really nice, though

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: 👍🏻 PRODUCT 👎🏻 PACKAGING
Review: The product itself was great. But a message for the company: CREATE PACKAGING THAT CAN WITHSTAND TRAVEL. I have gotten 2 of the scrubs, both with the security seal not even glued on to it.At first I got the first one replaced, only for the second one to come with a detached security seal again. I’ve read a bit of reviews saying the same thing. SheaMoisture, don’t cheapen your look when you have great products please.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Broken seal
Review: Item came with broken seal and oil leaked everywhere!  don't feel like going through the hassle of traveling to return a broken item, so I'm just taking a loss! Smh

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Exfoliating dream!
Review: I love this scrub!! It really softens my skin. And it exfoliates and is so nourishing.The only scrub I will buy!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smells great, feels great
Review: I have sensitive skin, and this product feels great and smells so nice. It leaves my skin exfoliated but soft. Highly recommend!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Super dry.
Review: I'm not happy with this product. It's dry and hard to apply. It just falls off my skin before massaging. Beach sand, sugar and salt are free.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Not a fan
Review: I really like the Shea moisture shampoo, but I really did not like the scent of this scrub and found the scrub was dry. I would not recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Waste of money

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smells great
Review: Wonderful hand and body scrub. I was looking for a scrub that was affordable and this fits the bill. I don't even need moisturizer after my shower!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Nice product
Review: Great exfoliate. Leaves skin silky smooth after use. Will definitely need an additionalMoisturizer after use. Smells great. Would buy it again.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: The best body scrub
Review: This scrub is such a great exfoliator and also leaves your skin feeling moisturized. I absolutely love it and have bought it for all my girlfriends and sisters as gifts! You won’t be sorry you bought this! You’ll be addicted!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Works Great

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: This product is great for the Winter and those hard elbows, heels
Review: The scent is a little strong but not nauseating

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Want soft skin? Buy this!
Review: I am in love with this scrub, it's not as rough but gets the job DONE!!! I use this scrub before I shave my legs and let me tell you, SOFT. The scent may not last all day however, it is a nice scent and not that strong but just right. Definitely will be buying this again.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Exfoliating and Moisturizing WOW
Review: I never expected an exfoliant to be so moisturizing while getting the job done. The mint fragrance isn't overpowering or overly synthetic, instead it is a nice natural hint of almost a subtle peppermint. I will certainly be purchasing more!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smells so good
Review: Great smelling great quality exfoliation

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Rock solid
Review: It became rock solid after a couple of uses. Impossible to use it now. Very disappointed.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Must try!
Review: A good exfoliate is a must! This one is the best out there!! The scent is amazing and the scrub leaves you feeling smooth. It moisturizes great and gives you a nice tingling sensation from the mint.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Pure salt
Review: This products is purely salt with a strong scent. I had to add water to it for use. I do not recommend at all!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smells
Review: I did not enjoy the smell. It was very strong and lingered even after washing with soap and loofah.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Leaking
Review: This was a gift. I kept it because it leaked all over when it was shipped.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Refreshing Scrub
Review: This is one of my favorite scrubs! It’s a little coarser than some scrubs I’ve used, but I feel so clean and smooth after using it. It has a mild cooling effect (thanks to the mint), which is energizing and wonderful, especially during the long, hot, sticky summers here in Houston. Price point is nice, too.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: I adore this stuff! So fresh!
Review: This stuff is amazing. While exfoliating feels refreshing and tingly anyway, the scent really makes me feel like I'm at a spa. It's fresh and minty, not girly or overpowering, and I can feel my skin tingling after I use it! I have to keep this stuff on hand for those long hot baths.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Good scrub just gets all over your bathtub
Review: I like this scrub - it smells good and left my skin feeling really nice. My only problem was that it left a residue in my tub that got annoying to clean over time.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: freshly satisfying
Review: My sister suggested I get this and now im in LOVE and cannot understand I how I lived without it before. I use it for my whole body but I specifically love it to exfoliate my underarms once a week.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Very dry
Review: There are better stubs on the market

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: The best!
Review: I've tried many different brands of body scrub and this is my constant go-to. Not only does it smell nice, but the texture/grain of the scrub is really good and exfoliating. It's not too watery, yet not pasty like some of the other scrubs out there. It has the consistency of wet sand, which I like.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Sticky residue that took 3 days to remove
Review: This is the worst possible experience I have ever had with a bath/beauty product. It burned my skin and left the most horrible sticky STICKY residue. I had to use pure coconut oil to make the burning stop, and I was scared to scrub the sticky off bc my skin was so inflammed from the mint. I am no stranger to mint and essential oils, this is STRONG and smells like garage chemicals. Not a hint of pleasantness in the scent. I had a full blown panic attack trying to get the stickiness off me. 30 extra mins in the shower, layers of oil, skin so soft and a final layer of baby powder made me feel somewhat normal again. I had plans couldn't spend hours scrubbing and adding more chemicals to my inflammed skin. Its now the next day and I'm still sticky with blue fuzzies stuck to my legs from jeans. Absolutely so upset I paid $15 retail for such an awful product. Please do not waste ur money time or sanity. Unless there's someone you absolutely hate and want to gift them with a sticky foul smelling scrub. Or if you want tiktok fame go ahead and Gorilla Glue Girl yourself with this!Edit: Day 3 and I'm still scrubbing residue off my legs.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Amazing!!
Review: I have used this less than 5 times and I am amazed! The cellulite on my tights has reduced greatly so much. I have no doubt with continued use that it will be completely gone. I very rarely leave a review but this one I had to. I can’t speak to the scent as I am not able to smell but I would pretty much take any smell for the results I have seen.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: My favorite part of a pedicure brought home!
Review: My favorite part of a pedicure is the minty foot scrub. I was so thrilled to find this on Amazon, and so excited by how well it works! It is a bit rough and I probably wouldn't use it as a body scrub, but it is absolutely perfect for my feet and legs. It gently exfoliated and tingled. I love it!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Not the best but it smells good
Review: I love the scent and it makes my skin feel soft after using it. The product does, however, feel like some sort of wax coating after using though. Also, it gets dry and clumpy within the first few days so you have to use it pretty fast. My face burned when I tried to exfoliate with it so stick to using on your legs arms etc.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: HOW does this have good reviews?!
Review: I'm baffled by how the Water Mint & Ginger scrub has good reviews! I used it for the first time this morning and I smell like I rolled around on the Home Depot floor rather than taking a shower -- and my skin is covered in gross sticky goo! It's like tree sap. I tried washing it off with soap, shampoo, hand soap and I'm STILL sticky. In fact, I'd probably smell a lot better if I had just used tree sap! Maybe I got a bad batch or something but this stuff is nasty and I'm never buying it again. Purchase at your own risk!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Idk
Review: My box had a huge oil stain on it and the container itself was oily so i assume something leaked from it…I would truly appreciate a replacement or even a refund cause I think everything that makes it somewhat oily leaked out of mine!!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Extremely sticky and waxy
Review: I got this body scrub at Walgreens on clearance thinking it was a good deal. Upon taking a shower the scrub was invigorating but left a horrible waxy feeling on my skin for 2 days. All of my family members have had this same problem with this scrub as well, maybe it was just a bad batch or I don’t know what ingredient inside the scrub would leave this residue. I would not recommend this product to anyone especially if you’re looking for smooth skin afterwards.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Love the scrub
Review: Ummmm, $49.95??? Save your money and buy from CVS for $12ish!! Love the scrub, makes my skin feel soft and smooth.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Skin cooling
Review: This stuff smells great and it feel good when rubbed in. Its not harsh like some scrubs how ever it give your skin such an intense cooling sensation when you step out of the shower.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Shower Bliss!
Review: I love this product! It makes your skin feel smooth and tingly afterwards. When I rub this on I just feel like I’m taking really good care of myself. It’s my favorite bath product ever.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: In love
Review: I love this! Leaves my skin baby soft. I even use a very little amount on my face and it minimizes my pores. I love the mint smell, very relaxing!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Love it, but the packaging…
Review: I love it! It smells great and leaves skin really smooth afterwards. I use it as a pre-shaving scrub—Afterwards, I use my shaving cream (Cremo). This product in combination with my shaving cream really helps me get an extra close shave that leaves my legs feeling really smooth and moisturized. Get it!CON: the only complaint I have is this: I’ve ordered this product twice now and both times the container’s seal had somehow come undone in transit and it leaked lots of the oils into the package and onto my other items. Despite this, the product works very well. Just wish it came packaged differently to prevent breakage.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Another great product from SheaMoisture
Review: I’m a big fan of shea moisture-i like both their hair and skin products. I gave this a try because I can no longer find the coffee and coconut oil loose body scrub that they make or made. I’ll say this one has some zing scent wise! It also gives your body a cooling sensation which will be very nice in warmer months. I’ve used this scrub a few times now & I like that it exfoliates beautifully & leaves my skin so soft without feeling oily. I don’t even need to apply lotion to my skin after using this (although I still do for maximum softness and hydration).

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Cannot beat the price!
Review: This scrub is coarse so if you are looking for a fine exfoliation, this is not it. However, if you’re wanting a deep scrub that leaves behind refreshing oils - this is it! I love using this before shaving. It gets all the dead skin off, leaves you feeling fresh and has a moisturizing affect. I haven’t had ingrown hairs since using this and can’t beat the value. Smell is earthy which is typically not my favorite but it’s not overwhelming (I’m more of a vanilla scent person) and doesn’t linger. I’ve repurchased several times now.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: This scrub is GREAT!
Review: This scrub is great. Its a fine texture so I use it almost everyday.  As with other reviews most most of my containers have arrived with the foil seal slightly broken but the product itself is fine even if it gets hard just wet your fingers a little bit run it across the top and it'll start to break up and you can still use it. Some people wrote reviews that said they actually threw it away but the product is actually fine. It leaves your skin feeling very soft and smooth.  It also smells terrific. I have been buying several at a time so I don't run out I don't want to be without it.  I also like that it doesn't have a lot of terrible stuff in it and they don't test on animals so it is cruelty free which is very important to me. You won't regret it if you try it.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Opened and dried out
Review: I received this product and the seal was broken and the contents dried out it didn’t leak which was a good thing since there were other items in the box.  This product smelled a little off but I’m not sure if that’s the way it really smell or because it’s old.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: Smells good haven’t seen any results yet
Review: What I didn’t like is the first jar had clearly been used, seal broken and some of product missing, so they sent a free replacement and I couldn’t believe it was open too, the protective seal was lifted. Perhaps it happens in transit, not sure what’s going on.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: I've tried lots of scrubs and this is hands down my favorite.
Review: The scent is refreshing and not overbearing. The scrub doesn't disintegrate right away when it gets wet and allows you to exfoliate. Doesn't leave an oily layer on your body after rinsing off. With some scrubs you need to use both body wash and scrub to feel clean, but with this scrub it lathers up well and I feel clean after rinsing off.This is the best scrub I have tried yet.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: My 2nd purchase of! LOVE!!
Review: LOVE this scrub and this brand. The salt to oil ratio is PERFECT!! I've used others and ended up tossing them. Too much oil and large pieces of salt and your tub slick to boot. Ugh. This is perfection and it does not leave the shower all coated in oil. LOVE IT!!

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz
Title: feels very good!!!
Review: it leaves my skin feeling very cool, soft, and fairly moisturized. i think when you use it you can't be too stingy with it because it seems to get hard over time quicker than I thought. but I would order again!!! it feels really good and is good for your skin! the cheap scrubs have harmful plastics so beware with what you buy.

Product: SheaMoisture Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub for Dull Skin Coconut and Hibiscus Cruelty-Free Skin Care 12 oz

It has a very strong but pleasant smell, after one use my skin felt a lot cleaner, smoother/softer and had a soft sweet coconut scent on it. I would give this product a 5/5 if the packaging was safer for travel - I had 2 containers and the seals were broken on both of them, and the liquid spilt out of both.

Review: I love the scent and it make my skin so soft.

Product: SheaMoisture In-Shower Soap and Body Wash Conditioner for Dry Skin Coconut & Hibiscus Coconut 8 oz
Title: Smells great, but moisture doesn't absorb.
Review: I was really excited about this in-shower lotion because I love this brand (their baby lotion is great), but I have to say I'm pretty disappointed with it. It doesn't seem to really absorb at all like it's supposed to. It smells great, but is pretty ineffective at moisturizing my dry skin. I will not buy it again.

Product: SheaMoisture In-Shower Soap and Body Wash Conditioner for Dry Skin Coconut & Hibiscus Coconut 8 oz
Title: Loving this stuff
Review: I've been battling incredibly dry, incredibly itchy skin all over for almost a year and it's driving me crazy. I was skeptical of in-shower lotions/moisturizers but I'm willing to try anything at this point and I love the company that makes it. It's not miraculous or life-changing but it's great and honestly exceeded my expectations. I use it last thing in the shower, gently rinse it off, then pat dry with a fluffy towel. It's thick and has a somewhat strong scent during application but after that it fades and leaves me with softer, soothed skin. I'm planning on buying more of this, and the other in-shower conditioners made by SheaMoisture.

Product: SheaMoisture In-Shower Soap and Body Wash Conditioner for Dry Skin Coconut & Hibiscus Coconut 8 oz
Title: Smells good but generic
Review: So I have been trying a lot of different in shower conditioners and lotions. This is my second favorite.  (My favorite being soap and glory).I like the way it smells straight out of the bottle and it leaves my skin soft and moisturized. The only thing I don't care for is the generic -ness of the smell,  it just seems a little overdone.... Nice, but nothing special. Think every coconut lotion, ever. I am looking forward to trying this brands other body conditioners.

Product: SheaMoisture In-Shower Soap and Body Wash Conditioner for Dry Skin Coconut & Hibiscus Coconut 8 oz
Title: Sad it didn’t live up to the brand's quality I’m use to
Review: I’ve been using Shea Moisture products for years now and was confident this would be just as high quality as the rest. Not even close!  As soon as it’s was applied to my skin I noticed a weird almost metallic smell, it doesn’t moisturize the skin at all very disappointed. Although this wasn’t the experience I expected I’ll continue to use the rest of my Shea Moisture products that make my hair happy.

Product: SheaMoisture In-Shower Soap and Body Wash Conditioner for Dry Skin Coconut & Hibiscus Coconut 8 oz
Title: Not what I expected
Review: Not what I expected. I thought it would be more of a rich moisturizing body wash, but it doesn’t lather up AT ALL. It’s more like I’m just putting lotion on my body in the shower and not actually cleaning my skin at all

Product: SheaMoisture In-Shower Soap and Body Wash Conditioner for Dry Skin Coconut & Hibiscus Coconut 8 oz
Title: Not very moisturizing
Review: Not very moisturizing at all and the scent is a little weird. I was disappointed and will stick to Nivea.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Very disappointed.
Review: I was very disappointed when I got this product from Amazon. This was my second time using it, the first time I bought it from Walmart and I LOVED it my skin felt amazing! However, the two I bought of here made my skin tingly and caused blemishes  as if I was having an allergic reaction to it. Something was definitely off, like the texture was really silky as if it had been sitting it the warehouse for a long time. I could barely rub it into my skin without it seeping out of my hands. Also, the sent is normally very powerful but not this time it was very mild and I could barely smell it nor did I feel the moisture from the vitamin E once I got out the shower. Overall I am not pleased with this purchase at all and really feel like it was a waste of money especially considering I bought two. For now on, I will continue going to my local Walmart for this body scrub, as I will never order again off Amazon.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Makes my skin feel great, but my nose is not happy.
Review: This is a great scrub that exfoliates AND moisturizes. I use this to exfoliates before shaving. It leaves my skin feeling very smooth. I especially like it during the winter as it helps combat dry skin.I limit use of this to my legs, feet, arms, hands, and belly. I have sensitive skin, but this scrub doesn't irritate me at all. Note - I don't use it on my chest, back, or face. I don't use it daily and a single container lasts me about 2 to 3months.Now, the downside - the scent. I've been using this scrub for a long while and I've bought it many times. The scent used to be pleasant. The scent is now far more overpowering. It also smells like an artificial fragrance and it's obnoxious. It's a total bummer as I use it much less than I'd like for that reason.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Not Bad for Shower
Review: This product is quite abrasive but lubricating for the skin, "greasy" in fact. I like it. I prefer the Trader Joe's lavender scrub but refuse to jump through the hoops to get into that store. I had this product dry out when I bought it previously, but in the shower, it got moist again. Given the circumstances in which we are now living, it is preferable to going inside a drugstore.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Good
Review: I love this product overall. One of my containers (I bought a 2 pack) did not have the seal on it. Well, it did, but it was stuck inside the cap rather than being on the jar as it should have been. There was not sign of prior use, but that jar was a bit drier upon opening than the other making the texture a bit different. Still worked fine, just wish there was some better quality checking

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Leaky packaging
Review: Packing sucked, mine leaked in the box out ofThe containers. Both containers were almost totally dry & the box was soaking up the liquid. I would not order a scrub online again since there isn’t a seal or the seal was broken on mine on the tubs each themselves, it was more like one of those foam things under the lid that sits there. It wasn’t sealed tight so leaked out into box.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Eco-friendly, but the scent is so-so
Review: I was looking for an all natural (NO PLASTIC) scrub to tackle ashy feet and exfoliate before shaving. This delivers, although I'm not crazy about the scent as it's a bit strong to me. But, for the amount you get it's a good deal and it's free of plastic microbeads which was the most important criteria for me, personally.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Cheap. Stinks. Fash shipping. Nice seller. Just not for me.
Review: You get what u pay for.. Stinks like a cheap lotion or body spray from the dollar store. Didnt leave my skin moisture at all. It did in the shower but it didn't last long at all. My main issue is the smell. Didnt smell anything like coconut or hibiscus. Im stuck with 2 jars of this stuff now. I hate to throw it away. Not worth sending it back either. Stinks to the high heavens.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Smells incredible, super moisturizing
Review: This is my favorite sugar scrub. I have to wash my hands constantly at work, so dry, cracking hands is a big issue for me. This is Super moisturizing, and I love the way it smells. It’s been the only thing (paired with the regular use of lotion) that helps keep my hands smooth! Definitely would recommend this, and pretty much any other Shea moisture product.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Amazing!!!
Review: First time trying these, and they smell amazing!! The scent lasts a long time, it's strong at first but then it's very subtle. I really love this!! My skin stays hydrated and smooth. Highly recommend. And so worth the price too!!

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Y’all...EVERYONE SHOULD HAVE THIS
Review: ONE OF THE BEST BODY SCRUBS EVER. Technically I could make a sugar scrub but it’s not the same as Shea Moisture. It feels like an actual scrub, leaves your skin feeling smooth and glistening. I use about a table spoon portion amount twice daily. This is also great  If you suffer from keratosis pilaris like myself. I noticed a difference almost immediately in the smoothness of my skin AND my condition has improved in less than a week. Boyfriend loves it too, men be crusty too!

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Caused ingrown hairs
Review: I started using sugar scrubs for exfoliating after my Brazilian and this one made me get so many ingrown hairs. I know it's from this product because I've been getting Brazilians for a year and the only thing that changed was the scrub that I used. I stopped using this one and the problem cleared up. Definitely never buying this again. The scent is about all this scrub has going for it

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Nice Smell, Does Give a Stimulating Scrub
Review: I have used this for over a year now.  I use it only about once a week.  It is invigorating as a scrub, but it is prety crumbly, so I apply very little at a time.  I have not had a problem now that mine is past the expiration date like some are saying below.  Not sure why there are conflicting experiences, it always seem to be that way in reviews.  What I struggle with, is that it seems like scrubbing SUGAR into our skin might not be that good in other ways, other then it gives you a way to invigorate your skin with some minor abraison.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Use within a few months
Review: When I first bought this product, it was fine. However, be sure to use it within the first few months because it will dry out and get gummy. I tried using it again after it had been in my cabinet for a few months and I threw it away right after. It had separated into granular parts and gummy parts. The gummy parts stuck to my skin and wouldn't come off with water and scrubbing. I had to actually pick small gummy pieces off of my body. I'll stick to the scrub that I personally made instead.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: I love it for now 😉
Review: Not sticky like other reviews say. This has a nice smell and this dissolves almost as soon as you rubbing it into your skin. I've been using this for a week started using this for softer skin and firmer/toned skin. I see slight results and am excited to see the ending result.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Best product that I've purchased in a long time.
Review: I love the way my skin feels after using it...& the smell is mesmerizing.

Product: Shea Moisture Skin Care, Coconut & Hibiscus Illuminating Hand and Body Scrub, Gluten Free Vitamin E, Restores Radiant Healthy Glow to Dull Skin, 2 jars - 12 oz ea.
Title: Amazing
